title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: Espaces PartagÃ©s - Quâ€™est-ce quâ€™une procuration ?
content:
Le fondement juridique dâ€™Espaces PartagÃ©s repose sur la procuration (Kontovollmacht en Allemand).Â 
Contrairement aux comptes joints classiques, les participants dâ€™un espace partagÃ© nâ€™ont pas les mÃªmes pouvoirs sur lâ€™espace que son administrateur. AprÃ¨s avoir reÃ§u une procuration, les participants obtiennent le droit dâ€™agir au nom de lâ€™administrateur de lâ€™espace pour effectuer des virements vers/depuis lâ€™espace partagÃ© concernÃ©.
La personne qui autorise un participant dâ€™agir en son nom est appelÃ© lâ€™â€administrateurâ€ de lâ€™espace. Ce dernier est le seul propriÃ©taire de lâ€™espace partagÃ©. Lâ€™administrateur doit Ãªtre un client N26 Premium, et donc possÃ©der un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business You.
Cela signifie que la personne ayant crÃ©Ã© lâ€™espace partagÃ© est son dÃ©tenteur lÃ©gal. Lâ€™administrateur de lâ€™espace partagÃ© :
possÃ¨de tous les fonds disponibles dans lâ€™espace partagÃ©
peut effectuer des virements librement vers et depuis lâ€™espace partagÃ©, Ã  tout moment
peut inviter des amis Ã  rejoindre un espace partagÃ© en leur donnant une procuration

peut aussi clÃ´turer un espace partagÃ© aprÃ¨s avoir retirÃ© un participant (tous les fonds de lâ€™espace partagÃ© seront alors virÃ©s vers le compte principal de lâ€™administrateur)
En obtenant une procuration, les participants qui acceptent lâ€™invitation de lâ€™administrateur auront accÃ¨s Ã  tous les fonds disponibles dans lâ€™espace partagÃ©. Cela signifie que chaque bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire peut aussi effectuer des virements librement vers et en dehors de lâ€™espace partagÃ©.
N26 Bank GmbH ne peut Ãªtre tenue responsable des paiements effectuÃ©s dans le cadre de la procuration.

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers and emails. 
If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can revoke your consent to be identifiable as an N26 user.
During your first MoneyBeam transaction (after importing your contacts) youâ€™ll receive a prompt to either change your visibility settings or be reminded of them later.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. 
Youâ€™ll know this is the case if your friend doesnâ€™t immediately receive your transfer (by the way: this money will bounce back to your account within a week).
To avoid this, find out which email and phone number your friend uses for their N26 account and make sure to send the MoneyBeam to it.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get Â£10 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: Why isnâ€™t my photo verification working?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except Germany
First, geolocation must be enabled. Then review theÂ guide(new tab)Â weâ€™ve created to help you take the best pictures.
Most photoÂ verificationsÂ fail due to bad picture quality.
Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.
If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.
Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)
Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).
Make sure youâ€™re the only person in the photo.
Check your document.
We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).
Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.
We only accept national IDs and passports.
Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.
If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesnâ€™t go through, you can just start over again.
As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.
Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.Â

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + thenÂ TransferÂ andÂ Add new recipient), some details like the recipientâ€™s name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesnâ€™t delete your transaction history with them.

title: Chi puÃ² ottenere un Conto base?
content:
Puoi aprire unÂ conto corrente N26Â gratuito nel nostro sito web o scaricando la nostraÂ app.
La legge tedesca sulla mobilitÃ  bancaria (Zahlungskontengesetz o ZKG) consente inoltre a tutti i cittadini con residenza legale nellâ€™Unione europea di avere un conto base. Questo vale per tutti coloro che vivono in un paese supportato.
Il conto base N26 ha un costo di gestione mensile di 6â‚¬. Puoi trovare tutte le altre tariffe nei nostri listini prezzi.
PuoiÂ richiederloÂ se non hai giÃ  un conto corrente  conN26 o con un altro istituto bancario in Germania. In alcune circostanze, N26 puÃ²Â rifiutare la tua richiesta.
Alcuni prodotti e servizi come lo Scoperto N26, N26 Credit, N26 You o N26 Metal Â non sono accessibili con un conto base N26.

title: Â¿QuÃ© pasa si rechazan mi IBAN de N26?
content:
Si abriste la cuenta en EspaÃ±a despuÃ©s del 17 de abril de 2019, tu IBAN es espaÃ±ol. Dicho IBAN tiene el cÃ³digo de paÃ­s ES, un cÃ³digo de control de 2 dÃ­gitos, luego los 10 dÃ­gitos del cÃ³digo de entidad financiera, despuÃ©s 2 dÃ­gitos de control y, por Ãºltimo, los 10 dÃ­gitos de tu nÃºmero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:Â ES XX 1563 2626 XX 326XXXXXXX.
En cambio, si la abriste antes del 17 de abril de 2019, o despuÃ©s de esa fecha pero fuera de EspaÃ±a, tu IBAN es alemÃ¡n. Este tiene el cÃ³digo de paÃ­s DE, un cÃ³digo de control de 2 dÃ­gitos, el cÃ³digo bancario de 8 dÃ­gitos y, por Ãºltimo, los 10 dÃ­gitos de tu nÃºmero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
Los paÃ­ses que estÃ¡n en la zona SEPA (Zona Ãšnica de pagos en Euros) han acordado el sistema de IBAN para simplificar los pagos tanto nacionales como internacionales, y para reducir el riesgo de error en la comunicaciÃ³n y en el procesamiento de transacciones.
Los comerciantes y empresas que no aceptan el IBAN de otros estados miembros del Espacio EconÃ³mico Europeo (EEE), estÃ¡n violando la legislaciÃ³n europea desde el 1 de febrero de 2016 (ArtÃ­culo 9 delÂ Reglamento No. 260/2012(pestaÃ±a nueva)).
Si te ves afectado por una discriminaciÃ³n de IBAN, te pedimos que te pongas en contacto con lasÂ (pestaÃ±a nueva)autoridades competentes(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â directamente y des parte del incidente. Facilita tu informaciÃ³n de contacto, el nombre de la empresa o del comerciante que no acepte el IBAN y una descripciÃ³n del incidente (incluyendo capturas de pantalla del rechazo o cualquier otra documentaciÃ³n de tu comunicaciÃ³n con ellos).

title: Come posso richiedere la giacenza media?
content:
Con giacenza media si intende il saldo medio depositato su un conto corrente in un anno. Viene determinata sulla base degli estratti conto relativi al periodo di riferimento, sommando tutte le giacenze giornaliere e dividendo il totale per 365.Â 
PuÃ² essere richiesto anche se il conto Ã¨ stato aperto da meno di un anno.
La giacenza media viene richiesta per poter compilare il modello ISEE e ottenere prestazioni agevolate in ambito sociale.Â 
Richiedere la giacenza media del tuo conto N26 Ã¨ molto semplice. SarÃ  sufficiente:
aver aperto un conto con N26 nellâ€™anno di riferimento;
avere lâ€™indirizzo di residenza in Italia;
Se hai bisogno di conoscere la giacenza media relativa allâ€™anno scorso, contattaci via chat tramite lâ€™app N26. Riceverai il calcolo della tua giacenza media via email in circa 3 giorni lavorativi.

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
ChooseÂ Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

Warum muss ich einen Besitzer oder einen Teilnehmer als vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen EmpfÃ¤nger bestimmen?
Das europÃ¤ische Bankrecht regelt, wie BankÃ¼berweisungen autorisiert werden mÃ¼ssen. Hiernach ist die Anwendung einer starken Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA) eine MaÃŸnahme, um Online-Zahlungen sicherer zu machen.Â 
Eine Ausnahme hiervon bildet die Klassifizierung einer Person in einem Shared Space als "vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen EmpfÃ¤nger". Ãœberweisungen an diese Person bedÃ¼rfen keiner starken Kundenauthentifizierung.
Was sind Shared Spaces?
Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufÃ¼gen oder davon entfernen?

title: Spazi Condivisi - Cos'Ã¨ il Potere Legale?
content:
Il modello legale utilizzato per Spazi Condivisi si chiama Potere Legale (Kontovollmacht in Tedesco).Â 
I partecipanti di uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno pari proprietÃ  del conto come un conto condiviso nel senso bancario tradizionale. Dopo aver ricevuto il Potere Legale i partecipanti ottengono il diritto di agire a nome dell'amministratore, per tutto ciÃ² che riguarda il trasferimento dei fondi entro lo Spazio Condiviso. 
La persona che autorizza l'altro ad agire per suo conto Ã¨ denominata "Amministratore", questa persona Ã¨ il proprietario legale del conto. L'amministratore deve essere un titolare di un conto premium N26, ad esempio N26 You, N26 Metal e N26 Business You.
CiÃ² significa che chiunque abbia creato lo Spazio Condiviso ne Ã¨ il suo proprietario legale. L'amministratore di uno Spazio Condiviso:Â 
- E' il proprietario di tutti i fondi presenti nello Spazio Condiviso.
- PuÃ² trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.
- PuÃ² invitare partecipanti al proprio Spazio Condiviso garantendo loro il Potere Legale. 
- PuÃ² revocare il Potere Legale di un partecipante in qualsiasi momento.
- PuÃ² anche chiudere uno Spazio Condiviso dopo aver rimosso un partecipante (tutti i fondi di quello Spazio Condiviso saranno trasferiti nel conto principale del proprietario). 
Garantendo il Potere Legale ad una persona, quest'ultima avrÃ  accesso ad ogni fondo presente nello Spazio Condiviso.  Questo significa che ogni partecipante potrÃ  trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.

N26 Bank GmbH non puÃ² essere ritenuta responsabile per i pagamenti coperti dal Potere Legale.
Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: Â¿Por quÃ© no puedo ver a otros usuarios de N26 en MoneyBeam?
content:
Para realizar transacciones en tiempo real conÂ MoneyBeam, N26 verifica la lista de tus contactos y encuentra a otros usuarios de N26 basÃ¡ndose en el nÃºmero de telÃ©fono o el email. TambiÃ©n puedes introducir un contacto manualmente utilizando uno de estos dos datos.Â 
Si no ves el nombre de tu amigo/a en MoneyBeam pero sabes que utiliza N26, es porque no se ha hecho visible. De hecho, si lo deseas puedes revocar el permiso para ser visible. Puedes hacerlo si entras en ðŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta, luego en ConfiguraciÃ³n y finalmente en ConfiguraciÃ³n Personal. DespuÃ©s marca o desmarca la casilla segÃºn lo que quieras.
La mayorÃ­a de los errores de MoneyBeam que se dan entre usuarios de N26 se debe a que hay varios nÃºmeros de telÃ©fono o e-mails registrados en la misma entrada de la lista de contactos. Para evitarlo de cara al futuro, averigua quÃ© email o quÃ© nÃºmero de telÃ©fono utiliza tu amigo en su cuenta N26 y asegÃºrate de enviar ahÃ­ el MoneyBeam. Si los datos de tu contacto no coinciden no es posible enviar el MoneyBeam. 
Â¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 â‚¬ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. InfÃ³rmate mÃ¡s sobre nuestro programaÂ Invita a un amigo.

title: Come salvare i dati del destinatario di un bonifico?
content:
Ogni volta che nell'app crei un bonifico per un nuovo destinatario (tocca + quindiÂ TrasferisciÂ eÂ Aggiungi nuovo destinatario), alcuni dettagli, come il nome del destinatario e lâ€™IBAN, vengono salvati automaticamente nell'elenco dei contatti per utilizzi futuri. Puoi anche cancellare i contatti o visualizzare con essi la cronologia delle transazioni:

Lâ€™eliminazione di un contatto non elimina la relativa cronologia delle transazioni.

title: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
content:
Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wieÂ MoneyBeamsÂ durchzufÃ¼hren, Ã¼berprÃ¼ft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.
Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber weiÃŸt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie  sich hÃ¶chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch wÃ¤hlen, ob du selbst dich fÃ¼r andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen mÃ¶chtest.
Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15â‚¬ fÃ¼r jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Warum wurde mir eine GeldautomatengebÃ¼hr berechnet?
content:
GeldautomatengebÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen aus verschiedenen GrÃ¼nden anfallen:
FÃ¼r jede Auszahlung, die Ã¼ber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine GebÃ¼hr von 2 â‚¬. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur VerfÃ¼gung hast.
Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen GebÃ¼hren. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir kÃ¶nnen sie weder ablehnen noch rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. Sollten zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren.
Abhebungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen kÃ¶nnen gebÃ¼hrenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Konto fÃ¤llt eine GebÃ¼hr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese GebÃ¼hr entfÃ¤llt fÃ¼r N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Mitglieder.
Nutzung deiner Maestrocard fÃ¼r Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier fÃ¤llt sowohl fÃ¼r nationale als auch fÃ¼r internationale Abhebungen eine GebÃ¼hr von 2 â‚¬ an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, Ã–sterreich und den Niederlanden erhÃ¤ltlich.
Um gebÃ¼hrenfreie Automaten in deiner NÃ¤he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du dieÂ Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche(neuen Tab)Â verwenden. WÃ¤hle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen â€œkeine NutzungsgebÃ¼hrâ€ aus.
Eine Ãœbersicht unserer Angebote und GebÃ¼hren findest du auf unsererÂ (neuen Tab)Website(neuen Tab).

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
YourÂ N26 Metal(new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account and select N26 Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:
A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)
Your account and contract information, including your N26 Metal ID
The option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergency
For emergencies, please have the following information ready:
The full address and telephone number of your current location
Names of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)
An exact description of the situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: Quali sono i vantaggi di N26 You?
content:
Effettua unÂ Upgrade a N26 YouÂ e riceverai 10Â SpacesÂ aggiuntivi e la possibilitÃ  di scegliere tra uno dei nostri cinque nuovi colori: Rabarbaro, Oceano, Sabbia, Acquamarina, Antracite.

Auto, bicicletta e scooter sharing. Copertura per eventuali danni o furti di veicoli noleggiati da societÃ  che condividono la corsa.
Carta aggiuntiva. Puoi ordinare una seconda Mastercard N26 You direttamente tramite la app N26 per un costo di â‚¬14, una tantum.
Tieni presente quanto segue se prendi in considerazioneÂ N26 You(nuova tabella):
La Mastercard N26 You non ha i numeri in rilievo: i dati della carta, incluso il numero, il codice CVV e il token a 10 cifre sono stampati sul retro.
Se passi a N26 You, il canone mensile di 9,90 â‚¬ verrÃ  detratto direttamente dal tuo conto N26 ogni mese a partire dalla data dell'upgrade. Se sei un nuovo cliente, il primo canone sarÃ  detratto 15 giorni dopo lâ€™accertamento dell'identitÃ . Da quel momento in poi, il canone mensile verrÃ  addebitato alla data di iscrizione. CiÃ² significa che, se hai aperto il tuo conto alla fine del mese, le prime due quote mensili verranno addebitate il mese successivo.
La durata minima dell'iscrizione Ã¨ un anno. Il contratto viene rinnovato automaticamente, salvoÂ annullamento dell'iscrizione(nuova tabella)Â almeno 4 settimane prima della scadenza.
Puoi ordinare una seconda Mastercard N26 You direttamente tramite la app N26 per un costo di â‚¬14, una tantum.

Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.

title: Apple Pay
content:
What is the difference between Apple Cash and Apple Pay?
Apple PayÂ® is an easy, secure, and private way to pay on iPhoneÂ®, iPadÂ®, Apple WatchÂ®, and MacÂ®.
When you set up Apple CashÂ®, you can send and receive money in the messages app or make purchases using Apple Pay.
Learn more here(new tab).

Can I add my N26 VisaÂ®debit card to Apple Pay?
Yes, you can add your N26 debit card to Apple Pay.

Can I add my N26 debit card to Apple Pay on more than one device?
Yes, you can add your N26 debit card to Apple Pay on multiple devices.Â  Please note that you need to add your N26 debit card to the Apple WalletÂ® for each device you want to use.

How do I add my N26 debit card to my iPhone?
Adding your N26 VisaÂ® debit card to Apple Pay is simple.Â  Hereâ€™s how to get started.
Open the Wallet app.
Tap the â€œ+â€ sign in the upper-right corner.
Enter your cardâ€™s security code to add your credit or debit cardÂ  affiliated with your iTunes account. Or, select â€œAdd a different card,â€ and use your iPhone camera to scan the card information.Â 

How do I add my N26 debit card to my iPad?
To add your N26 debit card to your iPad:
Â Go to Settings.
Tap â€œWallet & Apple Payâ€ and select â€œAdd Credit or Debit Card.â€
Enter your cardâ€™s security code to add your credit or debit card affiliated with your iTunes account. Or, select â€œAdd a different card,â€ and use your iPad camera to scan the card information.Â 

How do I add my N26 debit card to my Apple Watch?
To add your N26 debit card to your Apple Watch:Â 
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone.
Tap â€œWallet & Apple Payâ€ and select â€œAdd Credit or Debit Card.â€
Enter your cardâ€™s security code to add your credit or debit cardÂ  affiliated with your iTunes account. Or, select â€œAdd a different card,â€ and use your iPhone camera to scan the card information.Â 

How can I add my N26 debit card to my Mac?
To add your N26 debit card to your Mac:Â 
Make sure that the Mac that you are using is:
A model with Touch ID, orÂ 
Go to System Preferences
Click Wallet & Apple Pay
Click Add Card
Follow the steps to add a new card.
Tap Next.Â Â Your account will now be verified.
Once verification is completed, tap Next.
Set your N26 debit card as your default card by touching and dragging it to the front of the stack.
You can now start usingÂ your N26 debit card in Apple Pay
A Mac model introduced in 2012 or later with an Apple Pay-enabled iPhone or Apple Watch, where you can complete your purchase using Apple Pay on these devices.Â 
With these, you will have to go to your iPhone
Tap on Settings
Tap on Wallet & Apple Pay
Turn on Allow Payments on Mac.

How do I set up my N26 debit card as the default card in my Apple Wallet?
Setting your N26 debit card as the default card in your Apple Wallet is fairly simple.Â Â The first card you add to Wallet becomes your default card for payments.
To set a different card (in this case, your N26 card) all you have to do isÂ move it to the front of the stack.Â 
In Wallet, choose your default card.
Touch and hold the card.
Drag it to the front of the stack.

I'm unable to link my N26 debit card to Apple Pay, what am I doing wrong?
If you are experiencing a problem linking the N26 debit card to Apple Pay complete the following steps:
Check if Apple Pay is available on your device, or
You may have exceeded the maximum number of cards that can be registered with Apple Pay.
If your device is compatible with Apple Pay and you have not exceeded the maximum number of cards that can be registered with Apple Pay, then you should contact Apple Support.(new tab)

How do I use Apple Pay?
Payment in stores. 
The merchant needs to have contactless / Apple Pay as a payment option.
Rest your finger on Touch ID button or double tap the side button for Face ID.
Hold your iPhone to the contactless reader.
Online payments.
Choose Apple PayÂ as a payment option on the online store.
Rest your finger on Touch ID button or double tap the side button for Face ID.
Confirm your payment (a pop-up will ask you to do so).

My debit card is suspended, according to an error message from Apple Wallet, what do I do now?
It is most likely because your card was inadvertently deactivated.Â  To reverse this, simply:Â 
Launch the N26 app. 
Tap Actions (on the lower right hand of the screen). 
Tap Card Settings. 
Tap Unlock card (under the Card image on the top half of the screen).

How do I set up my N26 debit card as the default card in my Apple Wallet?
Setting your N26 debit card as the default card in your Apple Wallet is fairly simple.
The first card you add to Wallet becomes your default card for payments.Â  To set a different card (in this case, your N26 card) all you have to do is move it to the front of the stack.
In Wallet, choose your default card. 
Touch and hold the card. 
Drag it to the front of the stack.
Can I transfer money from Apple CashÂ® to my N26 account?
Yes, you can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 VisaÂ® debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps:
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Come impostare il PIN della carta?
content:
Non ti manderemo un PIN per posta: puoi impostare il PIN per la carta Mastercard o MaestroÂ dopo aver collegato correttamente il tuo smartphone al conto e averÂ attivatoÂ la carta/e. Per impostare o modificare il PIN della carta:
Vai a Gestisci.
Seleziona Impostazioni della carta per scegliere una carta.
Seleziona Reimposta.
Inserisci il numero a 10 cifre sulla tua carta.
Scegli il nuovo PIN e confermalo.
Ricordati che:
Per motivi di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN contenenti parti della tua data di nascita, dell'indirizzo o combinazioni di cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non viene accettato, riprova con una combinazione diversa.
Se vivi in Francia, Spagna, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia o Estonia devi effettuare il tuo primo pagamento utilizzando Chip e PIN prima di poter utilizzare la tua carta altrove. Puoi anche  fare un prelievo o una richiesta di saldo attuale presso un ATM.
Se si digita un PIN errato per tre volte consecutive, la carta viene automaticamente bloccata per motivi di sicurezza. In tal caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat per farla sbloccare.
Il PIN della carta Ã¨ distinto dal PIN di conferma, ma puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) orÂ N26 Metal(new tab)Â contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membershipâ€™s renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you wonâ€™t be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. Weâ€™ll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
Weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: Come attivare la carta?
content:
Se stai attendendo la consegna della tua carta N26,Â  puoi usufruire della possibilitÃ  di attivarne la versione digitale ed aggiungerla al tuo Google Wallet o Apple Wallet. Questa opzione Ã¨ disponibile per 30 giorni a partire dal momento in cui la carta Ã¨ stata ordinata.Â 
In questo lasso di tempo riceverai la carta fisica e dovrai attivarla tramite lâ€™app di N26. Lâ€™attivazione della carta fisica ti permetterÃ  di continuare ad usare la tua carta N26 nel tuo portafoglio digitale e di usufruire di tutte le altre funzionalitÃ  della carta. Una volta ricevuta, potrai attivare la tua nuova carta dalla versione mobile oppure web(nuova tabella) dell'app N26.
In entrambi i casi, visualizzerai l'opzione per attivare la carta direttamente nella schermata principale dopo aver eseguito l'accesso al conto.  
In alternativa:
dalla schermata principale della versione mobile dell'app seleziona Gestisci > Carta > Impostazioni carta
dalla schermata principale della webapp seleziona Il mio conto > carte
Ricorda che:
Per attivare la carta ti verrÃ  richiesto di digitare il token di 10 cifre presente sulla carta sotto il tuo nome (oppure sul retro per le carte N26 You, N26 Metal e Maestro). Ti chiederemo questo numero ogni qualvolta ci contatterai per accertarci della tua identitÃ .
Se hai piÃ¹ carte (ad esempio, se hai ordinato la carta piÃ¹ di una volta o la consegna Ã¨ avvenuta in ritardo), puoi attivare solo lâ€™ultima carta emessa. Tutte le altre carte saranno disattivate. 
Dovrai eseguire questi passaggi per lâ€™attivazione ogni volta che riordini una carta,  nel caso in cui tu abbia perso la tua, ti sia stata rubata, si sia rotta oppure effettui un upgrade del conto.
Dopo aver attivato la carta, il passo successivo Ã¨Â scegliere il PIN(nuova tabella).
Se vivi in Francia, Spagna, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia, Estonia o Regno Unito dovrai effettuare un prelievo da sportello ATM prima di poter utilizzare la tua carta altrove.

Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial(nuova tabella) sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube.(nuova tabella)

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:
Upgrade to N26 MetalÂ and youâ€™ll receive 10 additionalÂ Spaces, dedicated Customer Support, access to exclusive partner offerings(new tab), as well as the N26 MetalÂ insurance package, provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which covers a broad range of personal and financial benefits:
Travel insurance. Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 4 hours, and medical repatriation expenses**.

Purchase protection. Reimbursement or repair costs for stolen or damaged qualifying items purchased with an N26 Metal Mastercard or N26 Metal account if the theft or accident is an insured event in your home country or abroad**.

Access to LoungeKey airport lounges.
Keep these in mind when consideringÂ N26 Metal(new tab):
N26 Metal features an NFC-enabled Mastercard with a metal card in your choice of charcoal black, quartz rose, or slate grey.

If you upgrade to N26 Metal, the monthly fee of Â£14.90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month. If youâ€™re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.

Access to LoungeKey provides entry to over 1,000 airport lounges across the world. Access as part of Metal membership can include food, shopping and spa benefits. Entrance costs Â£20 per visit.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.

title: Wie lange dauern Ãœberweisungen?
content:
Alle eingehenden nationalen und internationalen SEPA-Ãœberweisungen werden in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen getÃ¤tigt werden. EchtzeitÃ¼berwiesungen unterliegen geltenden Bankregularien, wodurch ggf. VerzÃ¶gerungen auftreten kÃ¶nnen.
Falls die auftraggebende Bank keine EchtzeitÃ¼berweisungen unterstÃ¼tzt oder nicht diese Form der Ãœberweisung gewÃ¤hlt hat, dauert die Ãœberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag, also bis zu zwei Werktage. Bitte beachte, dass eingehende Ãœberweisungen regulÃ¤r einen Bankarbeitstag benÃ¶tigen.
Wenn du also eine Ãœberweisung kurz vor dem Wochenende oder einem Bankfeiertag tÃ¤tigst, dauert es etwas lÃ¤nger, bis der Betrag dem ZahlungsempfÃ¤nger gutgeschrieben wird. Wir wickeln unsere SEPA-Ãœberweisungen Ã¼ber das europÃ¤ische Zahlungsverkehrssystem TARGET2(neuen Tab) ab, welches Zahlungen an Werktagen von 7:00 bis 18:00 CET verarbeitet. Abgesehen von Wochenenden arbeitet TARGET2 auch an folgenden Feiertagen nicht: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. und 26. Dezember (Weihnachtsfeiertage).
Mit MoneyBeam kannst du Geld an andere N26-Nutzer in Echtzeit Ã¼berweisen. Bei Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen Ã¼ber TransferWise variiert die Dauer (du bekommst aber eine geschÃ¤tztes Geldeingangsdatum angezeigt, wenn du die Ãœberweisung tÃ¤tigst).
Jede Ãœberweisung musst du noch einmal Ã¼ber eine Push-Nachricht in deiner App bestÃ¤tigen, bevor wir sie freigeben.
Bitte beachte: Wir akzeptieren nur Euro-Ãœberweisungen innerhalb des SEPA-Raums (also keine SWIFT-Ãœberweisungen).
Wenn deine eingehende Ãœberweisung auÃŸerhalb dieses Zeitrahmens liegt, kontaktiere bitte den Zahlungssender bzw. dessen Bank fÃ¼r einen Nachforschungsauftrag. Wir kÃ¶nnen eingehende Ãœberweisungen nicht Ã¼berprÃ¼fen. Wir haben aber einige GrÃ¼nde gesammelt, weshalb deine SEPA-Ãœberweisung oder Ãœberweisung in einer FremdwÃ¤hrung fehlgeschlagen sein kÃ¶nnte.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We donâ€™t send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro cardÂ once youâ€™ve successfully connected your smartphone to your account andÂ activatedÂ your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we donâ€™t accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number youâ€™ve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
content:
Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du Prozesse hinter deinem Konto sehen kannst, die du sonst nicht sehen wÃ¼rdest. Es gibt zwei Haupttransaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem GeschÃ¤ft oder im Internet stattfinden:
Autorisierungen. Ein Betrag, der von einem EinzelhÃ¤ndler oder VerkÃ¤ufer blockiert oder reserviert wurde. Dies kann alles von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschlieÃŸlich Kautionen) sein.
Buchungen. Der tatsÃ¤chliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endgÃ¼ltig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zurÃ¼ckerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zurÃ¼ckgegeben.
Sobald eine Autorisierung bestÃ¤tigt wurde, kÃ¶nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder rÃ¼ckgÃ¤ngig machen. An diesem Punkt kÃ¶nnenÂ mit deiner AutorisierungÂ ein paar Dinge passieren:Â Sie wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verfÃ¤lltÂ (und kehrt nach spÃ¤testens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ck). Nicht vergessen:
Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endgÃ¼ltige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung wÃ¤hrend des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Letztlich erlischt diese Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen nicht passiert ist, kÃ¶nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zurÃ¼ckzubekommen.
Verifizierungsautorisierungen (in der Regel sehr kleine BetrÃ¤ge) werden verwendet, um zu prÃ¼fen, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. beim Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ckÃ¼berwiesen.
Die HÃ¶he einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen GrÃ¼nden von der endgÃ¼ltigen Vorlage abweichen.

title: PSD2 - AutenticaciÃ³n Reforzada de Clientes
content:
SCA actÃºa como capa de seguridad adicional para los clientes de N26, ya que proporciona dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n. Esta autenticaciÃ³n se basa en el uso de dos o mÃ¡s elemento de seguridad. Probablemente estÃ¡s familiarizado con el inicio de sesiÃ³n utilizando tu contraseÃ±a, pero con los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n, vas a necesitar la confirmaciÃ³n desde el dispositivo vinculado o un cÃ³digo por SMS. 
Cuando inicies sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibirÃ¡s un notificaciÃ³n emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un cÃ³digo SMS a tu nÃºmero registrado. Esto asegurarÃ¡ que solo tÃº puedes entrar en tu cuenta. 
Cuando inicies sesiÃ³n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n ya estÃ¡n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.
SCA se introduce como parte de la Directiva de Servicios de Pagos Europeos al que los bancos europeos deben acogerse. El objetivo de PSD2 es aumentar la seguridad de nuestros clientes, sus cuentas e informaciÃ³n. Puedes leer mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n acerca de esto en nuestro artÃ­culo sobre PSD2. 
No puedo iniciar sesiÃ³n en mi cuenta. Â¿CÃ³mo lo puedo resolver?
Si no puedes iniciar sesiÃ³n en la cuenta, pero aÃºn tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contraseÃ±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, contactanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte. 
Ya no tengo acceso a mi dispositivo vinculado. Â¿CÃ³mo puedo iniciar sesiÃ³n en mi cuenta?
Si has perdido el acceso a tu dispositivo vinculado pero tienes acceso a tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono registrado, inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de N26 y solicita un cÃ³digo de vinculaciÃ³n. Para ello haz lo siguiente:
Inicia sesiÃ³n en la  WebApp
Cuando vayas a confirmar el acceso en tu dispositivo vinculado selecciona ''Ayuda''. 
Selecciona ''Enviar SMS''.
Cuando hayas recibido el cÃ³digo por SMS, introdÃºcelo en la WebApp. 
Cuando confirmes el cÃ³digo ya tendrÃ¡s los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n automÃ¡ticamente y podrÃ¡s vincular tu nuevo dispositivo con la cuenta. 
Si no tienes acceso a tu telÃ©fono registrado (bien por tienes un nuevo nÃºmero o porque has perdido el telÃ©fono), contÃ¡ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.
Â¿QuÃ© pasa si dispositivo no es compatible con la nueva versiÃ³n?
Si tienes un smartphone mÃ¡s antiguo que no es compatible con la nueva versiÃ³n de la app, no podrÃ¡s acceder a la app N26 desde ese dispositivo.
Puedes seguir utilizando tu Mastercard como hasta ahora y acceder a tu cuenta iniciando sesiÃ³n desde la Web App N26, para ello tienes que confirmar el inicio de sesiÃ³n con el SMS de verificaciÃ³n que enviaremos a tu dispositivo vinculado. Lo enviaremos al nÃºmero de telÃ©fono que tengas en la secciÃ³n Mi Cuenta de tu app. Ten en cuenta que no podrÃ¡s hacer transferencias ni otras operaciones desde el navegador si no confirmas desde el dispositivo vinculado.

content:
Wenn du eine Ãœberweisung mit TransferWise machst, wird dir ein geschÃ¤tztes Eingangsdatum angezeigt.
Falls eine TransferWise-Ãœberweisung fehlschlÃ¤gt, benachrichtigen wir dich mit einer Push-Mitteilung. Der Betrag wird einige Tage spÃ¤ter automatisch auf dein Konto zurÃ¼ckgebucht.

content:

title: Come aprire un conto N26?
content:
Puoi aprire un conto N26 nell'app (sul tuo smartphone) o nella WebApp(nuova tabella) se:
hai almeno 18 anni
sei residente in un paese supportato
possiedi uno smartphone compatibile
possiedi un documento supportato (l'ammissibilitÃ  varia se vivi in Germania(nuova tabella) o al di fuori della Germania(nuova tabella))
non sei giÃ  titolare di un conto N26
sei in grado di verificare la tua identitÃ  in una delle seguenti lingue: inglese, tedesco, spagnolo, italiano o francese.
Ecco come funziona la procedura per l' apertura di un conto bancario N26:
Dopo aver confermato il tuo indirizzo e-mail, i tuoi dettagli personali e l'indirizzo di spedizione, seleziona il tipo di conto desiderato. *Â 
Dimostra la tua identitÃ Â eÂ collega lo smartphoneÂ al tuo nuovo conto.Â 
Ricarica il conto(nuova tabella)Â tramite bonifico bancario oppure tramite CASH26 (disponibile solo in Austria, Germania o Italia). 
Dopo alcuni giorni, riceverai la tua N26 MastercardÂ per posta.
Per maggiori informazioni, ecco come puoi contattarci.
*Â Se soddisfi i nostriÂ criteri minimi di solvibilitÃ , puoi aprire un account N26. In caso contrario, potremmo offrirti unÂ conto N26 Flex (solo in Germania). La decisione viene calcolata attraverso un processo automatico.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico(nuova tabella).
La chat Ã¨ disponibile da lunedÃ¬ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: Â¿Debo declarar impuestos en Estados Unidos?
content:
Como banco con licencia legal, reportamos la informaciÃ³n fiscal de las cuentas en Estados Unidos directamente al Internal Revenue Service, de acuerdo con FATCA, que es una legislaciÃ³n diseÃ±ada por el departamento de tesorerÃ­a y el IRS de EE.UU. para incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas de EE.UU. utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.
Encuentra mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre FATCA (pestaÃ±a nueva)aquÃ­(pestaÃ±a nueva).Â 
Dentro del contexto de FATCA, una persona de EE.UU. se define, entre otras cosas, como: 
un ciudadano de los EE.UU. (incluidos los de doble nacionalidad)
un residente en los EE.UU., por ejemplo el poseedor de la Tarjeta Verde, o alguien que cumple con el â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (consulta que es a continuaciÃ³n).
Si no estÃ¡s seguro de si eres una persona de los EE.UU. puedes consultar a un asesor fiscal.
â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ significa:
Que has estado fÃ­sicamente en los EE.UU. 183 dÃ­as o mÃ¡s en el aÃ±o de calendario actual. 
Ã“
Que has estado fÃ­sicamente presente en los EE.UU. 183 dÃ­as o mÃ¡s en los tres Ãºltimos aÃ±os de calendario. Para calcularlo, se hace de la siguiente forma:

(31 dÃ­as o mÃ¡s en el aÃ±o de calendario actual) + (el nÃºmero de dÃ­as con presencia fÃ­sica en EE.UU. en el Ãºltimo aÃ±o) dividido entre 3 + ( el nÃºmero de dÃ­as con presencia fÃ­sica en EE.UU. en el penÃºltimo aÃ±o) dividido entre 6.
AdemÃ¡s, si tu cuenta muestra algunos de los siguientes puntos:
CiudadanÃ­a o residencia en EE.UU.
Lugar de nacimiento en EE.UU. 
DirecciÃ³n de residencia en EE.UU. 
NÃºmero de telÃ©fono de EE.UU.
Ordenes de transferencias o pagos permanentes a direcciones de EE.UU.
Si se cumplen esos requisitos, estamos obligados a tratarte como una persona de los Estados Unidos, a no ser que presentes lo siguiente:
El formulario W-8BEN o un documento similar y
Un pasaporte de otro paÃ­s que no sea EE.UU. u otro documento certificado por otro gobierno que muestre que tu nacionalidad es otra.
Si has nacido en EE.UU., un documento que certifique la perdida de tu nacionalidad estadounidense.

title: How do I get cash?
content:
You can get cash at any convenient ATM, but you may have to pay a fee to do so. We have partnered with the Allpoint ATM Network to provide you with unlimitedÂ freeÂ ATM withdrawals at over 55,000 locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
With access to an expansive retail network including Target, Walgreens, CVS, Speedway, and Kroger, you'll never need to pay to withdraw cash again! 
You can quickly and easily locate Allpoint ATMs via the ATM Map feature in our mobile application for iOS and Android. Find more information about this convenient feature here! 
Not on your smartphone? You can also find nearby Allpoint ATMs via the AllpointÂ web application(new tab).
Can't find a convenient Allpoint ATM near you? No problem. Enjoy 2 free ATM withdrawals per month from any network, anytime, anywhere in the US.Â 
(NOTE: At this time, N26Â customersÂ can only use ATMs to withdraw cash, not to make deposits. Check back here for updates.)
Related Topics
All About Allpoint


The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Devo dichiarare il mio conto N26?
content:
N26 Ã¨ una banca tedesca che a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 opera in Italia attraverso una succursale italiana al fine di offrire ai propri clienti un conto corrente con IBAN italiano.
Di conseguenza, se hai aperto un conto con noi dopo il 26 marzo 2020 e risiedi in Italia, il tuo conto N26 Ã¨ a tutti gli effetti un conto corrente italiano e non devi effettuare dichiarazioni particolari.Â 
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:
con una giacenza media sul conto pari o superiore a 5.000 â‚¬, sarai soggetto allâ€™ordinaria imposta di bollo sugli estratti conto. In tal caso provvederemo ad addebitarla automaticamente nella misura prevista dalla legge e fatte salve eventuali promozioni che prevedono lâ€™imposta di bollo sugli estratti conto a nostro carico.Â 
se mantieni un saldo fino a 100.000 â‚¬, il tuo conto rimane protetto dal Fondo tedesco di tutela dei depositi.Â 
Se hai aperto un conto con noi prima del 26 marzo 2020 con indirizzo di residenza in Italia, il tuo conto Ã¨ considerato un conto estero. Lâ€™apertura di un conto allâ€™estero Ã¨ unâ€™operazione legale e consentita: dovrai semplicemente rispettare la normativa del paese di residenza e del paese in cui il conto viene aperto.
Per quanto riguarda le persone fisiche residenti in Italia, i conti esteri con una giacenza media annua superiore a â‚¬5.000 devono essere dichiarati al Fisco italiano. BisognerÃ  compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi e versare lâ€™Ivafe, unâ€™imposta di importo fisso pari a â‚¬34,20.Â 
Se il valore massimo sul conto, invece, supera i â‚¬15.000 anche per un solo giorno nel corso dellâ€™anno, oltre a versare lâ€™Ivafe, bisognerÃ  compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi ai fini del monitoraggio fiscale cosÃ¬ come previsto dalla legge n.186/2014.Â 
Per informazioni piÃ¹ dettagliate e personalizzate ti suggeriamo di consultare un esperto in materia fiscale.
Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le autoritÃ  fiscali italiane hanno la possibilitÃ  di individuare conti correnti esteri non dichiarati e di ricondurre le relative operazioni al titolare (Direttiva 2011/16/UE).

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called â€œLookalike-Audiencesâ€ are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.Â 
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called â€œhashingâ€ is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: Come posso creare Regole per i miei Spaces?
content:
Nellâ€™ambito dei tuoi Spaces puoi decidere le tue Regole: puoi preimpostare trasferimenti periodici verso i tuoi Spaces e risparmiare tempo e denaro in modo molto semplice.
Se vuoi impostare una Regola dalla webapp, effettua un bonifico con Spaces e poi seleziona â€œRipeti questa operazioneâ€. Per cancellare una regola, clicca sui 3 puntini indicanti le impostazioni. Da lÃ¬, vedrai tutte le regole attive. Clicca sullâ€™icona del cestino per cancellare la regola. Se vuoi modificare una regola esistente, puoi semplicemente eliminarla dalle impostazioni dello Space in cui lâ€™hai creata e crearne una nuova.
Â Dai dispositivi Android effettua un bonifico e seleziona â€œRipeti questa operazioneâ€. In alternativa, dalla sezione Spaces, seleziona i tre puntini e poi â€œcrea regolaâ€. Da questo punto, segui i passaggi successivi fino a confermare le informazioni inserite.
Dai dispositivi iOS, entra nella sezione Spaces e seleziona â€œcrea regolaâ€. BasterÃ  inserire le informazioni richieste e confermare.
Â Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le regole per i tuoi Spaces ed eventuali ordini di bonifici verranno elaborati allo stesso orario (0100 UTC) se impostate per lo stesso giorno. Accertati di avere fondi sufficienti per coprire queste transazioni ed evitare che non vengano eseguite.Â 
Se non riesci a coprire lâ€™importo richiesto, basterÃ  impostare le transazioni in date differenti in base alle tue prioritÃ .

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you donâ€™t recognize a transaction or youâ€™re sure you didnâ€™t authorize it,Â blocking your cardÂ wonâ€™t be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also useÂ CASH26Â for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in theÂ final amount debitedÂ from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.
Take your signed form and the attached PostIdent coupon to your nearest branch of Deutsche Post to prove your identity.
Once weâ€™ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, weâ€™ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).
Send your signed contract to us at KlosterstraÃŸe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Once weâ€™ve received your contract, weâ€™ll open your account within 10 business days.
Youâ€™ll then receive a notification about your card delivery and accessing your account.

title: FATCA - La razÃ³n por la que pedimos cierta informaciÃ³n a nuestros clientes
content:
N26, al igual que toda instituciÃ³n financiera, estÃ¡ obligado a informar al Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos y a su Servicio de Impuestos Internos (IRS, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) de cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de quienes denominan Â«personas estadounidensesÂ», que vienen a ser tanto los ciudadanos de dicha nacionalidad como los residentes fiscales en EE.UU.
FATCA es el acrÃ³nimo de Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, o Ley de cumplimiento tributario de las cuentas extranjeras, una normativa que lucha contra el fraude fiscal. 
Introducido por el IRS, el propÃ³sito de FATCA es incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas estadounidenses utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.
Encuentra mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre FATCA en la web del IRS(pestaÃ±a nueva).
EE.UU. cuenta con un sistema de impuestos que incluye tambiÃ©n a ciudadanos que no son residentes en EE.UU., a diferencia de la mayorÃ­a de los paÃ­ses del mundo que solo cobran impuestos a los ciudadanos residentes, pero no a los ciudadanos que viven y trabajan en el extranjero.Â 
Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:
Â¿Eres un ciudadano o posees la Carta Verde de Estados Unidos?
Â¿EstÃ¡s sujeto a pagar impuestos en Estados Unidos?Â 
Estar â€˜â€™sujeto a pagar impuestosâ€™â€™ en EE.UU. no significa necesariamente que tengas que pagar impuestos allÃ­. Significa que segÃºn de EE.UU. tienes que rellenar un formulario y declarar tus impuestos internacionales al IRS, incluso si no tienes que pagar los impuestos en EE.UU.Â 
 3. Si la respuesta es sÃ­, Â¿CuÃ¡l es tu nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal en Estados Unidos?
Este nÃºmero(pestaÃ±a nueva) puede ser tanto tu nÃºmero de la Seguridad Social en EE.UU. (SSN) o tu NÃºmero Individual de IdentificaciÃ³n Fiscal (ITIN).Â 
AdemÃ¡s, si tu cuenta muestra EE.UU. como lugar de nacimiento, un nÃºmero de telÃ©fono de EE.UU. o estableces una transferencia programada a EE.UU., tenemos que asumir, de acuerdo con la legislaciÃ³n FATCA, que estÃ¡s sujeto a esta normativa, a no ser que nos confirmes de forma especÃ­fica lo contrario.Â 
En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaciÃ³n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesiÃ³n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > ConfiguraciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaciÃ³n.Â Â

title: How do I activate my debit card?
content:
Please keep in mind that:
You need to physically have your debit card in order to activate it. Youâ€™ll need your 10-digit token number for this: itâ€™s found below your name on the front of your debit card. Weâ€™ll ask you for this number every time you contact us to prove itâ€™s really you.
If you have multiple debit cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent debit card. All other debit cards will be disabled. This is because you can only have one card per account.
Youâ€™ll need to follow the activation steps below every time you activate a new or replacement debit card.
Activate your debit card through the mobile app:
Log into your account.  
Then go to:  "Actions"â†’"Card Settings"â†’"Activate".
You will need to enter your token number (below your name). 
Activate your card through the web app:
Log into your account.  The option to activate the debit card will be seen as a banner on the home page.  
You will need to enter your token number (below your name).
After youâ€™ve activated your debit card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. title: Direct Deposit
content:
If you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, you have options:

title: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
content:
Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App zu nutzen, wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.
Hier erfÃ¤hrst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. 
Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Kontaktliste wird von N26 nicht dauerhaft gespeichert und nur fÃ¼r Nutzung der entsprechenden Funktionen verwendet.
Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter ðŸ‘¤ Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein HÃ¤kchen setzen bei "Allow my contacts who are also N26 users to find me easily for transfers".

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
Your card will be sent via USPS and delivery can take up to 5-7 business days. Your card is immediately produced and processed for shipment once you have successfully completed the N26 account sign-up process. If you need to change your address after you have finished the account sign-up process, you will need to order a new card. Our customer support team is available via chat or phone and to assist you with this.
If you need to replace your card for any reason except for card expiration, you can do so through our app or by contacting our customer support team via chat or phone.Â 
Once ordered, your card will be sent via USPS and delivery can take up to 5-7 business days.
Tips for successful delivery:
Make sure to enter a residential address (we do not send cards to business addresses, P.O. boxes, or US territories).
Do not include any spaces when entering the zipcode for your delivery address.
Make sure you include important delivery information (for example, your apartment number, the name on your mailbox).
If you are staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How do I add money to my N26 account?
content:
We make it easy to fund your N26 account. You can add money via several methods, including direct deposit, transfer from external bank, external bank account to N26 (ACH transfer) debit card transfer (non funded accounts only), and MoneyBeam, to name a few. Please look below for more information. 
Direct Deposit:  If you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, simply provide the sender (your employer, financial institution, Armed Forces, Social Security, etc.) with our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal N26 account number.Â 
You can locate your account number by clicking on the â€œMy Accountâ€ option on the top right side of the website (and the mobile application) after logging into your N26 account.
In case your employer needs a direct deposit form, please click here(new tab).Â 

Transfer from external bank:  Transfer money from your external bank into your N26 account, conveniently, from within the N26 mobile application.
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transaction List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.

External Bank Account to N26 (ACH transfer):  Transfer funds directly from your primary bank account into your N26 account with an ACH Transfer.
Log into your financial institution's online banking platform or mobile app (if applicable).
Locate the â€œExternal Transfersâ€ or â€œTransfer Moneyâ€ or â€œExternal Accountâ€ or similar option and add your N26 checking account as a new account.
The bank account originating the transfer does not have to be under your name. However, please make sure that the recipientâ€™s name is your full name as entered during the account sign-up process.
Input our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal checking account number.
You can locate your account number by clicking on the â€œMy Accountâ€ option on the top right side of the website or by clicking the icon in the mobile app, after logging into your N26 account.
Your financial institution may make a small test deposit(s) into your N26 account, within a few days, to verify your account. Typically, to complete the process, you may have to confirm the test deposit(s) with the originating financial institution.
Upon completing the initial process, you should be able to transfer funds in or out of your N26 account using the third party banks fund transfer feature.
Â Note:Â 
Please be advised that these are general guidelines and your financial institutionâ€™s requirements may differ.
Some banks may experience issues processing money transfers to the routing number 122287675. At this time, ACH bank transfers from Capital One and from USAA are not available to fund your N26 account. If you encounter this issue, please use another bank account to transfer money into your N26 account.

Debit card transfer (Non Funded Accounts Only):  Use a debit card to instantly fund your account right from the app. This is the fastest and simplest way to add money to your N26 account with a free, one-time transaction. Just log into the iOS or Android app and follow the instructions on the main screen.
This option is available to customers who have not previously funded their N26 account. 
Find additional details in this document(new tab). 

MoneyBeam:  Instantly send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members. Find additional details in our "What is MoneyBeam?(new tab)" article. 

Third party payment processors
Put money into your account using these services:
Cash App(new tab)
PayPal(new tab)
Venmo(new tab)
ZelleÂ®(new tab)
Ingo Money(new tab) (mobile check cashing service)
Apple CashÂ®:  You can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 VisaÂ® debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps"
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

content:

Letâ€™s get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro canâ€™t be used for online purchases and itâ€™s not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).
But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. EachÂ ATM transactionÂ using your Maestro is â‚¬2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals).

title: Comment fonctionne 3D Secure ?
content:
3D Secure est une technologie de sÃ©curisation des paiements en ligne visant Ã  limiter lâ€™utilisation frauduleuse des cartes bancaires sur internet. Tous les e-commerÃ§ants qui utilisent cette technologie affichent le logo Â« Mastercard SecureCode Â» sur leurs sites.
Lorsque vous faites un paiement en ligne, depuis votre tÃ©lÃ©phone, une tablette ou un ordinateur, vous avez 5 minutes pour confirmer la transaction en cliquant sur laÂ notificationÂ que vous recevez sur votre tÃ©lÃ©phone.
Si vous ne confirmez pas immÃ©diatement cette transaction, vous pouvez Ã©galement la retrouver dans la liste de vos transactions. Elle apparaÃ®tra en attente sur votre application. Une petit cloche vous indique que vous devez la confirmer. Vous pourrez alors appuyer sur cette transaction et la valider.
Si vous ne voyez pas cette transaction dans votre liste, vous pouvez consulter lâ€™article relatif aux raisons pour lesquellesÂ un paiement en ligne peut Ã©chouer.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous Ã  vos amis ? Recevez 15 â‚¬ Ã  chaque fois que lâ€™un dâ€™entre eux nous rejoint. DÃ©couvrez notreÂ programme de parrainage.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
Youâ€™ll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if youÂ reorder a card. Youâ€™ll then receive a tracking link by email. If youâ€™re not home during the delivery and your mailbox canâ€™t be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, itâ€™ll be returned to us. Weâ€™ll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. Itâ€™s currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
Itâ€™s not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once itâ€™s been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasnâ€™t arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you canâ€™t be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of â‚¬6 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express shipping (which includes the â‚¬6 card replacement fee).

title: PerchÃ© ho un addebito doppio?
content:
Nel momento in cui effettui pagamenti con carta avvengono due principali tipologie di transazioni:
La pre-autorizzazione, cheÂ Ã¨ una transazione che prevede il blocco di un certo importo da parte di un venditore di prodotti o servizi per verificare la validitÃ  della carta o la presenza di fondi sul conto dei clienti. Le pre-autorizzazioni sono molto frequenti per confermare prenotazioni alberghiere oppure il noleggio di auto.
L'addebito, che Ã¨ la transazione con la quale l'importo viene effettivamente detratto dal conto. 
Nel momento in cui viene effettuata una pre-autorizzazione, questa puÃ² diventare un addebito sul conto, puÃ² essere respinta oppure scadere. Nell'ultimo caso, l'importo ritorna automaticamente sul tuo conto entro i successivi 12 giorni. Gli importi preautorizzati nel caso di noleggio auto possono richiedere fino a 30 giorni prima di essere nuovamente disponibili sul conto. 
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:
Talvolta sul conto appaiono sia l'autorizzazione che l'addebito. Questo accade, ad esempio, nel caso di pagamento offline, quindi non in tempo reale, oppure a causa di problemi tecnici al terminale di pagamento. Anche in questi casi, l'autorizzazione scadrÃ  nei tempi indicati. Nel caso non dovesse succedere, contattaci via chat e ti aiuteremo a recuperare i tuoi soldi.
L'importo della pre-autorizzazione puÃ² essere diverso da quello dell'addebito finale del conto per vari motivi.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 150â‚¬. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we donâ€™t support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20â‚¬ and 150â‚¬. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we donâ€™t support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. Youâ€™ll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as itâ€™s written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipientâ€™s name is your name as itâ€™s written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account â€“ we donâ€™t accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesnâ€™t have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking

Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (â€œPSD2â€) ist eine Ã¼berarbeitete europÃ¤ische Richtlinie und ermÃ¶glicht dir, Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen Ã¼ber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzufÃ¼hren.

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content:
We offer repayment plans if you canâ€™t repay yourÂ overdraftÂ or loan withÂ N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.
Hereâ€™s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how youâ€™re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We donâ€™t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.
We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. Itâ€™s then up to you to confirm it.
By the way: your account will be closed if itâ€™s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

UnÂ virement SEPAÂ peut prendre plus dâ€™un jour ouvrÃ© pour arriver sur le compte du destinataire. title: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
content:
Wenn du uns erreichen mÃ¶chtest, kannst du einen Chat in deiner App, WebApp oder unter einige Support Center-Artikel starten. Da wir eine Online-Bank sind, haben wir keine Filialen.
Vergewissere dich zunÃ¤chst,Â dass du die neueste App-Version installiert hast. Falls nicht, lade dir das Update imÂ Apple App Store(neuen Tab)Â oderÂ Google Play Store(neuen Tab)Â herunter.

title: Come funziona N26 Business You?
content:
