title: N26 puÃ² chiudere il mio account?
content:
In breve: sÃ¬.
Possiamo chiudere il tuo conto in 3 modi (con 2 mesi di preavviso, 14 giorni di preavviso o immediatamente). Queste cancellazioni sono definitive: la nostra assistenza clienti non puÃ² fornire alcun tipo di informazione riguardo le singole decisioni di cancellazione account e non puÃ² influenzare la decisione. Anche tu puoi cancellare la tua relazione con noi in ogni momento, immediatamente, senza alcuna motivazione. Ogni tassa rimanente dovrÃ  essere pagata prima della cessazione del rapporto.
2 mesi di preavviso
Abbiamo il diritto di terminare qualsiasi relazione commerciale con 2 mesi di preavviso, senza una causa precisa (guarda la sezione 12 paragrafo (1) dei nostriÂ T&Cs(nuova tabella)Â o Â§ 675h del Codice Civile Tedesco).
14 giorni di preavviso
Abbiamo il diritto di terminare qualsiasi relazione lavorativa con 14 giorni di preavviso (guarda la sezione 12 paragrafo (2) dei nostriÂ T&Cs(nuova tabella)) se viene data una causa ragionevole che riguarda una violazione dei doveri contrattuali. CiÃ² puÃ² includere:
Utilizzo di un conto personale per scopi commerciali.
Â 
Secondo i nostri T & C, un conto personale puÃ² essere utilizzato solo per uso privato. Qualsiasi trasferimento di credito relativo a compensi professionali per servizi forniti e / o prodotti venduti sono considerati transazioni commerciali. Se desideri utilizzare il tuo conto per questo scopo, registrati per un conto N26 Business or N26 Business You.Â 

Fornire informazioni errate o insufficienti per un controllo di routine.
Â 
Siamo una banca quindi a volte eseguiamo controlli sulle transazioni. Se non fornisci informazioni corrette e / o sufficienti sulla transazione in questione, abbiamo il diritto di interrompere il rapporto commerciale, per essere conforme alle normative finanziarie tedesche.

Visualizzazione di comportamenti abusivi nei confronti di dipendenti N26.
Â 
Non tolleriamo comportamenti offensivi nei confronti dei nostri dipendenti. La minaccia di danno fisico o di comportamento abusivo generale puÃ² essere considerata un reato secondo la legge tedesca e sarÃ  segnalata alla rispettiva autoritÃ  senza eccezioni.
Cancellazione immediata
Potremmo anche interrompere qualsiasi relazione commerciale su base straordinaria (vedi la sezione 12 paragrafo (2) dei nostriÂ T&Cs(nuova tabella)). CiÃ² significa: in qualsiasi momento, senza preavviso e senza un periodo di cancellazione in cui vi sia una causa ragionevole per tale decisione. Si include:
Fornire dichiarazioni errate a N26 sulla tua situazione finanziaria, soprattutto quando richiedi un credito
Non puoi ripagare il tuo prestito o qualsiasi debito verso N26
Non rispetti le richieste di N26 sul tuo prestito (vedi disposizione o aumento della sicurezza, sezione 13 (2) dei nostriÂ T&Cs(nuova tabella)).

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cerrar mi cuenta?
content:
Para cerrar tu cuenta, necesitamos que nos contactes por chat desde tu app N26 o que nos envÃ­es un email a support@n26.com desde tu direcciÃ³n de email registrada con la siguiente informaciÃ³n:
La declaraciÃ³n donde solicitas el cierre de tu cuenta en una fecha determinada o Â«lo antes posibleÂ».
Tu nombre.
Tu IBAN de N26.
Un IBAN diferente dentro de la zona SEPA (Euro) para transferir tu saldo restante en caso de que sea positivo o de que tengas fondos en Espacios que no has transferido a tu cuenta principal.
Tu consentimiento explÃ­cito para enviarte la confirmaciÃ³n del cierre de la cuenta a tu email registrado: Â«Doy mi consentimiento a N26 para que comparta conmigo mis datos personales por emailÂ». (Si no estÃ¡s de acuerdo, tendremos que enviarte la confirmaciÃ³n por correo postal, lo cual tardarÃ¡ mÃ¡s tiempo.)
Otra opciÃ³n es que nos envÃ­es elÂ formulario de cancelaciÃ³n(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â como archivo adjunto por email.
Cosas a tener en cuenta antes de cerrar tu cuenta:
Para que vaya mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido: si tienes saldo positivo, por favor, transfiere el saldo restante tÃº mismo. Si tienes saldo negativo, recarga la cuenta.
Todas las cuotas pendientes deberÃ¡n pagarse de inmediato. Esto incluye las tarifas del envÃ­o expressÂ o las mensualidades deÂ N26 You o N26 Metal.
Destruye tus tarjetas cortÃ¡ndolas por ejemplo con unas tijeras. Se debe cortar el chip, la antena NFC y la banda magnÃ©tica y despuÃ©s deshacerse de los trozos por separado.

title: All About Allpoint.
content:
We have partnered with the Allpoint ATM Network to provide you with unlimitedÂ freeÂ ATM withdrawals at over 55,000 locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
With access to an expansive retail network including Target, Walgreens, CVS, Speedway, and Kroger, you'll never need to pay to withdraw cash again! 
You can quickly and easily find Allpoint ATMs via the ATM Map feature in our mobile application for iOS and Android (see Related Topics below for more information).
Not on your smartphone? No problem, you can also find nearby Allpoint ATMs using theÂ web application(new tab).
Can't find a convenient Allpoint ATM near you? No problem. Enjoy 2 free ATM withdrawals per month from any network, anytime, anywhere in the US.Â 
(NOTE: At this time, N26Â customersÂ can only use ATMs to withdraw cash, not to make deposits. Check back here for updates.)
Related Topics
"Will there be an in-app Allpoint ATM locator?"
Yes! We are very excited to announce that we have an ATM Map
feature in our mobile application. This easy-to-use application will make
finding your nearest fee-free Allpoint ATM quick and convenient. Here's how to
use it:
1. On the home screen, tap on the "Actions" icon.
2. Tap on the "Find an ATM" button under the "ATM Map" menu.
3. If prompted, allow the application to access your location. Without access to your location, the application will not be able to show you the nearest ATMs.
4. Tapping on any of the nearby ATMs (indicated by green locator pins) will bring up more information about that ATM location, including the address. Tap on "Get Directions" and choose your favorite routing application to be given directions to the ATM location. 
5. Moving to another area of the map will bring up the "Search this area" button, which will allow you to see other nearby ATMs in the new location.
6. Tap on the information icon (the "i" in a circle at the top-right corner of the screen) to get more details about Allpoint ATMs, participating retail locations, and a reminder that you get two fee-free cash withdrawals per month from any out-of-network ATMs in the US. 
"Do ATM fees apply when withdrawing from an Allpoint ATM?"
Nope! ATM fees do not apply when withdrawing from an Allpoint ATM in the US, UK, Canada, Mexico, or Australia. Standard ATM fees apply when usedÂ in other countries, however.
"What will the transaction look like in the app?"
Allpoint ATM transactions will look the same as any other ATM transaction in the N26 mobile app or website.
"When I withdraw money from an Allpoint ATM, does a fee display on the ATM screen during the transaction?"Â 
Yes, a fee will display on the ATM screen. You should accept the fee, BUT the fee will not be charged to your N26 account!
"Is Allpoint available outside of the US?"Â 
Yes! There are over 55,000 AllpointÂ locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
"If I used an Allpoint ATM before Allpoint partnered with N26, will the ATM fees that I incurred be reimbursed?"
We regret that we cannot retroactively refund any ATM usage fees.
"Will the Allpoint transactions be included in the two free transactions per month?"
Nope! When an Allpoint ATM is accessed in the US, UK, Canada, Mexico, and Australia, you are not charged a fee. It is not counted as part of your two free ATM transactions per month!
"Can I check my balance at an Allpoint ATM?"
Yes! You can check your N26 account balance at an Allpoint ATM.
"Can I withdraw money from my Spaces account using an Allpoint ATM?"
Account withdrawals can only be made from your main N26 account. Spaces is a sub-account. If you want to withdraw money that you've set aside in Spaces, please move it into your main account first.
"Can I make a deposit to my N26 account at an Allpoint ATM?"
At this time, you can only withdraw cash from an Allpoint ATM. No cash or check deposits can be made.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Â¿CuÃ¡ndo llega mi tarjeta?
content:
Dependiendo del destino,Â el envÃ­o puede tardar hasta 10 dÃ­as laborables. El perÃ­odo de entrega varÃ­a en las islas de EspaÃ±a, Francia e Italia. Si el envÃ­o falla y nos devuelven la tarjeta, te lo comunicaremos por email.
Una vez que hasÂ verificado tu identidad, tu tarjeta se crearÃ¡ y se enviarÃ¡ inmediatamente. Por ello, antes de empezar es importante que te asegures de que tu direcciÃ³n estÃ¡ correctamente escrita. Si necesitas cambiar tu direcciÃ³n despuÃ©s de haber finalizado el proceso de verificaciÃ³n, entonces es necesarioÂ pedir una tarjeta nueva.
Si no has recibido tu tarjeta en 10 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles, estas son las opciones:
Mi direcciÃ³n no es correcta. ParaÂ cambiar la direcciÃ³n de envÃ­oÂ entra en elÂ ðŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta, seleccionaÂ ConfiguracionesÂ y despuÃ©sÂ ConfiguraciÃ³n personal. Actualiza tu informaciÃ³n y pide una tarjeta nueva, en caso de que ya hayas tenido una tarjeta activa anteriormente. Si esta es tu primera tarjeta, entonces contacta con nosotros por chat y te pediremos una nueva.
Han pasado mÃ¡s de 10 dÃ­as desde que verifiquÃ© mi identidad. Verifica la direcciÃ³n de envÃ­o. Si es correcta, por favor contÃ¡ctanos vÃ­a chat para que podamos pedirte una nueva tarjeta.
Necesito mi tarjeta de inmediato. Si el envÃ­o de tu tarjeta falla por segunda vez, o bien si necesitas utilizarla con urgencia, quizÃ¡ quieras plantearte pedir elÂ envÃ­o express.
Si tu direcciÃ³n contiene caracteres especiales, contÃ¡ctanos mediante el chat de la app.
Solo enviamos las tarjetas a direcciones residenciales (no se admiten direcciones comerciales).
En la direcciÃ³n de entrega, no utilices espacios cuando escribas el cÃ³digo postal.
AsegÃºrate de que no falta informaciÃ³n esencial (por ejemplo, el nombre en tu buzÃ³n si vives en Alemania o el nÃºmero de edificio, nÃºmero de escalera y cÃ³digo de la puerta, si corresponde). Si te vas a quedar temporalmente en algÃºn lugar (con un amigo o en un Airbnb), asegÃºrate de incluir el nombre en el buzÃ³n que pertenece al inquilino principal del departamento.
Si te vas a mudar a algÃºn lugar y esta es tu primera tarjeta, asegÃºrate de seleccionar el paÃ­s y la direcciÃ³n a donde te mudarÃ¡s y deseas recibir tu tarjeta N26.

title: Pourquoi mon virement bancaire est toujours en attente dans mon application N26 ?
content:
Pour procÃ©der Ã  des virements, utiliser les servicesÂ MoneyBeam,Â CASH26Â et effectuer des virements permanents, vous devez les confirmer avec votre Code de validation. Vos virements restent en attente jusquâ€™Ã  ce que vous les confirmiez ou annuliez depuis lâ€™application.
Votre Code de validation est nÃ©cessaire pour confirmer vos transactions, il nâ€™a donc pas la mÃªme fonction que le codeÂ PIN de votre carte(nouvel onglet). Vous choisissez votre Code de validation lors de la crÃ©ation de votre compte, et le code PIN de la carte lors de son activation.
Si vous entrez un Code de validation erronÃ© Ã  6 reprises, il sera bloquÃ© pour des raisons de sÃ©curitÃ©. Vous pouvez le restaurer en leÂ changeant(nouvel onglet)Â depuis votre application mobile en cliquant sur : ðŸ‘¤Mon compte > ParamÃ¨tres > SÃ©curitÃ© > Changer le Code de validation.

title: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich DauerauftrÃ¤ge?
content:
Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine Ãœberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.
Bevor du die Ãœberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein HÃ¤kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die Ãœberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. ZunÃ¤chst gibst du den EmpfÃ¤nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im nÃ¤chsten Schritt das HÃ¤kchen bei: â€œAls Dauerauftrag merken?â€. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall fÃ¼r deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.
So kannst du deine bestehenden DauerauftrÃ¤ge in der App sehen und verwalten:
Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).
Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte Ã¼ber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.
Ein blaues Fenster Ã¶ffnet sich, in dem du "DauerauftrÃ¤ge" auswÃ¤hlen kannst.
Hier kannst du deine DauerauftrÃ¤ge lÃ¶schen oder verÃ¤ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu lÃ¶schen, tippe auf den gewÃ¼nschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.
â„¹ï¸  Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgefÃ¼hrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszufÃ¼hren. Du kannst die Ãœberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der nÃ¤chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

title: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
content:
Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gemÃ¤ÃŸ FATCA verpflichtet, dem â€œInternal Revenue Serviceâ€ (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen gefÃ¼hrt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rige auslÃ¤ndische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden.Â 
Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier.(neuen Tab)
Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer StaatsangehÃ¶riger unter anderem so definiert:
StaatsangehÃ¶riger der USA (auch bei doppelter StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit)
Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer gÃ¼ltigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ erfÃ¼llt (siehe unten).
Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer StaatsangehÃ¶riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.
â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ bedeutet:
Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.
ODER
Du warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.
(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.

DarÃ¼ber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enthÃ¤lt:
US-amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USA
Geburtsort in den USA
Postanschrift oder Postfach in den USA
US-amerikanische Rufnummer
DauerauftrÃ¤ge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wird
FÃ¼r den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US StaatsangehÃ¶rigen anzusehen:
Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine Ã¤hnliche EigenerklÃ¤rung und
einen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder NationalitÃ¤t eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.
Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der BestÃ¤tigung Ã¼ber den Verlust deiner StaatsbÃ¼rgerschaft.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© no he recibido la recompensa de la invitaciÃ³n?
content:
Una vez que tu amigo haya cumplido con todos los requisitos de nuestro programaÂ Invita a un amigo, procesaremos tu recompensa. Puedes revisar el estado de tu recompensa siempre que quieras tanto en la app como en laÂ WebApp(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â al iniciar sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta.
En la mayorÃ­a de los casos, si no recibes la recompensa suele ser porque que tu amigo/a no ha realizado todavÃ­a una transacciÃ³n de mÃ­nimo 15 â‚¬ con su Mastercard. AsegÃºrate de informar a tu amigo/a acerca de estos requisitos para que puedas recibir tu recompensa.
Ten en cuenta que el proceso de recompensa puede tardar hasta 60 dÃ­as.

content:
Puoi modificare ilÂ PIN della cartaÂ e quello per i trasferimenti, definire i limiti di prelievo o di pagamento giornalieri e attivare o disattivare i prelievi bancomat, i pagamenti online o allâ€™estero inÂ Gestisci e selezionandoÂ Impostazioni CartaÂ nella app mobile oÂ WebApp(nuova tabella).

title: How to close my account?
content:
To cancel your N26 account, please send your request through live chat or via email to support@n26.com from your registered email address including the following information:
A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP
Your name
Your N26 IBAN 
If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA  to transfer your remaining balance.
A statement with your consent to send your account closure confirmation to your registered email address: â€œI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.â€œ (Otherwise, the confirmation of account closure can be sent via post, but keep in mind that this solution will slow the process.)
Or you can reply using ourÂ cancellation form(new tab).
A few things to consider when closing your account:
For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.
All outstanding fees are due immediately. This includes fees related to express delivery, and N26 You or N26 Metal (if applicable).
Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.

title: What steps should I take if I notice a fraudulent transaction on my account?
content:
If you donâ€™t recognize a transaction or youâ€™re sure you didnâ€™t authorize it, blocking your debit card wonâ€™t be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Order a new debit card and mark your current one as stolen. Destroy your existing debit card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.
EitherÂ callÂ us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us through the N26 app.  Weâ€™ll help you from there and weâ€™ll do our best to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for ACH payments until your new debit card arrives.  You should keep in mind that changes in the final amount debited from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.
Please note that in cases of fraud you have up to 60 days to open a dispute with us.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to request the average annual balance
content:
The average annual balance is the mean balance of your bank account calculated over a timeframe of a year and based upon daily closing balances over that specific period of time.Â 
You can request it even if youâ€™ve opened your N26 bank account less than a year ago. 
The average balance is required in order to request your ISEE and receive social benefits.
To request the average annual balance related to your N26 account, youâ€™ll need to:
have opened an account with N26 within the reference year
have your legal address in Italy
If you need to know the average balance for last year, contact us via chat through the N26 app. You will receive the calculation of your average balance via email in about 3 working days.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).
14 days notice:
We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:
Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business or N26 Business You account.
Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.
Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.
Immediate cancellation
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

title: PerchÃ© la verifica video non funziona?
content:

La maggior parte delle videochiamate non riesce a causa della connessione Internet scarsa o della cattiva qualitÃ  dellâ€™immagine (ad es. troppo sfocata o scarsa illuminazione). Fai la chiamata in un ambiente luminoso, utilizza un telefono con una buona fotocamera e assicurati di avere una connessione Internet veloce.

Per aprire un conto con noi devi vivere in uno dei paesi supportati.
Possiamo accettare solo carte dâ€™identitÃ  nazionali e passaporti (non si possono usare permessi di soggiorno). Inoltre, il documento non deve essere danneggiato.
Dall'8 Luglio 2019 i clienti con nazionalitÃ  italiana residenti in Italia, potranno utilizzare anche patente di guida (emessa dal 2013) + tessera sanitaria durante il processo di verifica.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo crear y modificar transferencias programadas?
content:
Crear una transferencia programada es muy fÃ¡cil y puedes hacerlo desde la app o la WebApp. 
Cuando haces una transferencia saliente desde tu cuenta, tienes la posibilidad de convertirla en una transferencia programada. Para ello, marca la casilla verde que aparece en la parte de abajo de la pantalla y confirma los datos del beneficiario y la cantidad. TambiÃ©n puedes elegir con quÃ© frecuencia se va repetir y hasta quÃ© fecha.
Puedes consultar tus transferencias programadas desde la app:
1. Ve a la lista de transacciones (o sea, la pantalla principal).
2. Pulsa en los tres puntos situados en la esquina derecha superior (Android) o encima de la lista de transacciones (iOS).
3. AparecerÃ¡ una ventana donde estarÃ¡n todas tus transferencias programadas.
Desde esa secciÃ³n vas a poder modificar o cancelar dichas transferencias. Para cancelarla, simplemente pincha sobre la transferencia que quieres eliminar y arrÃ¡strala hasta la papelera. 
â„¹ï¸  Ten en cuenta que, si una transferencia no se realiza por falta de fondos en la cuenta, no habrÃ¡ otro intento automÃ¡ticamente y serÃ¡ necesario enviar la transferencia de forma manual. La siguiente transferencia ya se volverÃ¡ a emitir de forma normal.

title: N26 Forms
content:
List of important forms:
Direct Deposit Form(new tab): To be used when your employer is requesting a form in order toÂ  set up a payroll direct deposit into your N26 account.
Affidavit for Unauthorized ACH Debit(new tab): To be used when you are filing a claim for unauthorized ACH debits.
Affidavit for Unauthorized Transactions(new tab): To be used when you are filing a claim for unauthorized transactions.
ACH Stop Payment Authorization(new tab): To be used when you wish to discontinue a recurring ACH transaction. 
Statement of Consumer Dispute:(new tab) To be used when you are filing a claim of a consumer disputed transaction(s). 
Statement for Difference in Amount:(new tab) To be used to report a difference in amount of a cash transaction. 
Statement for Cash Not Received(new tab): To be used to report cash not received. 

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful videoÂ verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of ourÂ supported countriesÂ to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driverâ€™s licenses or residence permits canâ€™t be used). Also, the document shouldnâ€™t be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.

Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo funcionan los pagos contactless?
content:
Los pagos sin contacto (contactless o NFC) son una opciÃ³n que viene de forma predeterminada y no se puede desactivar. Si tienes algÃºn problema con los pagos sin contacto, ten en cuenta que:
Para activar los pagos NFC, primero deberÃ¡s utilizar tu tarjeta en el cajero o en un terminal de pago.

Las transacciones de hasta 50â‚¬ no requieren el PIN de la tarjeta*. Para cantidades superiores a 50â‚¬, necesitarÃ¡s introducir el PIN. 
*Siempre que el sistema que utiliza el comercio acepte esta opciÃ³n.
Si has realizado varias transacciones y has gastado en total 150â‚¬, tendrÃ¡s que usar el PIN antes de poder seguir haciendo transacciones NFC. 

AsegÃºrate de que tu tarjeta estÃ¡ sobre un terminal de pago compatible con la tecnologÃ­a NFC. Ten en cuenta que, si retiras la tarjeta demasiado rÃ¡pido o si no la mantienes lo bastante cerca, podrÃ­as tener que volver a repetir la operaciÃ³n.

Las tarjetas N26 Metal solo tienen NFC en la cara posterior. AsegÃºrate de apoyar la cara posterior de la tarjeta contra el terminal de pago para usar el NFC (si lo haces con la cara frontal, no funcionarÃ¡).

title: Spazi Condivisi - Il beneficiario fidato
content:
Il beneficiario fidato di uno Spazio Condiviso puÃ²:
Trasferire denaro dai propri Spazi (inclusi gli Spazi Condivisi di cui Ã¨ partecipante) a uno Spazio Condiviso.
Accedere e liberamente trasferire fondi presenti su uno Spazio Condiviso.
Abbandonare uno Spazio Condiviso in qualunque momento.
I trasferimenti tra un beneficiario fidato e uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno bisogno di essere autenticati tramite notifiche Pin e Push. I beneficiari possono facilmente trascinare denaro tramite app (mobile e web), cosÃ¬ come con gli Spazi non condivisi.
PerchÃ© un proprietario o un partecipante deve essere identificato come beneficiario fidato?
Le leggi bancarie europee regolano le modalitÃ  secondo cui un trasferimento bancario possa essere autorizzato.
Nellâ€™ambito di queste leggi, la SCA (Strong Customer Authentication) definisce i requisiti per rendere i pagamenti online piÃ¹ sicuri.
Unâ€™eccezione ai requisiti SCA puÃ² avvenire se un partecipante di uno Spazio Condiviso viene classificato come â€beneficiario fidatoâ€.
Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. 
If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Reinvest your N26 Invest portfolio capital to Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo)
content:
You can reinvest the funds from your N26 Invest plan to a brand new investment plan with Moneyfarm.Â 

Important risk notice: As this option would mean closing your existing portfolio and reinvesting the capital in a new portfolio, this can result in a financial loss depending on the actual market value of your portfolio compared to the amount originally invested.
To begin the transfer of your portfolio capital to a new investment plan with Moneyfarm please follow the steps below:
Register an account with(new tab) Moneyfarm(new tab) (please use the link you received in the email we sent you as special conditions apply for N26 customers). Youâ€™ll need to verify your email address with them.  
Youâ€™ll then need to complete Moneyfarmâ€™s advice/suitability questionnaire. which includes your risk preferences and your risk bearing capacity as a basis for a strategy/portfolio recommendation that suits your needs.Â  
Plan your investment by selecting a strategy/portfolio and choose your initial investment as well as your monthly investment plan. A minimum investment amount does not apply for existing N26 Invest customers.Â 
Open the account by entering relevant personal information (name, address, date of birth etc).
Youâ€™ll then need to confirm both Moneyfarm and FIL Fondsbankâ€™s (FFB) legal documentation.
Complete verification by either video verification or PostIdent.
Once your application is accepted, you can reach out to Moneyfarm (new tab)customer support(new tab)* who will arrange the transfer of your N26 Invest portfolio and the reinvestment of your portfolio capital to your new Moneyfarm investment plan.Â  Â  
Their customer service will provide you with an already completed portfolio form that youâ€™ll need to sign and send back to Moneyfarm (electronic signatures are accepted).Â 
Moneyfarm will then instruct FFB to complete the transfer of your N26 Invest portfolio.
Please note that this option must be completed by 03.09.2019 â€“Â  the completion of your sign-up, verification and transfer of your portfolio capital make take up to several days, please ensure that these steps are completed in their entirety before the above date.
You'll be able to contact Moneyfarm here:Â 
Tel: +49 (0) 69 3807 6632
Email: service@moneyfarm.de(new tab)
Moneyfarmâ€™s website is currently only available in German but their customer service will be able to answer any queries in English.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesnâ€™t give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to ðŸ‘¤ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we canâ€™t say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasnâ€™t successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesnâ€™t expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. Weâ€™ll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: Suis-je imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis ?
content:
En tant que banque dÃ©tentrice dâ€™une licence bancaire, nous sommes tenus de communiquer directement Ã  l'â€Internal Revenue Serviceâ€ (IRS). Nous leurs fournissons des renseignements sur les comptes bancaires dÃ©tenus par les contribuables amÃ©ricains, conformÃ©ment au FATCA. Cette loi a Ã©tÃ© Ã©tablie par le dÃ©partement du TrÃ©sor amÃ©ricain et l'IRS pour favoriser une meilleure conformitÃ© fiscale. Elle empÃªche les ressortissants amÃ©ricains de recourir aux banques et autres organismes financiers Ã©trangers pour Ã©viter de payer lâ€™impÃ´t sur le revenu et les actifs.

Vous trouverez plus dâ€™informations Ã  propos du FATCA ici(nouvel onglet).Â 

Dans le cadre du FATCA, un ressortissant amÃ©ricain est dÃ©fini comme :
Un citoyen des Etats-Unis (y compris les binationaux)
Un rÃ©sident des Etats-Unis, par exemple en tant que titulaire d'une carte verte en cours de validitÃ© ou en tant que personne ayant rÃ©ussi le "Substantial Presence Test" (voir ci-dessous).

Si vous n'Ãªtes pas certain de savoir si vous Ãªtes un ressortissant des Etats-Unis, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal.

â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ signifie:
Que vous avez Ã©tÃ© physiquement prÃ©sent aux Ã‰tats-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours de l'annÃ©e civile en cours
OU
Que vous avez Ã©tÃ© physiquement prÃ©sent aux Ã‰tats-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours des trois derniÃ¨res annÃ©es civiles :

(31 jours ou plus dans l'annÃ©e civile en cours) + (le nombre de jours de prÃ©sence physique aux Ã‰tats-Unis l'annÃ©e derniÃ¨re) divisÃ© par 3 + (le nombre de jours de prÃ©sence physique aux Ã‰tats-Unis l'avant-derniÃ¨re annÃ©e) divisÃ© par 6.

De plus, si votre compte prÃ©sente l'une des caractÃ©ristiques suivantes :
CitoyennetÃ© ou rÃ©sidence aux Ã‰tats-Unis
Lieu de naissance aux Ã‰tats-Unis
Adresse postale ou de rÃ©sidence aux Ã‰tats-Unis, y compris les boÃ®tes postales
NumÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone aux Ã‰tats-Unis
Ordres de virements permanents ou paiements rÃ©currents Ã  un compte domiciliÃ© aux Ã‰tats-Unis

Dans ce cas nous sommes obligÃ©s de vous considÃ©rer comme ressortissant des Etats-Unis, Ã  moins que vous ne nous transmettiez les documents suivants :Â 
Un formulaire d'auto-certification W-8BEN ou un document similaire agrÃ©Ã©, et

In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, weâ€™re happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or (new tab)Webapp(new tab) - that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.

If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send us an email from your registered email address.
You can send an email to: complaints.uk@n26.com.
(If you've a registered N26 account from outside of the UK please go here(new tab)).
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We'll send you an email confirmation once we've received your complaint and have begun to investigate. Our aim is to find an agreeable solution and respond to your complaint as soon as possible. Some cases can take a bit longer, that's why the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) gives us up to 8 weeks to provide you with our final response. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, weâ€™ll let you know via email as well.
In case weâ€™re not able to find a solution youâ€™re happy with, you can refer your complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service(new tab) (FOS).

title: Can I use the same email address for my U.S. and European N26 accounts?
content:
No. For security purposes, you must have a unique email address linked to each N26 account. When signing up for your U.S. N26 account, please select a different email address than the one used for your European N26 account.
Additionally, in order to sign-up for a U.S. N26 account you must be a U.S. citizen or a U.S. permanent resident.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, youâ€™ll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
Youâ€™ll need your 10-digit token number: itâ€™s found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
Go to the Actions tab,
Select Cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,
Tap Activate.

To activate your card on the web app, just select Activate card from the Home screen.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or in the UK you must make a first ATM withdrawal to fully activate your card.
If you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. All other cards will be disabled.
Youâ€™ll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account. Â Â 
After you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

title: Espacios Compartidos - Â¿QuÃ© es un poder notarial?
content:
El modelo legal que cumplen los Espacios Compartidos se llama Poder notarial (Kontovollmacht in German).Â 
Un espacio compartido no es lo mismo que una cuenta compartida en el sentido tradicional, donde cada persona es propietaria parcialmente del dinero de la cuenta. En el caso del espacio compartido, cuando los participantes reciben el poder notarial, obtienen el derecho de actuar en nombre del administrador, como por ejemplo para recibir y realizar transferencias.Â 
La persona que autoriza a las demÃ¡s a actuar en su nombre es el administrador y es el Ãºnico propietario de la cuenta. El administrador tiene que ser un usuario con cuenta de N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You).
Esto significa, que el creador del espacio compartido es su dueÃ±o legal.Â 
El dueÃ±o del espacio compartido:Â 
- Tiene posesiÃ³n de todos los fondos dentro del espacio.Â 
- Puede transferir fondos a la cuenta o desde la cuenta siempre que los necesite.Â 
- Puede invitar a otros usuarios a su espacio compartido dÃ¡ndoles poder notarial.
- Puede revocar el poder notarial del resto de los participantes siempre que quiera.
- Puede cerrar el espacio compartido (todos los fondos se transferirÃ¡n a la cuenta principal del administrador).
Cuando se le concede poder notarial a una persona, esta tendrÃ¡ acceso a todo el dinero del espacio compartido. Esto significa que cada participante enviar y recibir dinero en ese espacio compartido.Â 
N26 Bank GmbH no se hace responsable de los pagos cubiertos por el poder notarial.

Ein Formular fÃ¼r Umsatzreklamationen ausfÃ¼llen. Danach tun wir unser Bestes, um dein Geld fÃ¼r dich zurÃ¼ckzubekommen.
Du kannst dein Konto weiter fÃ¼r Ãœberweisungen verwenden, bis deine neue Karte eintrifft. Wenn du in Deutschland oder Ã–sterreich bist, kannst du auch CASH26 fÃ¼r Bargeldabhebungen nutzen.
Manchmal kann es Ã¼brigens vorkommen, dass der von deinem Konto abgebuchte Betrag von dem ursprÃ¼nglich autorisierten Zahlungsbetrag abweicht, etwa bei Zahlungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen. Das deutet nicht unbedingt auf Betrug hin.

content:

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
All FPS (Faster Payments Service) transfers are processed immediately and credited to the other account within a few hours. If the other bank is not part of the FPS system the time to process the transfer will be the same as a regular bank transfer. BACS transfers are processed in 2 to 3 business days.
You'll need to confirm every outgoing transfer via push notification in the mobile app. If not, the transfer will remain as pending.
WithÂ MoneyBeam, you can instantly transfer money to other N26 customers in the UK.Â 
Please note that we only accept transfers in GBP (no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sending bank to initiate a payment investigation.

Inserisci l'importo e un testo di riferimento
Conferma con il PIN di conferma e messaggio push.

title: Quando arriverÃ  la mia carta?

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: Is there a fee if I make a purchase while I am abroad?
content:
No, N26 does not charge you a fee for purchases made while you are abroad, but we do apply the current conversion rate. You can use Visaâ€™s currency converter(new tab) to get an indication of the rate you may receive when using your N26 Visa debit card. Please note that this is only an indication, not a guarantee, and is therefore subject to change. Please also note that international ATM transactions may incur other fees as disclosed in your Consumer Account Agreement and Disclosures(new tab).
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Quanto tempo richiedono i trasferimenti?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Valido per tutti i paesi tranne Regno Unito
Tutti iÂ bonifici SEPAÂ nazionali e internazionali vengono eseguiti entro un giorno bancario. Tuttavia, a causa degli orari di apertura delle banche partecipanti, un giorno bancario puÃ² durare fino a due giorni lavorativi. Bonifici SEPA in uscita vengono accreditati in un giorno bancario. 
Ricorda che se un bonifico Ã¨ stato inviato poco prima di un weekend o di un giorno festivo, il tempo di accredito sarÃ  prolungato. Mandiamo i nostri bonifici SEPA attraverso TARGET2(nuova tabella) che elabora i pagamenti dal lunedÃ¬ al venerdÃ¬ dalle 07:00 alle 18:00 CET. Il sistema Ã¨ chiuso nei seguenti giorni:
1 gennaio (Capodanno), VenerdÃ¬ Santo, lunedÃ¬ di Pasqua, 1 maggio (festa dei lavoratori), 25 dicembre (Natale), 26 dicembre.
ConÂ MoneyBeam, puoi trasferire denaro ad altri clienti N26 all'istante. Gli orari variano per iÂ trasferimenti in valuta esteraÂ con TransferWise (ma apparirÃ  un tempo di trasferimento stimato quando si effettua il trasferimento).
Ti chiederemo di confermare ogni tipo di trasferimento tramite unÂ messaggio pushÂ nellâ€™app prima di eseguire la transazione.
Nota: accettiamo solo bonifici in euro tramite SEPA (ciÃ² significa nessun trasferimento SWIFT).
Se il tuo trasferimento in entrata non avviene nei tempi previsti, contatta il mittente (banca) per un'indagine di pagamento. Non possiamo indagare sui trasferimenti in entrata. Ma abbiamo raccolto alcuni motivi per cui il tuo trasferimentoÂ SEPAÂ oÂ valuta esteraÂ potrebbe aver fallito

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, our support team is here to help. Please tell us more about the problem you're facing in relation to your N26 account. 
You can send us an email from your registered address to reclamaciones.es@n26.com or send your feedback by post.
If you opened your account before April 17th 2019 and therefore your IBAN starts with DE, the email must be sent to reclamaciones@n26.com instead.
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We will contact you via email to confirm that we've received your complaint. Then, we will begin an investigation to find a solution youâ€™re happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we'll let you know via email as well. If we are facing any delays by waiting for further information, it may affect the date by which we can resolve your complaint.
Our final response will explain to you whether or not your complaint has been upheld and the reason why.
We will send our final response over to you within 15 business days, following the day that we received your complaint. If for any reason we couldn't provide a final response within that time, we'll send you an email to explain why there's a delay and provide another date by which you can expect to receive the resolution. Our final response will be sent out no later than 35 days if your IBAN is German and one month if your IBAN is Spanish, following the date we received your complaint.
In case we're not able to find a solution you're happy with, you can escalate your complaint to the Banco de EspaÃ±a by contacting their complaint service Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones(new tab), located in calle AlcalÃ¡ 48, 28014 Madrid.
Here you can find the legal references:
EU Online Dispute Resolution(new tab)
General Rules of transaction transparency and customer protection(new tab)
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible. Thank you.

title: Neuigkeiten zu N26 Invest
content:
Wir haben uns dafÃ¼r entschieden, unsere Partnerschaft mit Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) zu beenden. Mithilfe von Moneyfarm haben wir unser N26 Invest Produkt angeboten. Ab dem 17.09.2019 wird N26 Invest in der N26 App nicht mehr verfÃ¼gbar sein. Allen N26 Invest Kunden haben wir darum eine E-Mail geschickt. Der folgende Artikel enthÃ¤lt zusÃ¤tzliche Informationen Ã¼ber die drei verschiedenen Optionen fÃ¼r unsere N26 Invest Kunden.

Wenn du diese Option wÃ¤hlst, kannst du bis zum 16.09.2019 deinen N26 Invest-Plan in der N26 App schlieÃŸen und dir den aktuellen Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios auszahlen lassen. Die genaue Anleitung fÃ¼r diese Option findest du hier.

Du kannst dich bei Moneyfarm anmelden und den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios bei Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) reinvestieren.

Hinweis: Im April 2019 wurde Vaamo von Moneyfarm, einem europÃ¤ischen digitalen VermÃ¶gensverwalter Ã¼bernommen. NÃ¤heres Ã¼ber Moneyfarm erfÃ¤hrst du hier(neuen Tab).
Wenn du dich fÃ¼r diese Option entscheidest, wird dein N26 Invest-Portfolio geschlossen und der Gegenwert in einem neuen Investment-Plan von Moneyfarm reinvestiert.
Die genaue Anleitung fÃ¼r diese Option findest du hier.

Das jeweilige Invest-Depot aller N26 Invest-Kunden hÃ¤lt die FFB. Falls du dich als N26 Invest-Kunde bis zum 02.09.2019 nicht fÃ¼r die 1. Option oder die 2. Option entscheidest, erhÃ¤ltst du automatisch von der FFB postalisch deine Login-Daten, mit denen du Ã¼ber die FFB Website auf dein bestehendes Depot zugreifen kannst.
Hinweis: Falls sich deine Anschrift seit der ErÃ¶ffnung deines N26 Invest-Plans geÃ¤ndert hat, informiere bitte die FFB darÃ¼ber, damit sie dir die Dokumente an die richtige Adresse schickt.
Auf dein bestehendes Invest-Depot wirst du Ã¼ber die Website der FFB zugreifen kÃ¶nnen, sobald du die Login-Daten von der FFB erhalten hast. Klicke hier, um mehr Ã¼ber diese Option zu erfahren.
Zwar beenden wir unsere Partnerschaft mit Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) sowie die GeschÃ¤ftsbeziehung mit unseren N26 Invest-Kunden bezÃ¼glich des N26 Invest Produkts. Aber dies hat keinen Einfluss auf irgendeinen anderen Aspekt deines N26 Bankkontos, deiner Premium-Mitgliedschaften oder anderer Produkte, die du mit uns hast.

Seit unserem erstmaligen Angebot von N26 Invest im Jahr 2016, haben wir stetig mehr Produkte & Services entwickelt, die unsere wachsende und zunehmend globale Kundschaft reflektieren. Wir bleiben nach wie vor bemÃ¼ht, dir auch in Zukunft innovative Produkte anzubieten und die Organisation deiner Finanzen zu vereinfachen. 

Die gute Nachricht ist: Du hast die Option, dein bestehendes Invest-Depot bei FIL Fondsbank (FFB) weiterzufÃ¼hren. Die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast, fasst diese Option zusammen und du kannst mehr dazu in unserem Support Center erfahren. Falls du nichts tust, schickt dir die FFB noch vor dem 17.09.2019 postalisch automatisch deine Login-Daten zu, mit denen du Ã¼ber die Website von FFB auf dein bestehendes Depot dann zugreifen kannst.Â 

Im April dieses Jahres hat Moneyfarm, ein europÃ¤ischer digitaler VermÃ¶gensverwalter, Vaamo Ã¼bernommen. NÃ¤heres zu Moneyfarm erfÃ¤hrst du auf ihrer Website(neuen Tab).

In Absatz 11.3. unserer AGB fÃ¼r N26 Invest ist dargelegt, dass wir das Recht haben, dieses Produkt zu kÃ¼ndigen. Wir entschuldigen uns dafÃ¼r, wenn dies fÃ¼r dich eine EnttÃ¤uschung ist. Beachte, dass du noch die MÃ¶glichkeit hast, den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios bei Moneyfarm zu reinvestieren, wie wir in unserer E-Mail und in unserem Artikel im Support Center beschrieben haben. Bei dieser Option wird dein bestehendes Invest-Portfolio geschlossen und der Gegenwert in einen neuen Investment-Plan von Moneyfarm reinvestiert. Alternativ kannst du dein bestehendes Depot bei der FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) weiterfÃ¼hren.

Nein, die SchlieÃŸung deines N26 Invest-Plans hat keine Auswirkungen auf dein N26 Bankkonto, deine Premium-Mitgliedschaften oder andere Produkte, die du mit uns hast.

Die Kapitalertragsteuer wird automatisch seitens der FFB einbehalten und abgefÃ¼hrt, sofern kein Freistellungsauftrag vorliegt. Der Differenzbetrag wird dann auf dein Referenzkonto ausgezahlt, welches dein N26 Bankkonto ist.

Nach der SchlieÃŸung deines N26 Invest-Plans, schickt dir die FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) postalisch deine Steuerbescheinigung zu, sofern Steuern einbehalten oder FreibetrÃ¤ge genutzt wurden. Falls sich deine Anschrift nach SchlieÃŸung deines N26 Invest-Plans Ã¤ndert, informiere bitte FFB unter den folgenden Kontaktdaten darÃ¼ber:
Montag bis Freitag
Tel: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200
Fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555

content:

title: Security
content: The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: All About Perks
content:
"Do you need an N26 card to take advantage of these Perks?"
Yes, you need an active N26 card to take advantage of these Perks.

"Will I be able to enroll in Perks as soon as I open an N26 account, or will I need to wait some time?"
Perks will be available to you as soon as you activate your card, and will always be available for you as long as your card is active.

"Can I access Perks through the web app?"
No, you cannot.Â  Perks are only available through the mobile app.


"What is the difference between a Cashback and a Discount Perk?"
The main difference between the two Perks is that the Cashback Perk is a subscription-based benefit, where you get a refund on your monthly subscription payment, from N26.Â  A Discount Perk is a purchase based benefit where you are able to purchase items at a reduced price - a discount.  In general, Discounts are applied instantly while Cashbacks may take up to a couple of business days to get credited to your account.Â  The exception to this is our Booking.com Perk, which offers Cashback.  Per the terms of our Booking.com offer, Booking.com takes at least 64 days until the end of your stay to process your Cashback, and N26 may take a month or more after that to complete processing of the Cashback. 
"Do I need a minimum balance in order to enroll in Perks?"Â 
While you do not need a minimum balance to enroll in Perks,Â  You must have a minimum balance to cover the selected subscription amount for your monthly Cashback Perk or to purchase the goods/services associated with your Discount Perk.


The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

A volte una transazione puÃ² sembrare sospetta perchÃ© lâ€™importo finale addebitato puÃ² essere diverso dallâ€™importo originale della transazione per alcuni motivi:
Lâ€™esercente blocca un importo piÃ¹ elevato come deposito (es. alla stazione di benzina, per un noleggio auto o una prenotazione alberghiera), e la differenza viene accreditata sul tuo conto non appena il deposito non sarÃ  piÃ¹ necessario.

In entrambi i casi, non applichiamo interessi per la differenza negli importi.

content:
Los contratos deÂ N26 You(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â oÂ N26 Metal(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â tienen una duraciÃ³n de un aÃ±o. Este contrato se renueva automÃ¡ticamente durante otro aÃ±o salvo que lo canceles. 
En este artÃ­culo te explicamos la diferencia entre revocar la suscripciÃ³n o cancelar la suscripciÃ³n. Tienes varias opciones:
Revocar tu suscripciÃ³n dentro del periodo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as.
Cancelar tu suscripciÃ³n inmediatamente (despuÃ©s del periodo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as).
A continuaciÃ³n te explicamos detalladamente cÃ³mo hacerlo.

Solo necesitamos que nos envÃ­es un correo a support@n26.com desde tu direcciÃ³n de email registrada o nos contactes por chat. Cuando nos escribas, especifica que quieres revocar tu suscripciÃ³n y, si procede, a quÃ© tipo de cuenta te gustarÃ­a pasar despuÃ©s.
Por Ãºltimo, te informamos de que si cancelaras tu suscripciÃ³n antes de que termine el contrato, no podrÃ­as volver a registrarte para la misma suscripciÃ³n en el futuro.
Si quieresÂ cancelar tu suscripciÃ³nÂ antes de que termine el contrato (despuÃ©s del periodo de revocaciÃ³n de 14 dÃ­as), necesitamos que contactes con nosotros. 
Al elegir esta opciÃ³n, perderÃ¡s todos los beneficios de N26 You o Metal, entre ellos la cobertura del seguro.
Puedes cancelar la renovaciÃ³n de tu suscripciÃ³n N26 YouÂ oÂ N26 Metal hasta 4 semanas antes de que termine el contrato y se renueve. Es muy fÃ¡cil, solo tienes que entrar en la app y hacer lo siguiente:
Entra en ðŸ‘¤Mi cuenta.

Pulsa en Detalles de tu plan

Confirma la cancelaciÃ³n mediante la notificaciÃ³n emergente que aparecerÃ¡.
Puedes seguir utilizando la Mastercard N26 You o Metal hasta que tu contrato expire/caduque. Esto quiere decir que estarÃ¡s cubierto y seguirÃ¡s abonando la tarifa hasta entonces. DespuÃ©s, tu tarjeta Mastercard You o Metal pasarÃ¡ a funcionar como una tarjeta estÃ¡ndar, sin los beneficios adicionales. Te enviaremos una tarjeta estÃ¡ndar antes de que termine el contrato para sustituir a la N26 You o Metal. Para esto no hace falta que te pongas en contacto con nosotros, lo haremos de forma automÃ¡tica.
Te avisaremos por email de la renovaciÃ³n de tu contrato 8 semanas antes de la fecha de renovaciÃ³n.
Si quieresÂ cerrar tu cuenta completamente, visita este artÃ­culo sobre cÃ³mo cerrar la cuenta.

title: Wie verdiene ich Geld, indem ich Freunde zu N26 einlade?
content:
Du erhÃ¤ltst jedes Mal 15 â‚¬, wenn du N26 erfolgreich einem Freund/einer Freundin empfiehlst (max. 1500 â‚¬). Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald dein Konto vollstÃ¤ndig erÃ¶ffnet ist.
Damit du den Bonus erhÃ¤ltst, mÃ¼ssen deine Freunde auch all unsere Voraussetzungen erfÃ¼llen:
Die Anmeldung Ã¼ber deinen Empfehlungslink oder persÃ¶nlichen Code abschlieÃŸen.
Die Mastercard aktivieren.
Eine Zahlung (in einem GeschÃ¤ft, online oder am Geldautomaten) mit der Mastercard im Wert von mindestens 15 â‚¬ tÃ¤tigen.
So lÃ¤dst du Freunde ein:
Logge dich in die App ein
Auf deinem Hauptbildschirm, gehe zu â€œEntdeckenâ€
WÃ¤hle das Geschenksymbol aus
Tippe auf deinen persÃ¶nlichen Empfehlungscode, um ihn zu kopieren und wÃ¤hle aus auf welchem Weg du den Code teilen mÃ¶chtest
Du kannst bei Bedarf eine Nachricht an deinen Freund hinzufÃ¼gen oder die Vorgabe nutzenÂ 
Tippe auf â€œSendenâ€!
Wenn deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen erfÃ¼llt haben, wird der Bonus innerhalb von 60 Tagen ausgezahlt. Du kannst den Status jederzeit in deiner mobilen App oder WebApp einsehen.
Falls dein Werbebonus noch nicht ausgezahlt wurde, haben wir auch einigeÂ GrÃ¼ndeÂ dafÃ¼r gesammelt.
*Der Link verfÃ¤llt nicht und kann jederzeit verwendet werden. PersÃ¶nliche Einladungscodes und Links sollten nur fÃ¼r persÃ¶nliche und nichtkommerzielle Zwecke verwendet werden. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Einladungslink Ã¼ber Social Media mit persÃ¶nlichen Kontakten teilen kannst, solange du der HaupteigentÃ¼mer bist. Weitere Informationen findest du in denÂ AGB(neuen Tab)Â des Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means youâ€™re able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldnâ€™t see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.Â A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.Â The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen toÂ your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expiresÂ (and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes youâ€™ll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesnâ€™t, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content:
Direct debits returned to your account due toÂ insufficient funds* are charged a â‚¬3 fee in accordance with ourÂ Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,Â overdraftÂ interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
SinceÂ SEPA transfersÂ could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you useÂ MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) orÂ CASH26Â (if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you donâ€™t recognize a direct debit, you canÂ reverse itÂ in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If youâ€™re waiting for your first cardÂ  and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
Â For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: ðŸ‘¤ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.Â 
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.Â Â 
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of â‚¬6 for standard shipping and â‚¬25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is â‚¬45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once youâ€™ve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you donâ€™t activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. Youâ€™ll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
content:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.
Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird â€œBesitzerâ€ genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das heiÃŸt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.
Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers Ã¼ber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verfÃ¼gen.
Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space

ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.
kann Ã¼ber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verfÃ¼gen.
kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.
kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.
kann einen Shared Space schlieÃŸen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).

Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces Ã¼ber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verfÃ¼gen kÃ¶nnen.
Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden fÃ¼r Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.
Was sind Shared Spaces?
Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzufÃ¼gen oder davon entfernen?

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:

If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.

title: What are Spaces?
content:
Spaces are sub accounts that you can create and personalize. Spaces help you visualize your short- and long-term financial goals by giving you a place to set aside your money and track your progress. You can instantaneously move money between your Spaces accounts as often as you like. ThisÂ feature is available using our mobile applicationÂ and WebApp. See below for more information about how to start using Spaces today!
Related Topics
"How can I use Spaces?"
Congratulations on taking the first step toward reaching your financial goals. A step-by-step guide to using Spaces is here(new tab).
"How many Spaces can I create?"
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete two additional Spaces sub accounts as often as youâ€™d like.
"How can I see transactions into and out of my Spaces?"
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a Space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
"How long does it take to transfer the money between Spaces?"
No time at all! Once the amount is confirmed, the balance is updatedÂ instantaneously.
"How do I lock a Space?
Locking a Space is a great way to ensure that you are not moving fundsÂ out of it and thereby staying on track to reach your financial goals.Â 
To Lock/Unlock the Space:
Go to your Space.
Tap on the three buttons in the top right corner.
Select "Lock/Unlock space" (in the WebApp, "Lock space")
Enter your Confirmation PIN.Â 
"How do I move money into a Space?"
You can move money into a Space by tapping (or clicking) and holding down on your primary account,  and then dragging across into your Space. You can also add a reference text of your choice. Once the amount is confirmed, the balance is updated right away.
"Can I move money into a locked Space?"
Yes, funds can be deposited into a locked Space. Please note that if you need to withdraw money from a locked Space, you will need to unlock it first.
"Is the money in my Space visible in my Main Account balance?"
Yes, but if you want to keep the balance in your Space separate from the balance in your Main Account, you can hide the Space balance. To hide a Space balance:
Go to the Space in the mobile application or WebApp.Â 
Tap on the three buttons in the top right corner.
Tap or click on "Hide space balance".Â 

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users.

Debit card. If you have no previous transactions on your account, you'll be able to enter the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between Â£20 and Â£150. Please note that this feature is only available when topping up your account for the first time. Credit and prepaid cards are not accepted.

Transfer. The transfer must be in GBP. Youâ€™ll just need to provide your Account Number and your name as itâ€™s written on the ID you used to create your account. Please note that: 
For the transfer details field, make sure the recipientâ€™s name is your name as itâ€™s written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account â€“ we donâ€™t accept company names). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get Â£10 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.Â 
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.Â 
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a â€œtrusted beneficiaryâ€ so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: What if I have a negative balance?
content:
You are not permitted to overdraw your N26 account. Â If the available balance in your account is not sufficient to cover a payment you have authorized, that payment will be rejected.  However, your account balance may go negative in cases of technical overdraft - this occurs when you don't have enough money in your account to cover certain N26 account fees, such as a card replacement fee.
If your account balance does become negative, you must immediately make a deposit to cover the negative balance.  For information on how to make a deposit to your account, please see â€œHow to Add Money to My N26 Account(new tab)â€.


The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. content:

Cuando hagas un pago onlineÂ utilizando tu Mastercard, 3D Secure confirma la transacciÃ³n en 5 minutos mediante un mensaje push en la aplicaciÃ³n. Si no ves la transacciÃ³n, prueba algunos de estosÂ consejos para solucionarlo.
Si haces una compra desde tu telÃ©fono, verÃ¡s una transacciÃ³n pendiente en la app. Pulsa en el icono de la campana y aparecerÃ¡ un mensaje push en tu pantalla para que confirmes y finalices tu compra. title: How long do transfers take?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesnâ€™t offer instant transfers or the sender doesnâ€™t choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). Itâ€™s open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
WithÂ MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary forÂ foreign currency transfersÂ with TransferWise (but youâ€™ll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer viaÂ push messageÂ in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why yourÂ SEPAÂ orÂ foreign currencyÂ transfer could have failed.
