title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, weâ€™re happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com (new tab)(new tab). For the rest of Europe please useÂ complaints@n26.com(new tab).
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
Weâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution youâ€™re happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, weâ€™ll let you know via email as well.
In case weâ€™re not able to find a solution youâ€™re happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
You could file a complaint with the Arbitro Bancario Finanziario(new tab)
You could seek to reach an amicable dispute settlement with the assistance of Conciliatore Bancario Finanziario(new tab)
You can also go before another entity specialised in amicable settlement of disputes on banking and financial services, as long as this entity is enrolled in the appropriate register kept by the Italian Ministry of Justice.
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: Cosa fa N26 con le mie informazioni finanziarie?
content:
Lâ€™OCSE richiede che certe informazioni di carattere finanziario vengano condivise per mezzo delÂ Common Reporting Standard(nuova tabella)Â (CRS). Per poter adempiere a tale obbligo, dobbiamo stabilire in quale Paese paghi le tasse. Per questo abbiamo bisogno del tuo numero di identificazione fiscale o numero di assicurazione nazionale.
Noi inviamo questo dato tramite lâ€™Ufficio federale delle tasse tedesco alle autoritÃ  fiscali di altri Paesi se:
Vivi in un paese che partecipa al CRS.
Hai una casella postale o un secondo indirizzo registrato in un altro Paese che partecipa al CRS.
Durante la registrazione hai fornito un numero di telefono di un altro Paese che partecipa al CRS.
Hai un ordine permanente, o effettui pagamenti periodici, su un conto di un altro Paese che partecipa al CRS.
Inviamo i dati anche allâ€™Internal Revenue Service(nuova tabella)Â (IRS) statunitense, ai sensi delÂ Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(nuova tabella)Â (FATCA). Possiamo richiedere il tuo numero di sicurezza sociale (SSN) per verificare il tuo stato fiscale negli Stati Uniti perchÃ©:
Sei un cittadino degli Stati Uniti (anche doppia cittadinanza).
Durante la registrazione hai fornito un numero di telefono degli Stati Uniti.
Sei nato negli Stati Uniti (o in unâ€™ambasciata degli Stati Uniti allâ€™estero).
Il tuo coniuge Ã¨ di nazionalitÃ  statunitense.
Ci hai fornito un indirizzo degli Stati Uniti.
Effettui regolari pagamenti verso gli Stati Uniti.
Per aggiornare il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale o di sicurezza sociale nella app N26:
Vai a ðŸ‘¤ Il mio conto e tocca su Impostazioni
Seleziona Impostazioni personali poi Informazioni fiscali
Seleziona il Paese in cui paghi le tasse
Inserisci il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale o il numero di sicurezza sociale
Informazioni importanti
In Germania, abbiamo bisogno dello steueridentifikationsnummer (il numero di identificazione fiscale equivalente alla partita IVA italiana, 11 cifre) non dello steuernummer (9 cifre).
In ogni caso, i tuoi dati personali saranno memorizzati in modo sicuro e utilizzati esclusivamente per adempiere ai requisiti del CRS e del FATCA.
Non possiamo fornirti informazioni sul tuo stato fiscale. Se hai dubbi, rivolgiti a un consulente fiscale.
Se hai inserito il Paese nella quale sei soggetto a tassazione ma non il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale, rimuovi gentilmente il Paese dallâ€™elenco che ti appare nella app, reinserisci il Paese, e inserisci il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale di nuovo.

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, weâ€™ll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: ðŸ‘¤ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, pleaseÂ contact us via live chat(new tab) and weâ€™ll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and youâ€™ve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and weâ€™ll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it viaÂ express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once youâ€™re doneÂ proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Donâ€™t enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isnâ€™t missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If youâ€™re staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If youâ€™re moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where youâ€™ll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, youâ€™ll receive 10 additionalÂ SpacesÂ and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. 
N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account'sÂ insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue.Â Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.
Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14â‚¬ through your N26 app. 
If youâ€™re an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, youâ€™ll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: 
Keep these in mind when consideringÂ N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If youâ€™re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you donâ€™t cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14â‚¬ through your N26 app. 

*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Come fare un reclamo?
content:
Per noi Ã¨ importante essere informati quando hai un problema con uno dei nostri prodotti o servizi. Se ti serve aiuto con il tuo conto, il nostro Servizio Clienti sarÃ  in grado di fornire unâ€™adeguata soluzione alle tue richieste in modo rapido e veloce. Contattaci via chat direttamente dalla app o dalla WebApp. 
Qualora non riuscissimo a risolvere il problema in modo soddisfacente, mettiamo a disposizione dei nostri clienti un ufficio dedicato alla gestione dei reclami.
Un reclamo puÃ² essere inviato per iscritto a:
N26 Bank GmbH - Ufficio Reclami Italia
KlosterstraÃŸe 62, 10179 Berlino, Germania
In alternativa, puÃ² essere inviato via email a: reclami@n26.com oppure attraverso un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata (PEC) a: reclami@pec.n26.com
Lâ€™indicazione dei propri dati identificativi (nome, cognome, codice fiscale), del numero di conto corrente e dei motivi del reclamo rendono piÃ¹ agevole lâ€™elaborazione del reclamo da parte nostra. Se viene presentato per mezzo di un rappresentante, il reclamo deve anche essere accompagnato da apposita procura autenticata.
N26 si impegna a rispondere entro:
30 giorni solari per i reclami relativi a operazioni e servizi bancari e finanziari;
15 giorni lavorativi per i reclami relativi ai servizi di pagamento come bonifici, disposizioni permanenti di pagamenti, addebiti su carte di debito e altro. Nel caso in cui non sia possibile per noi rispettare il termine dei 15 giorni, N26 invierÃ  una risposta interlocutoria indicando le ragioni del ritardo e il termine entro il quale verrÃ  fornita la risposta definitiva, in ogni caso entro il termine massimo di 35 giorni lavorativi.
I reclami presentati con modalitÃ  diverse da quelle sopra esposte oppure inviati a indirizzi diversi da quelli indicati, si considereranno pervenuti nel momento in cui saranno recapitati allâ€™Ufficio Reclami.Â 
Se il reclamo Ã¨ ritenuto fondato, N26 comunicherÃ  al cliente le iniziative che si impegna ad assumere ed i relativi tempi di realizzazione.
Se il reclamo Ã¨ ritenuto infondato, N26 provvederÃ  a fornire unâ€™illustrazione chiara delle motivazioni del rigetto. FornirÃ , inoltre, indicazioni sulla possibilitÃ  di ricorrere a strumenti alternativi per la risoluzione della controversia.

Nel caso in cui non riuscissimo a trovare una soluzione soddisfacente per il cliente, Ã¨ possibile:
presentare un ricorso allâ€™Arbitro Bancario Finanziario(nuova tabella)
rivolgersi al Conciliatore Bancario Finanziario(nuova tabella)
Lâ€™ ABF e il CBF sono due sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie, che intervengono nel momento in cui il cliente non riceve risposta oppure se la risoluzione proposta Ã¨ ritenuta insoddisfacente.
In alternativa, si puÃ² ricorrere ad un altro organismo specializzato iscritto nellâ€™apposito registro tenuto dal Ministero della Giustizia. Lâ€™elenco degli organismi di mediazione Ã¨ disponibile sul sito www.giustizia.it.
Infine, la Commissione Europea ha messo a disposizione la Risoluzione delle Controversie Online (ODR(nuova tabella)), una piattaforma per aiutare i consumatori a contestare i contratti online in via stragiudiziale.

title: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
content:
Deine Zufriedenheit hat fÃ¼r uns oberste PrioritÃ¤t. Wir mÃ¶chten unsere Dienstleistungen kontinuierlich verbessern und Probleme umgehend beheben. Dazu brauchen wir deine UnterstÃ¼tzung.
So erreichst du uns:
Am besten kontaktierst du uns per Chat direkt aus deiner App. So kÃ¶nnen wir die meisten Anliegen schnell und unkompliziert lÃ¶sen. 
Ansonsten sende uns dein Feedback gerne von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse an beschwerden@n26.com oder per Post an:
N26 Bank GmbH
Beschwerdemanagement
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 Berlin
Je ausfÃ¼hrlicher du uns den Sachverhalt schilderst, desto schneller kÃ¶nnen wir dein Anliegen prÃ¼fen und beantworten.
DafÃ¼r benÃ¶tigen wir von dir folgende Informationen:
deinen vollstÃ¤ndigen Namen und deine Adresse, sowie deine IBAN (sofern du ein Konto bei uns hast) 
den Service, mit dem du nicht zufrieden bist
eine umfassende Beschreibung deines Anliegens
das Datum, an dem das Problem zum ersten Mal aufgetreten ist
Was machen wir mit deiner Beschwerde?
Unser Ziel ist es, deine Anfrage baldmÃ¶glichst zu bearbeiten und gemeinsam eine LÃ¶sung zu finden. 
Wir informieren dich direkt nach Eingang deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail Ã¼ber die voraussichtliche Bearbeitungszeit und den weiteren Prozess. 
Innerhalb der nÃ¤chsten 15 Arbeitstage nach Eingang deiner Beschwerde kommen wir mit einem LÃ¶sungsvorschlag auf dich zu. Sollten wir die PrÃ¼fung bis dahin noch nicht abgeschlossen haben, melden wir uns ebenfalls bei dir per E-Mail und informieren dich Ã¼ber die voraussichtliche Bearbeitungszeit sowie Ã¼ber die GrÃ¼nde der VerzÃ¶gerung. 
Solltest du wÃ¤hrend dem Bearbeitungszeitraum weitere Fragen haben, kannst du uns gerne jederzeit per E-Mail kontaktieren. 
Alternative Wege zur Einreichung deiner Beschwerde
Solltest du mit unserer angebotenen LÃ¶sung unzufrieden sein, hast du die MÃ¶glichkeit, dich an eine unabhÃ¤ngige dritte Person zu wenden. 
Neben einer Beschwerde in unserem Hause, kannst du dich auch an diese Schlichtungsstellen wenden:
die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbank 
die Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) 
die EuropÃ¤ischen Kommission mittels der EuropÃ¤ischen Online-Streitbeilegungsplattform (ODR).
Wir setzen alles daran, dein Anliegen schnellstmÃ¶glich zu deiner Zufriedenheit zu beantworten. 
Hinweis: Die Bearbeitung von Beschwerden erfolgt kostenfrei.

title: Â¿Por quÃ© N26 hace controles en las transacciones?
content:
Tenemos la responsabilidad de realizar controles rutinarios en cuentas y transacciones para asegurar la seguridad de tu cuenta (verÂ GwG Â§ 10(pestaÃ±a nueva)). Estos controles se basan en transacciones individuales y los inicia nuestro sistema de forma automÃ¡tica.
Como consecuencia, podemos llegar a pedirte algÃºn documento. Si recibes una solicitud de este tipo, simplemente envÃ­a los documentos necesarios vÃ­a Mensajes de N26. No habrÃ¡ excepciones ni forma de pasar por alto dichos controles. 
Este es un proceso estÃ¡ndar para todos los bancos que nos permite asegurar la seguridad a nuestros clientes. Tanto el proceso como el resultado son confidenciales y se tratan de forma interna, lo cual nos ayuda a garantizar la seguridad para nuestros clientes y sus transacciones.
AquÃ­ tienes algunos consejos que te ahorrarÃ¡n tiempo en el proceso:
El documento que necesitas se especifica en el correo que has recibido de N26. Estos documentos nos los puedes enviar escaneados, en fotos o en capturas de pantalla (siempre y cuando el documento estÃ© claramente legible). EnvÃ­a tambiÃ©n una descripciÃ³n detallada. 
SÃ© concreto en tus respuestas, detalles y documentos. Si tus documentos no corroboran claramente tus declaraciones o si omites detalles, tendremos que preguntar otra vez.
Responde lo antes posible y dentro del plazo que se indica en el mensaje. Puedes usar el email que has recibido de N26 para responder directamente y adjuntar los documentos.
El servicio de AtenciÃ³n al Cliente de N26 no tiene mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre este tema.
Debes proporcionarÂ documentos vÃ¡lidosÂ dependiendo de tu situaciÃ³n, a continuaciÃ³n puedes ver algunos ejemplos:
Has recibido ayuda econÃ³mica de tu familia para algÃºn proyecto o has heredado propiedades o dinero: un contrato de concesiÃ³n o prÃ©stamo, un documento oficial de herencia o un documento oficial de la fuente del prÃ©stamo (como por ejemplo los documentos de venta de una propiedad para financiar el prÃ©stamo o los extractos bancarios de los parientes que lo otorgan. 
Has vendido una propiedad o acciones en el mercado de valores: el contrato que muestra el acuerdo o el documento oficial del notario respecto a la transacciÃ³n de la propiedad. 
Has recibido o enviado dinero para pagar facturas o algÃºn producto: documentos que demuestren el saldo disponible confirmando la procedencia del dinero o documentos que muestren el uso del dinero para dicho depÃ³sito.
Has recibido el finiquito de tu antigua empresa: documentos que prueben el cese de la actividad, detallando el pago y/o un extracto bancario de tu antigua empresa.

title: Come verifico la mia identitÃ ?
content:
In qualitÃ  di banca, abbiamo bisogno di sapere chi sei. Ecco perchÃ© devi dimostrare la tua identitÃ  con un documento supportato quando apri un conto con noi o richiedi alcuni prodotti. Dall'8 Luglio 2019 i clienti con nazionalitÃ  italiana residenti in Italia, potranno utilizzare anche patente di guida (emessa dal 2013) + tessera sanitaria durante il processo di verifica.
Non ti chiederemoÂ maiÂ di dimostrare la tua identitÃ  per conto di altre persone o aziende. Abbiamo raccolto deiÂ suggerimenti per aiutarti a proteggere la tua identitÃ .
Puoi mostrarci il tuo documento dâ€™identitÃ  in due modi:Â foto oÂ video. Il modo in cui puoi dimostrare la tua identitÃ  dipende dalla tua nazionalitÃ , dal tuo paese di residenza e dal tipo di documento dâ€™identitÃ  che utilizzi:
Vivo in Germania(nuova tabella)
Vivo fuori dalla Germania(nuova tabella)
Se il tuo passaporto o la tua carta dâ€™identitÃ  non sono inclusi nel nostro elenco, significa che non possiamo offrirti un conto in questo momento. La verifica dellâ€™identitÃ  Ã¨ un argomento serio per noi. Se il tuo documento dâ€™identitÃ  non Ã¨ presente nellâ€™elenco, la nostra assistenza clienti non potrÃ  fare eccezioni per te.
Aggiungiamo continuamente nuovi documenti a questo elenco, quindi vale la pena controllare di tanto in tanto se il tuo Ã¨ stato aggiunto.
La chat Ã¨ disponibile dal lunedÃ¬ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: Quand est-ce que je recevrai ma carte ?
content:
Votre carte est fabriquÃ©e et envoyÃ©e dÃ¨s que la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© est validÃ©e.
Suivant le pays de destination, la livraison peut prendre jusquâ€™Ã  10 jours ouvrÃ©s. Les dÃ©lais de livraison vers les pays suivants peuvent varier : Espagne, Estonie, GrÃ¨ce, Italie, Pays-Bas, Portugal, Slovaquie et GrÃ¨ce.Â 
Avant de procÃ©der Ã  la commande dâ€™une nouvelle carte, veuillez considÃ©rer les points suivants :
Si la livraison Ã©choue et que votre carte nous est retournÃ©e, nous vous le ferons savoir par email.
Si vous avez commandÃ© votre carte il y a moins de 10 jours ouvrÃ©s, nous vous invitons Ã  attendre avant de nous contacter.
Si vous avez commandÃ© une carte N26 Metal, nous vous lâ€™enverrons automatiquement dÃ¨s que le solde de votre compte vous permettra de rÃ©gler la premiÃ¨reÂ mensualitÃ© de 16,90 â‚¬. Nous vous invitons donc Ã  alimenter votre compte si cela est nÃ©cessaire.
Si le dÃ©lai de livraison estimÃ© est dÃ©passÃ©, veuillez vÃ©rifier que votre adresse de livraison est Ã  jour. Rendez-vous depuis votre application N26 dans la section Mon Compte ðŸ‘¤  > ParamÃ¨tres > ParamÃ¨tres personnels > Adresse de livraison.
Si votre adresse de livraison Ã©tait incorrecte et qu'il s'agit de votre premiÃ¨re carte N26, veuillez-nous contacter sur le Livechat pour que nous puissions procÃ©der Ã  la commande d'une nouvelle carte.
Si votre adresse de livraison Ã©tait incorrecte et que vous possÃ©diez dÃ©jÃ  une carte N26 active, vous devez commander une nouvelle carte depuis votre application.
Si votre adresse de livraison Ã©tait correcte, il y a sans doute eu un incident avec la livraison. Veuillez-nous contacter sur le Livechat pour que nous puissions procÃ©der Ã  la commande d'une nouvelle carte.

Si votre carte n'arrive pas Ã  destination ou si vous avez besoin de votre carte rapidement, vous pouvez la commander en livraison Express (avec des frais supplÃ©mentaires). La livraison peut prendre jusqu'Ã  3 jours ouvrÃ©s.
Nous ne proposons que la livraison Standard pour la carte N26 Metal. Les cartes de couleur Noir carbone et Gris perle seront livrÃ©es sous 10 jours ouvrÃ©s et les cartes de couleur Sable corail sous 3 semaines.
Si votre adresse contient des caractÃ¨res spÃ©ciaux, veuillez nous contacter sur le Livechat.
Nous envoyons les cartes uniquement Ã  des adresses rÃ©sidentielles (les entreprises ne sont pas acceptÃ©es).
N'entrez pas d'espace lorsque vous entrez le code postal de votre adresse de livraison.
Assurez-vous qu'il ne manque pas d'informations importantes pour la livraison (par exemple, le nom sur votre boÃ®te aux lettres si vous habitez en Allemagne ou votre numÃ©ro de bÃ¢timent, numÃ©ro de cage d'escalier et digicode le cas Ã©chÃ©ant). Si vous sÃ©journez temporairement quelque part (chez un ami ou dans un Airbnb), assurez-vous d'inclure le nom sur la boÃ®te aux lettres qui appartient au rÃ©sident principal de l'appartement.
Si vous dÃ©mÃ©nagez et qu'il s'agit de votre premiÃ¨re carte, assurez-vous de sÃ©lectionner le pays et l'adresse oÃ¹ vous allez dÃ©mÃ©nager et souhaitez recevoir votre carte N26.
Si vous attendez la livraison de votre premiÃ¨re carte, assurez-vous que votre adresse de livraison soit bien dans le pays oÃ¹ vous avez ouvert votre compte.

title: Cosa succede se il mio saldo Ã¨ negativo?
content:
Il tuo saldo puÃ² essere negativo entro i limiti del tuoÂ Scoperto.
Se hai il saldo in negativo, ti verrÃ  accreditato un interesse di scoperto pari all' 8.9%.
In caso contrario, riceverai una email di notifica che il limite autorizzato sul tuo conto Ã¨ stato superato. CiÃ² implica che non hai fondi sufficienti sul conto per coprire addebiti futuri.
Anche se non hai usato il tuo conto da quando l'hai aperto, alcuni addebiti possono ancora avvenire (tanto come le commissioni mensili di N26 You e N26 Metal, o i costi della consegna express) facendo risultare il tuo saldo negativo.
Avrai quindi bisogno diÂ caricare il tuo contoÂ tramite bonifico SEPA (scegli bonifico internazionale se stai effettuando il bonifico da fuori la Germania) oÂ CASH26Â (se sei in Germania o Austria). Non facendolo, il tuo conto rimarrÃ  attivo per i 60 giorni successivi. A quel punto:
Riceverai due ulteriori solleciti (al costo di â‚¬3 ciascuno).
Se hai uno Scoperto: sarÃ  cancellato dopo il secondo sollecito e dovrai ripagare quell'ammontare immediatamente (o puoi stabilire un piano di rimborso).
Se hai un conto N26 You, N26 Metal, o N26 Business You: tutti i vantaggi saranno cancellati dopo 60 giorni e il tuo conto sarÃ  convertito a Standard.
Se non rispondi dopo 60 giorni, potremmo chiudere il tuo conto.

title: Comment N26 gÃ¨re mes informations fiscales ?
content:
Afin de prÃ©server l'intÃ©gritÃ© des systÃ¨mes fiscaux, divers pays ont adoptÃ© une dÃ©claration commune sur les informations relatives aux impÃ´ts. Les Ã©tats membres de l'OCDE ont ratifiÃ© leÂ Common Standard Reporting(nouvel onglet)Â (CRS), fournissant aux pays participants un cadre pour le partage d'informations en matiÃ¨re fiscale.
N26 peut vous demander de soumettre votre numÃ©ro d'identification fiscale ou votre numÃ©ro dâ€™assurance sur la base des critÃ¨res suivants, qui sont considÃ©rÃ©s comme une indication que vous puissiez Ãªtre responsable fiscalement dans un pays participant au CRS :
Vous vivez dans un pays qui participe au CRS
Vous avez une boÃ®te postale ou adresse dans un pays qui participe au CRS
Le numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone que vous avez enregistrÃ© sur votre compte N26 est originaire d'un pays oÃ¹ le CRS est en vigueur
Vous avez un virement automatique ou des virements rÃ©currents Ã  un compte qui est basÃ© dans un pays en accord avec le CRS
De mÃªme, N26 Bank est enregistrÃ©e auprÃ¨s du U.S.Â Internal Revenue Service(nouvel onglet)Â (IRS) et est donc lÃ©galement obligÃ© de passer en revue les dÃ©tails personnels de nos clients en ce qui concerne l'obligation fiscale aux Ã‰tats-Unis(nouvel onglet), et de les dÃ©clarer dans le cadre de la FATCA. N26 peut demander des documents supplÃ©mentaires, tels que votre numÃ©ro de sÃ©curitÃ© sociale complet (SSN), afin d'Ã©valuer votre situation fiscale aux Ã‰tats-Unis. Certains indicateurs selon lesquels vous pourriez Ãªtre imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis :
Vous Ãªtes un citoyen des Ã‰tats-Unis (ou vous avez la double nationalitÃ©)
Le numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone enregistrÃ© sur votre compte N26 est un numÃ©ro amÃ©ricain
Vous Ãªtes nÃ© aux Ã‰tats-Unis (ou dans une ambassade amÃ©ricaine)
Vous avez fourni une adresse amÃ©ricaine
Vous avez mis en place des virements permanents vers les Ã‰tats-Unis
Votre numÃ©ro d'identification fiscale pourra vous Ãªtre demandÃ© par N26 sur la base des critÃ¨res suivants, lesquels sont considÃ©rÃ©s comme indiquant une potentielle responsabilitÃ© fiscale dans un pays participant au CRS :
Ouvrez ðŸ‘¤ Mon compte puis choisissez ParamÃ¨tres et ParamÃ¨tres personnels
Appuyez sur Informations fiscales
SÃ©lectionnez le pays dans lequel vous Ãªtes imposable.
Entrez votre numÃ©ro fiscal ou votre Social Security Number dans l'Ã©cran suivant.
Informations importantes
En Allemagne, nous avons besoin de votre Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 caractÃ¨res) et non de votre steuernummer (9 caractÃ¨res).
Dans tous les cas, vos informations personnelles seront stockÃ©es de faÃ§on sÃ©curisÃ©e et traitÃ©es uniquement en accord avec les besoins du CRS et FATCA.
Merci de noter que nous ne sommes pas autorisÃ©s Ã  vous conseiller sur votre statut d'imposition. Si vous n'Ãªtes pas sÃ»r de votre statut fiscal, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal.
Si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  renseignÃ© votre pays de rÃ©sidence fiscale mais pas votre identifiant fiscal, il vous suffit de supprimer le pays actuellement renseignÃ© dans l'application et de l'ajouter Ã  nouveau. Vous pourrez alors renseigner votre identifiant fiscal.

title: Wie behalte ich meine tÃ¤glichen Ausgaben im Blick?
content:
Wir sortieren deineÂ TransaktionenÂ automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Statistik an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:
Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen Ã¼ber EinzelhÃ¤ndler und ZahlungsgrÃ¼nde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach Ã¤ndern, indem du die Transaktion auswÃ¤hlst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste auswÃ¤hlst.
Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags fÃ¼r Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#BÃ¼cher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugefÃ¼gt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzufÃ¼gst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzufÃ¼gen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerwÃ¼nschte Tags zu entfernen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15â‚¬ fÃ¼r jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to get your COVID-19 stimulus payment
content:
During times of uncertainty, we know managing your finances can be challenging. Thankfully, the U.S. COVID-19 stimulus package for the CARES Act is rolling out to those eligible and will assist during these unprecedented times.

Submit your N26 account and routing number to the IRS to get your stimulus payment via direct deposit. Hereâ€™s how:
1. Find your N26 account and routing number by tapping the â€œMy Accountâ€ icon on the top right corner of theÂ N26 mobileÂ application.
2. Enter your N26 account information on the IRSÂ Get My Payment website(new tab).
Please note that our Customer Support team does not have information on the status of stimulus package payments. Check theÂ IRS website(new tab)Â for the most accurate and up-to-date information. 
We hope you are staying safe and looking after those close to you.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: PerchÃ© il mio acquisto online non Ã¨ riuscito?
content:
Consigli e suggerimenti per una transazione corretta:

Se lâ€™importo sul sito dellâ€™esercente Ã¨ diverso da quello indicato nel messaggio push, ciÃ² puÃ² essere dovuto alla conversione di una valuta estera in euro.
Assicurati di disabilitare tutti gli Adblocker in esecuzione sul tuo browser.
La tua carta Maestro non puÃ² essere utilizzata per gli acquisti online.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo crear un Espacio Compartido?
content:
Para crear un espacio compartido:
Crea un espacio en la secciÃ³n Espacios. 

Pulsa sobre el icono de ''Espacio'' en la parte inferior de la pantalla.

Lee la informaciÃ³n con detalle y pulsa en ''Invitar nuevo miembro''.

Selecciona el contacto de la lista de usuario de N26 que deseas aÃ±adir. Si esta persona tiene una cuenta de N26 pero no aparece en la lista, te recomendamos que le preguntes si tiene la opciÃ³n de visibilidad para otros usuarios activada en la app. Puedes hacerlo desde Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > ConfiguraciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n personal. 

QuizÃ¡ sea necesario que introduzcas su nombre completo, tal y como lo tiene en la cuenta.

Revisa la informaciÃ³n acerca del poder notarial (en la secciÃ³n legal) y cuando lo hayas leÃ­do, marca la casilla para indicar que estÃ¡s de acuerdo con los tÃ©rminos y condiciones y para garantizar a esa persona el poder notarial.

Introduce tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.

Pulsa sobre el participante que vas a aÃ±adir.

Confirma la notificaciÃ³n ''Enviar invitaciÃ³n'' que te llegarÃ¡ a tu dispositivo vinculado.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking per fornitori terzi
content:
Stiamo collaborando con Token.io(nuova tabella) per offrire e supportare un'interfaccia dedicata per fornitori di servizi di pagamento terzi (TTP). La documentazione completa e le istruzioni per avviare la procedura sono disponibili nel Token.io developer portal(nuova tabella).
N26 ha implementato una misura di emergenza in conformitÃ  con gli obblighi legali della PSD2.
La misura di emergenza implementata da N26 prevede:
L'identificazione sicura dei TPP previa la verifica del CertificatoÂ di Autenticazione Web Qualificato (QWAC);
L'accesso protetto e autorizzato ad un conto.
I TTP possono accedere alla nostra misura di emergenza attraverso il seguente URL:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Per effettuare l'accesso all'URL e stabilire una connessione TLS viene richiesto il possesso di un certificato qualificato.
Qui di seguito troverai la documentazione tecnica dettagliata dell'interfaccia di fallback:
AISP Fallback Documentation(nuova tabella)
PISP Fallback Documentation(nuova tabella)
Fornitori di servizi di pagamento terzi (TTP) possono contattare N26 tramite l'indirizzo email open.banking@n26.com per fornire il loro certificato QWAC e ricevere assistenza tecnica.
I seguenti rapporti mettono a confronto la disponibilitÃ  e le prestazioni della nostra interfaccia dedicata PSD2 con l'interfaccia utente N26:
Terzo trimestre del 2019(nuova tabella)
Quarto trimestre del 2019(nuova tabella)

title: Wie schÃ¼tzt N26 mein Geld?
content: DieÂ deutsche Einlagensicherung(neuen Tab)Â versichert alle EinlagenÂ bis zu 100.000 â‚¬Â in den Mitgliedsstaaten der EuropÃ¤ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz muss die N26 Bank die Vorschriften der Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht einhalten.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo hacer transferencias en moneda extranjera?
content:

Para realizar una transferencia en moneda extranjera, entra en la app N26 con tu mÃ³vil, toca el botÃ³n + y despuÃ©s Transferencias. title: Come creare e modificare ordini permanenti?
content:

Ãˆ possibile visualizzare i trasferimenti programmati e gli ordini permanenti direttamente nell'app mobile N26:

Quindi clicca sui tre puntini in alto a destra per Android, o appena sopra la tua lista transazioni per iOS.

In questo menu Ã¨ possibile annullare e / o modificare i dettagli di tali transazioni. Per cancellare un ordine permanente, trascinalo semplicemente fino all'icona del cestino. 
â„¹ï¸ Â Ti preghiamo di ricordare che, in caso un trasferimento periodico fallisca per insufficienza di fondi, non effettueremo nuovamente il bonifico - dovrai effettuare il bonifico manualmente. Tuttavia i successivi trasferimenti programmati procederanno normalmente.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.Â 


Adding money with a Debit or Credit card
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap â€œAdd moneyâ€ and select â€œCard transferâ€
Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap â€œAdd moneyâ€ and select â€œApple Payâ€ or â€œGoogle Payâ€
Choose an amountÂ 
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly

Accepted cards: 
Visa and Mastercard cards that have a 16-digit card number. 
Prepaid cards are not accepted (ex: Brand A, Brand B etc.). 
To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).Â 

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
content:
Gli Spazi Condivisi rappresentano un modo nuovo e facile per utenti N26 di condividere denaro. Questi Spazi possono essere utili per suddividere il costo delle utenze, per pianificare una vacanza oppure per organizzare lâ€™acquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o parente.
Spazi Condivisi Ã¨ unâ€™opzione disponibile per gli utenti N26 premium (Business You, You e Metal), i quali possono creare uno Spazio e invitare altri utenti a prenderne parte.
Tutti gli utenti N26 possono essere invitati a partecipare ad uno Spazio.
Il proprietario dello Spazio diventa proprietario del denaro depositato.
Il proprietario dello Spazio puÃ² invitare fino a 10 partecipanti oppure decidere di rimuoverli.
Gli Spazi Condivisi non hanno un codice IBAN o una carta associata.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile andÂ WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as youâ€™d like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, youâ€™ll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select â€˜Hide space balanceâ€™.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zurÃ¼ckzahlen kann?
content:

B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht mÃ¶glich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem spÃ¤teren Zeitpunkt zurÃ¼ckzuzahlen.
Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.
Ãœbrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es Ã¼ber einen lÃ¤ngeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle KÃ¼ndigungsdaten sind endgÃ¼ltig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zurÃ¼ck. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein InkassobÃ¼ro weitergeleitet.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
All incoming ACH payments are completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch over two working days.
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation as we cannot track incoming transfers.
Related Topics
"Why hasnâ€™t my money arrived?"
There are a few reasons why this may have happened.
Please double check with the payment sender that the correct account and routing number were used.Â 
Ensure that the payment sender put your correct name as it is written on your ID. A correct account and routing number are not sufficient.

title: Â¿QuÃ© hace N26 con mi informaciÃ³n fiscal?
content:
La OCDE (OrganizaciÃ³n para la CooperaciÃ³n y el Desarrollo EconÃ³micos) requiere cierta informaciÃ³n fiscal que ha de ser compartida por medio delÂ EstÃ¡ndar ComÃºn de Reporte(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â (ECR). title: Warum war eine Zahlung hÃ¶her als erwartet?
content:
Alle Transaktionen erfolgen in Echtzeit. Du bekommst eine Push-Nachricht, wenn eine Zahlung ein- oder ausgeht.
Manchmal kann eine Transaktion verdÃ¤chtig aussehen, weil der belastete Endbetrag aus verschiedenen GrÃ¼nden vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:
Ein HÃ¤ndler sperrt einen hÃ¶heren Betrag fÃ¼r eine Kaution (z. B. an einer Tankstelle, bei einer Autovermietung oder Hotelbuchung). Die Differenz wird deinem Konto gutgeschrieben, sobald die Kaution nicht mehr gebraucht wird.
Bei Transaktionen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen kÃ¶nnen WechselkursÃ¤nderungen zu kleinen Abweichungen der Gesamtsumme fÃ¼hren.
In beiden FÃ¤llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen fÃ¼r die Betragsdifferenz.
Wenn du aber sicher bist, dass eine Transaktion nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, kÃ¶nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zurÃ¼ckzubekommen.

title: Taking steps to keep you and your family safe
content:
In light of recent global developments surrounding coronavirus (COVID-19), weâ€™d like to take a moment to let you know that weâ€™re taking all the necessary steps to make sure our banking and customer service capabilities remain uninterrupted and ready to support you in these uncertain times. Please rest assured that your N26 account â€” along with all of our products and features â€” will continue to function normally, and weâ€™re working with our Customer Support teams to make sure we have coverage to answer your questions.
We are closely following guidance from the CDC, the World Health Organization (WHO), and local health authorities to prioritize our teamsâ€™ safety and to find ways to best keep supporting you.
We recommend you take this opportunity to make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app so you have access to our latest tools and services. With N26, you can:
Add money to your account without leaving home.
Shop online anywhere debit cards are accepted.
Transfer funds instantly to other N26 users with MoneyBeam.
View balances, transactions, and statements from the N26 app.
Should you need to access cash, our ATM map in the â€œActionsâ€ tab of the N26 app can help you find the most convenient location out of over 55,000 fee-free AllPoint ATMs, plus you have 2 additional free out-of-network withdrawals per month from anywhere in the US.
Contact our customer support team(new tab)
Learn more about adding money to your N26 account directly from the app or onlineÂ here(new tab), and check outÂ our blog(new tab)Â for more updates.
In the meantime, weâ€™re working hard to make sure we support you as the situation develops. Please take time to focus on yourself and your familyâ€™s health and wellbeing.
Weâ€™re wishing you all the best. Stay safe out there.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
We have limits for bank transactions and debit card transactions.
Maximum Daily Limits (total sum within 24 hours):
POS:  Daily:  $5,000; Monthly:  $30,000
ATM:  Daily:  $1,500; Monthly:  $10,000
ACH:  No limits for incoming credits or debits
Limits can NOT be raised above the maximum.
These limits are in place to protect the account from potential fraudulent activity.
You can customize your daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits directly in the N26 mobile application by:
Logging into the mobile application.
Tapping on the "Actions" icon in the lower right-hand corner of the screen.
Tapping on "Card Settings" under the "Manage" menu.
Tapping on "Limits" under the "Settings" menu.
Adjusting the "Daily Withdrawal Limit" and/or "Daily Payment Limit" sliders.  


The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen Ã¼ber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder auslÃ¤ndischen EntitÃ¤ten zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen, die laut FATCA fÃ¼r U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.
FATCA steht fÃ¼r Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur BekÃ¤mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. EingefÃ¼hrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, auslÃ¤ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute dafÃ¼r zu nutzen, ihre VermÃ¶genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr Ã¼ber FATCA oder den IRS erfÃ¤hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.
Anders als die meisten LÃ¤nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-StaatsbÃ¼rger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen LÃ¤nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer BÃ¼rger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen BÃ¼rger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.
Um zuverlÃ¤ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, mÃ¼ssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:
Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische StaatsangehÃ¶rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?

Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, heiÃŸt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine persÃ¶nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zunÃ¤chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine SteuererklÃ¤rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlieÃŸlich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.

Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.
Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen fÃ¼r dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil bestÃ¤tigst.
Falls sich deine Lage verÃ¤ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 

Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via aÂ push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of theÂ troubleshooting tipsÂ we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, youâ€™ll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchantâ€™s website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.

title: What is MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam is a service that allows you to send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members.
How can I send money using MoneyBeam?
Launch the N26 mobile app.
Tap the "Actions" icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
Tap "Send Money" in the Transfer Money section.
Select the contact you are sending a MoneyBeam to.
Enter the amount you are sending in dollars and cents.
Tap "Continue".
Enter an optional, brief message to the recipient (max. 135 characters).
Tap "Send".
Enter your Confirmation PIN to initiate the transfer.
A "Confirm MoneyBeam" screen will be displayed showing the transaction details.
If all is in order, tap "Confirm" to execute the MoneyBeam.
Your Home screen will be displayed showing the MoneyBeam transaction that was just completed.
How can I request money using MoneyBeam?
Launch the N26 mobile app.
Tap the "Actions" icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
Tap "Request money" in the Transfer Money section.
Select the contact you are requesting a MoneyBeam from.
Enter the amount you are requesting in dollars and cents.
Enter an optional, brief message to the person from whom you are requesting money (max. 135 characters).
Tap "Request".
Your Home screen will be displayed once the request has been successfully sent.
When the requested MoneyBeam is sent to you, an entry will be made in your Transaction List showing the credited amount.
What do I do when I receive a MoneyBeam Request?
When you receive a MoneyBeam Request from another US N26 customer, you can either accept or reject it.  Either way, you will first have to launch the N26 mobile app to see the details of the request.
Your Home screen will be displayed along with a transaction list showing a "Pending transaction" (the MoneyBeam Request).
Tap on the transaction to go to the next screen.
The "Request details" screen will be displayed.  Either accept or decline the request by tapping on the appropriate icon.
If you accept the request, you will be taken to the "Identity Check" screen.
Enter the 4 digit Confirmation PIN that you created earlier.  This will initiate the transfer.
After entering your Confirmation PIN, you will be asked a final time to either confirm or delete the transaction.  Please note:  Once confirmed, the transaction cannot be canceled.
After the transfer is complete, your Home screen will be displayed with a Transaction List showing the funds that were withdrawn from your account.

Related topics
"Can I send a MoneyBeam to a Non-N26 customer?"
Unfortunately, no. MoneyBeam transfers can only occur between N26 customers.
"Can I send a MoneyBeam to a Non-US N26 customer?"
Unfortunately, no. US MoneyBeam transfers can only be made to fellow US N26 customers.
"Do I actively have to opt in to use MoneyBeam?"
Yes, both parties have to actively opt in to use the MoneyBeam feature.
"Are there limits to MoneyBeam?"
Yes. The maximum amount that you can transfer isÂ $3,000 (per transaction), $3,000 daily limit (rolling 24 hours), and a $12,000 monthly limit (= per calendar month).
"Are there fees associated with MoneyBeam?"
No, there are no fees to use MoneyBeam.
"How will this transaction show up in my account?"
Each MoneyBeam transaction will show up as a 2 line item in the transaction detail file. One line will have a positive amount, and the other line will have a negative amount depending on who is sending the money (debited) and who is receiving the money (credited).
"How can I make sure that I am visible/not visible to all of my contacts?"Â 
That's easy! To make sure that you are visible/not visible:
Go toÂ ðŸ‘¤My AccountÂ in the application.
SelectÂ "Settings"â†’"Personal settings"â†’"Personal Information".Â 
To allow other N26 users in your contact list to find you for easier transfers, make sure the toggle switch at the bottom of the screen is activated. 
To be invisible, simply deactivate the switch.
"Why can't I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?"
If you donâ€™t see a friend on MoneyBeam but you know they are an N26 user:
They most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Please share the process above with them.
Make sure your friend's contact number/email is the same as the one associated with their N26 account.

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie bekomme ich einen Kredit?
content:
Mit N26 Credit haben wir eine Partnerschaft mit auxmoney (in Deutschland) und Younited Credit (in Frankreich) geschlossen, um Privatkredite zwischen 1.000 und 50.000 â‚¬ mit einer Laufzeit von 6 bis 84 Monaten anzubieten.
Beantrage jederzeit ein Darlehen direkt in der App im Bereich Entdecken und dann unter N26 Finanzprodukte.Â Wir stellen dir einige Fragen zum Darlehen und zu deinerÂ KreditwÃ¼rdigkeitÂ (du musst zusÃ¤tzliche Onlinebanking-Informationen angeben, wenn du N26 weniger als 6 Monate genutzt hast).
Weise deine IdentitÃ¤t nach.Â Wir benÃ¶tigen deinen Personalausweis oder Reisepass in Deutschland und eventuell deinen Wohnsitznachweis (in Form einer Stromrechnung o. Ã¤.). Als Nicht-EU-BÃ¼rger musst du uns ein Foto deiner Aufenthaltsgenehmigung schicken.
Bearbeite deine Antworten wÃ¤hrend des Antragsprozesses.Â Wenn du mit deinem Kreditantrag zufrieden bist, sende ihn in Echtzeit an uns und wir machen dir ein verbindliches Angebot, das du lÃ¶schen oder annehmen kannst. Andernfalls verfallen die AntrÃ¤ge in 90 Tagen und du kannst wÃ¤hrend dieser Zeit keinen weiteren Kredit beantragen.
BestÃ¤tige deinen Kredit.Â Wenn du unser Angebot annimmst, musst du den Vertrag entweder elektronisch per Videoanruf unterzeichnen oder per SMS bestÃ¤tigen.
Du erhÃ¤ltst eine Push-Nachricht, sobald die Auszahlung erfolgt ist.Â In Deutschland wird der Kreditbetrag in 5-7 Werktagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben. In Frankreich dauert die Auszahlung eine Woche.
Wir bieten ZinssÃ¤tze zwischen 1,99% und 19% p. a. an. AuÃŸer den Zinsen fallen keine weiteren Kosten an. Wenn du jedochÂ deinen Plan Ã¤nderstÂ oder mit deinen monatlichen Zahlungen in Verzug bist, kÃ¶nnen zusÃ¤tzliche GebÃ¼hren anfallen.
Weitere Informationen findest du in denÂ AGB(neuen Tab)Â zu N26 Credit.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance canâ€™t cover a direct debit* when itâ€™s due, itâ€™ll bounce and youâ€™ll be charged aÂ â‚¬3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. Itâ€™s not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether youâ€™re eligible for anÂ OverdraftÂ directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
Youâ€™ll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whetherÂ MoneyBeam, standing orders, orÂ CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you eitherÂ ConfirmÂ orÂ CancelÂ it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from yourÂ card PINÂ but you can use the same number for both. Youâ€™ll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN afterÂ connecting your smartphoneÂ (whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN byÂ changing itÂ in the app: go toÂ ðŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ then tapÂ SettingsÂ andÂ Security. Then tapÂ Change Confirmation PINÂ (iPhone) orÂ Reset Confirmation PINÂ (Android).

title: Â¿CÃ³mo proteger mi identidad?
content:
Para proteger y ayudar a evitar el mal uso de tus datos personales, te recomendamos tener esto en cuenta:
N26 nunca va aÂ verificar tu identidadÂ en nombre de otras personas o empresas.Â Esto incluye verificaciones para contratos de alquiler de vivienda, lÃ­neas de crÃ©dito u ofertas de trabajo (incluyendo ofertas de N26). Completa el proceso de verificaciÃ³n sÃ³lo si quieres abrir una cuenta de N26 para ti mismo.
Como titular de la cuenta, solo tÃº debes crear y tener acceso a tus credenciales de inicio de sesiÃ³n.Â AsÃ­ que nunca abras una cuenta N26 con un correo y contraseÃ±a predefinidos. Si lo haces, estas credenciales pueden utilizarse para conseguir tu informaciÃ³n legal y personal. Tampoco debes iniciar sesiÃ³n nunca en una cuenta N26 que no sea la tuya.
Nunca envÃ­es tu carnet de identidad ni tu pasaporte a desconocidos o destinatarios no verificados.
N26 podrÃ­a solicitar ciertos documentos cuando alguna de tus transacciones estÃ© pasando un control rutinario.Â EnvÃ­a dicha documentaciÃ³n solo a direcciones de email verificadas de N26.
N26 nunca te preguntarÃ¡ tu usuario, contraseÃ±a o cÃ³digo PIN fuera de la app N26.Â No proporciones nunca esta informaciÃ³n en una app o pÃ¡gina web externa, incluso si parece estar relacionada con N26.
Si alguna vez te sientes inseguro, has recibido una solicitud sospechosa de un tercero o piensas que tus credenciales de N26 podrÃ­an estar comprometidos, por favor no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros.

title: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
content:
SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem es Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einfÃ¼hrt. Wenn du dich in dein N26 Konto in der WebApp oder einem nicht-verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t einloggst, wirst du nach einer zusÃ¤tzlichen BestÃ¤tigung gefragt. Diese kannst du entweder via Push-Mitteilung von deinem verknÃ¼pften Handy geben oder indem du einen Authentifizierungs-Code bestÃ¤tigst, den wir dir per SMS schicken. So wird die Sicherheit erhÃ¶ht, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.Â 
Wenn du dich vom verknÃ¼pften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass der Login Prozess von deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t unverÃ¤ndert bleibt.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:

title: How do I change my card limits?
content:
Debit card limits are used to protect an account from fraud and are typically withdrawal or payment limits.  The overall maximum debit card limits are shown below and are set by N26 .  Lower debit card limit amounts can be set by you, the account holder.
Point of Sale (POS) Daily:  $5,000;  Monthly:  $30,000
ATM Daily:  $1,500;  Monthly:  $10,000
Please note that:  Limits canâ€™t be raised above the maximum.Â 
To set or change your daily withdrawal or payment limits simply:
Log into the mobile application.
Tap on "Actions".
Tap on "Card Settings".
Tap on "Limits".
Use the sliders to set your desired daily withdrawal and payment limits.
These limits will then be applied instantly to your N26 debit card.


The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to use N26 Savings?
content:
(Applies to Germany and Austria)
With N26 Savings, you can open a fixed savings account with a deposit between â‚¬2.000 to â‚¬100.000 for free. You can find it in theÂ Explore section thenÂ N26 Financial Products. You wonâ€™t be able to access the deposited amount until the plan matures (from 3 to 60 months) but youâ€™ll earn up to 1.48% in interest during that time. After that, youâ€™ll receive the payout directly into your N26 account.
N26 Savings is possible through the close cooperation of three companies(new tab) with different partner banks. Youâ€™ll have to accept the T&Cs of all four participating parties to open an account.
For regulatory reasons, weâ€™ll need information about your tax status. If youâ€™re taxable in the United States, weâ€™re currently unable to offer you our savings product.
You may be eligible for tax exemption. If so, complete our form(new tab) and open a chat with us. We'll forward your request to our partner bank.
As soon as you open your Savings account, the one-off amount will be debited from your current account. Please note that it can take up to 7 working days before your account is opened.
When the plan matures, youâ€™ll receive the deposited amount and the interest (minus any capital gains tax if applicable) into your N26 account within 2 days.
European law requires all member states to provide legal protection of up to â‚¬100.000 per person per bank. We set an additional limit on Savings accounts in countries outside the eurozone so that this protection doesnâ€™t fall below this limit in the event of exchange rate fluctuations.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You (formerly Black)?
content:
You can upgrade to N26 YouÂ during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to You from the mobile app:

For Android: Log into the mobile app, swipe right until you reach the Upgrade tab next to your current balance and select Get You. 
After choosing your preferred delivery method and accepting the N26 You T&C's(new tab), youâ€™ll have to confirm your request by entering your Confirmation PIN. Then your new card will be on the way.

The membership fee of Â£4.90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: How to set Rules for Spaces?
content:
Within your Spaces, you can set your own Rules! Rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your Spaces to save money and organise your finances.
Â If you want to set a Rule through the Web App, hereâ€™s what you need to know:
Process a Spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.
To delete a Rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. Youâ€™ll see all the active rules. Clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.
If you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the Space you created the rule in, and then create a new one.
If you want to set a Rule through an Android device, you have two options:
From Spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm
 2. After setting a Space Transfer > select Repeat > choose frequency and date > confirm
Â If you want to set a Rule through an iOS device, this is what you need to do:
Â Â Â Â Â From Spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirmÂ 
Â Please be aware that both Spaces Rules and Standing Orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 UTC). This means if you have a Rule and Standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both.
If you have Standing Orders that are dependent on your Rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the Standing Order is set for the day after the Rule. This also means that if you want to prioritise your Standing Orders they need to be set for the day before your Rules.
Please note that, if you have an activated Overdraft, a Rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

title: Was sind Spaces?
content:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und Ã¼berweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App undÂ WebApp(neuen Tab)Â verfÃ¼gbar.
Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder primÃ¤ren Space) kannst du noch weitere Spaces erstellen und lÃ¶schen. Die Anzahl der parallel aktiven Spaces hÃ¤ngt von deinem Kontotyp ab: Bei einem N26 Konto und N26 Business Konto kannst duÂ 2 weitere SpacesÂ neben deinem primÃ¤ren Space nutzen, bei unseren Premium-Konten N26 You, N26 Business You und N26 Metal sind esÂ 10 zusÃ¤tzliche Spaces.
Die KontoauszÃ¼ge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces Ã¼berwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die KontoauszÃ¼ge kannst du online herunterladen.
Nur dein primÃ¤rer Space kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einenÂ DispokreditÂ hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur BetrÃ¤ge Ã¼berweisen, die dort jeweils auch verfÃ¼gbar sind.
Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem primÃ¤ren Space fÃ¼r Mastercard Zahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld Ã¼berweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf tÃ¤tigen kannst.
Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedrÃ¼ckt hÃ¤ltst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.
Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf Ã¼berweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen mÃ¶chtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.
Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe dafÃ¼r zum gewÃ¼nschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".
Spaces enthÃ¤lt eine Funktion, die â€œRegelnâ€ heiÃŸt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.

Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15 â‚¬ fÃ¼r jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To carry out real time transactions, like MoneyBeam, money requests or to use features like Shared Spaces, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customerâ€.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
Why I have to be visible as an N26 user ?
You can access to all our in-app features,Â e.g.Â MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions withoutÂ typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visibleÂ enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 usersÂ selected from your contact list.

title: Come noleggiare unâ€™auto con la tua carta N26
content:
Dal 25 febbraio al 25 maggio 2020 puoi usufruire della collaborazione tra N26 e Rentalcars.com: otterrai uno sconto del 15% prenotando un veicolo tramite questo link(nuova tabella). 

Generalmente, per poter noleggiare unâ€™auto Ã¨ obbligatorio che il guidatore principale sia in possesso di una carta di credito. Tuttavia, considerato il crescente utilizzo di altre tipologie di carte da parte dei consumatori, alcune compagnie di autonoleggio hanno introdotto la possibilitÃ  di noleggiare auto anche con le carte di debito.

Con la tua carta Mastercard N26, quindi, sarai in grado di noleggiare auto presso un numero sempre crescente di compagnie. Qui di seguito troverai i nomi di alcune delle agenzie alle quali potrai rivolgerti:
Alamo
Avis
Centauro
Enterprise
Europecar
Firefly
Joy rent
Locauto
Maggiore
SicilyByCar
Thrifty car rental
Prima di noleggiare un veicolo, ti suggeriamo di contattare la compagnia di tuo interesse: le condizioni per il noleggio sono a discrezione delle singole agenzie, quindi i requisiti possono variare a livello locale e nazionale.
Ricorda, inoltre, di verificare se lâ€™agenzia accetta carte di debito non solo al momento della prenotazione, ma anche al momento del ritiro del veicolo. In aggiunta, a volte puÃ² essere richiesto che la carta abbia i dati in rilievo.

Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:
nel caso in cui venga addebitato un importo imprevisto o ingiustificato, sarÃ  necessario contattare ed, eventualmente, avviare una contestazione direttamente con lâ€™agenzia in questione. Nel caso la contestazione abbia un esito negativo, possiamo offrire la nostra assistenza per avviare una nuova contestazione tramite Mastercard.
sulla carta di debito verrÃ  addebitato (e non autorizzato, come avviene per le carte di credito) il deposito cauzionale, il cui importo varia a seconda delle tipologia di auto e dallâ€™agenzia. La cauzione sarÃ , poi, riaccreditato sul tuo conto dopo la restituzione dellâ€™auto e la verifica delle sue condizioni.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
An online payment can fail for several reasons. Here are some of the most common reasons:
Your account is low on funds. Donâ€™t forget to check your balance before making an online purchase. Your balance must be greater than the total purchase amount.
The card settings in the mobile application donâ€™t allow online payments. We recommend that you check your card settings in your N26 application before making an online purchase. To do this:
Log into the mobile application.
Tap on â€œActionsâ€.
Tap on "Card Settings."
Ensure that the toggle button is set to enable â€œOnline paymentsâ€.
You have set the limit on your card to be too low. 
Log into the mobile application.
Tap on "Actions".
Tap on â€œCard settingsâ€.
Tap on â€œLimitsâ€. 
Check the â€œDaily Payment Limitâ€ on your card and adjust it if necessary. Note: This limit cannot be raised above $5,000/day.
You made a purchase on a website that doesnâ€™t accept debit cards. Check the information provided by the website itself. It might only accept credit cards and not debit cards. If that is the case, you will not be able to use your N26 Visa card.

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Il mio addebito diretto andrÃ  a buon fine se non ho fondi sufficienti?
content:
Se il saldo non copre lâ€™addebito diretto alla scadenza, questa operazione verrÃ  annullata e ti verrÃ  addebitata una commissione diÂ â‚¬ 3. Se hai il saldo in negativo, ti verrÃ  addebitata una tassa per lo scoperto pari allâ€™8,9%. Non Ã¨ possibile ritardare un addebito diretto.

*Solo per Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, e Norvegia: se stai autorizzando un addebito diretto con un esercente nella valuta del tuo Paese, Ã¨ la banca beneficiaria che stabilisce il tasso di cambio e la somma finale raccolta da noi.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.

title: How do I dispute a transaction?
content:
We can only process disputes for transactions that have settled into your account.  In order to properly process a dispute, we will ask you for details about the charge and the reason for the dispute:
Youâ€™ll need to provide all or some of the following information:
The full name on the account
The account number
Name of merchant
Date of the disputed charge
Amount of the disputed charge
Reason for the dispute
Important:  If you believe a charge on your account is the result of fraud, or if you believe that your card has been lost or stolen, please block your card immediately and contact our customer support either by phone or by chat.  
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
content:
Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es Ã¤ndern mÃ¶chtest, wÃ¤hle in der App beim LoginÂ Vergessen?Â oderÂ Passwort vergessen?(neuen Tab)Â in derÂ WebApp(neuen Tab). Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen fÃ¼r unsere PasswÃ¶rter. Wir berechnen die StÃ¤rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur PasswÃ¶rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.Â 
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: FATCA - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin de certaines informations de votre part ?
content:
En tant quâ€™Ã©tablissement de crÃ©dit, N26 est tenue de communiquer directement au DÃ©partement du TrÃ©sor des Etats-Unis et Ã  lâ€™Internal Revenue Service (IRS) des informations sur les comptes dÃ©tenus par les contribuables amÃ©ricains ou par des entitÃ©s Ã©trangÃ¨res dans lesquelles les contribuables amÃ©ricains dÃ©tiennent une participation substantielle selon le FATCA.Â 
FATCA signifie Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act et est une lÃ©gislation conÃ§ue pour prÃ©venir l'Ã©vasion fiscale. Introduit par l'IRS, l'objectif du FATCA est d'encourager une meilleure conformitÃ© fiscale en empÃªchant les personnes amÃ©ricaines d'utiliser des banques Ã©trangÃ¨res et d'autres organisations financiÃ¨res afin d'Ã©viter l'imposition amÃ©ricaine sur leurs revenus et leurs actifs. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations sur le FATCA sur le site Web de l'IRS : www.irs.gov(nouvel onglet)
En effet, contrairement Ã  la plupart des autres pays, le systÃ¨me fiscal amÃ©ricain prÃ©lÃ¨ve l'impÃ´t sur le revenu des personnes rÃ©sidentes sur le territoire national, mais Ã©galement des citoyens amÃ©ricains vivant Ã  lâ€™Ã©tranger. Ã€ lâ€™inverse, dans une majoritÃ© de pays, seules les personnes rÃ©sidentes sur le territoire national sont soumis aux impÃ´ts du pays de rÃ©sidence. Les expatriÃ©s en sont donc exemptÃ©s.
Dans le cadre du FATCA, et pour que nous puissions dÃ©terminer avec prÃ©cision si votre compte doit faire lâ€™objet dâ€™une dÃ©claration auprÃ¨s du fisc amÃ©ricain, nous vous demanderons de nous communiquer les informations suivantes :
Si vous Ãªtes citoyen des Ã‰tats-Unis (binationaux compris) ou si vous Ãªtes titulaire dâ€™une carte verte en cours de validitÃ©

Si vous Ãªtes imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis
ÃŠtre Â«assujetti Ã  l'impÃ´tÂ» aux Ã‰tats-Unis ne signifie pas nÃ©cessairement que vous payez l'impÃ´t sur le revenu des particuliers aux Ã‰tats-Unis. Cela signifie que la loi fiscale amÃ©ricaine vous oblige Ã  produire une dÃ©claration de revenus et Ã  dÃ©clarer vos revenus (mondiaux) Ã  l'IRS, mÃªme si vous ne payez aucun impÃ´t amÃ©ricain.

Votre numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale amÃ©ricain(nouvel onglet) (si vous Ãªtes effectivement imposable aux Ã‰tats-Unis)
Vous pouvez dans ce cas nous fournir votre numÃ©ro de sÃ©curitÃ© sociale amÃ©ricain (SSN en anglais) ou votre NumÃ©ro individuel de contribuable amÃ©ricain (ITIN en anglais).
De plus, si votre compte indique un lieu de naissance amÃ©ricain ou un numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone amÃ©ricain ou si vous mettez en place un ordre de virement permanent aux Ã‰tats-Unis, la lÃ©gislation FATCA nous oblige Ã  supposer que vous Ãªtes soumis au FATCA, jusqu'Ã  ce que vous nous prouviez le contraire.
Si votre situation fiscale vient Ã  changer, vous pourrez Ã  tout moment modifier les informations concernÃ©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > ParamÃ¨tres > ParamÃ¨tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo presentar una reclamaciÃ³n?
content:
Es muy importante que sepas que, si estÃ¡s decepcionado con algo o si hay algo que no ha salido como esperabas, nosotros estamos aquÃ­ para ayudarte y nos gustarÃ­a que nos lo contaras.
Puedes enviarnos un email a reclamaciones.es@n26.com desde tu direcciÃ³n registrada en N26, o puedes enviarnos tu opiniÃ³n por correo.
Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE, el email tendrÃ­as que enviarlo a reclamaciones@n26.com.
Si quieres presentar una queja, tendrÃ­as que incluir:
tu nombre completo y tu direcciÃ³n
el producto o servicio con el que no estÃ¡s satisfecho
