title: Pubblico personalizzato
content:
Pubblico personalizzato - Trattamento dei dati nell'ambito di Facebook, Google e Zeotap.Â 

Pubblico personalizzato Ã¨ uno strumento online, che offre la possibilitÃ  di trovare corrispondenze di vario tipo tra gli utenti con lo scopo di creare un pubblico per il quale la visualizzazione di determinati annunci pubblicitari possa essere gradita.Â 
Nellâ€™ambito di N26, questo strumento permette ai nostri attuali clienti di visualizzare offerte promozionali o aggiornamenti di prodotti ma non, ad esempio, annunci pubblicitari relativi allâ€™apertura di un conto N26.
Per poter creare Lookalike Audiences mettiamo a disposizione di Facebook, Google e Zeotap una versione hashed dellâ€™indirizzo e-mail dei nostri utenti oppure dell'ID della loro applicazione mobile.Â 
Il cosiddetto "hashing" permette di criptare l'indirizzo e-mail o l'ID dell'applicazione mobile dellâ€™utente in modo che questâ€™ultimo non possa piÃ¹ essere identificato.Â La versione criptata dellâ€™indirizzo e-mail o dell'ID dell'applicazione mobile viene associata all'indirizzo e-mail o all'ID dell'applicazione mobile giÃ  in possesso di Facebook, Google e Zeotap. La versione hashed viene cancellata entro le successive 48 ore.
Condividere i dati con terzi oppure fornire a terzi lâ€™accesso ai dati degli utenti non Ã¨ consentito. Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni informazioni in merito nel sito di Facebook(nuova tabella),  di Google(nuova tabella) Â eÂ  di Zeotap(nuova tabella).
Ai sensi dell'Art. 6 comma. 1 lit. a GDPR, puoi revocare il tuo consenso a questo trattamento dei dati tramite la webapp di N26 in qualsiasi momento.

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Continue with your existing portfolio via FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB)
content:
If you decide to take no action your existing investment portfolio will automatically continue through FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB). FFB is the bank that holds the invest depot for each N26 Invest customer. 
The existing monthly settings of your N26 investment are not automatically retrieved by FFB - they must be set again individually. Please note that the fees according to FFB's schedule of fees and services would apply to your N26 Investment portfolio unless you decide to cancel your N26 Invest plan and withdraw the funds from your investment portfolio or instruct Moneyfarm to transfer your N26 Invest portfolio to a new Moneyfarm investment plan
Before the aforementioned date youâ€™ll automatically receive a letter via post containing your login details for FFB's website(new tab), allowing you to access your existing investment portfolio via their website. In the event that youâ€™ve changed address since youâ€™ve opened your N26 Invest portfolio, youâ€™ll need to contact FFB to inform them of your new address.Â 
Contact details for FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB):
Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm
Telephone: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200
Fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555
Please note: FFBâ€™s website is only available in German.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called â€˜chargebacksâ€™) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and havenâ€™t been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)Â orÂ UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach allÂ additional documents(new tab)

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked toÂ confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter theÂ 4-digit code we send you via SMSÂ and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device forÂ security reasons. You can do this inÂ ðŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ (mobile app) or in theÂ Web app(new tab)Â underÂ ðŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ thenÂ Security Settings if you donâ€™t have access to your smartphone anymore. Youâ€™ll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes â€“ a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo funciona Espacios?
content:
Espacios te permite definir objetivos, crear y personalizar espacios y transferir dinero entre ellos al instante. Espacios estÃ¡ disponible en la app y en laÂ Web App(pestaÃ±a nueva).
AdemÃ¡s de tu cuenta principal (o espacio principal), puedes crear y eliminar espacios tantas veces como quieras. Ten en cuenta que la cantidad de espacios activos al mismo tiempo depende del tipo de cuenta que tengas:Â 2 espacios adicionalesÂ con N26 y N26 Business, oÂ 10 espacios adicionalesÂ con N26 You, N26 Business You y N26 Metal.

Los extractos bancarios de tu cuenta principal incluirÃ¡n todas las transacciones enviadas a un espacio o recibidas del mismo. Puedes descargar dichos extractos desde la pÃ¡gina de confirmaciÃ³n.

Ãšnicamente tu espacio principal podrÃ­a tener un saldo negativo (si tienes disponibilidad de unÂ descubierto). Todos los demÃ¡s saldos de tus Espacios no pueden ser negativos, de modo que solo puedes transferir lo que estÃ¡ disponible en un espacio en particular.

Solo puedes usar el saldo de tu cuenta principal para las transacciones con tarjeta, por lo que deberÃ­as transferir fondos hacia tu cuenta principal antes de realizar una compra, si fuera necesario.

Para mover el dinero entre espacios, mantÃ©n pulsado sobre un espacio, arrÃ¡stralo y suÃ©ltalo sobre otro. Una vez elijas la cantidad y confirmes, el balance se actualizarÃ¡ inmediatamente.
Puedes bloquear y desbloquear los espacios siempre que quieras desde la app, para ello sÃ³lo necesitas tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n. Aunque tengas un espacio bloqueado, seguirÃ¡s teniendo la posibilidad de transferirle dinero. Si lo que necesitas es retirar dinero de ese espacio, primero tendrÃ¡s que desbloquearlo. 
Si quieres, tambiÃ©n puedes ocultar del balance principal la cantidad que tienes en el espacio. Para ello, entra en el espacio, pincha en los 3 puntos de la esquina superior derecha y despuÃ©s sobre ''Ocultar el espacio del saldo''.
Hace poco hemos aÃ±adido una nueva funciÃ³n para Espacios se llama Reglas.

Du kannst deinÂ N26 CreditÂ Darlehen immer vorzeitig zurÃ¼ckzahlen. Beachte, dass eine VorfÃ¤lligkeitsentschÃ¤digung von 1 % anfÃ¤llt. Wenn deine verbleibende Kreditlaufzeit weniger als 12 Monate betrÃ¤gt, liegt die EntschÃ¤digung bei 0,5 % des vorzeitig zurÃ¼ckgezahlten Betrages.

title: Dove investe i miei soldi N26?
content:
Ci sforziamo di fornire ai nostri clienti depositi per i prestiti (a condizione che abbiano un appropriato rating di credito). Per la liquiditÃ  non richiesta nel business dei clienti, la nostra strategia di investimento Ã¨ a basso rischio.
Investiamo i soldi dei nostri clienti in breve tempo con la Deutsche Bundesbank e altre banche europee nell'area dell'euro, solamente con buone classi di rischio. E rifinanziamo i clienti di diritto pubblico principalmente in Germania (cittÃ  e comuni) e investendo in titoli di stato in euro.
Non siamo un istituto di trading book. CioÃ¨: non scambiamo per profitto a breve termine.
E non ci occupiamo di speculazioni, sia sul cibo, sui cambi, su bitcoin o su altre classi di attivitÃ .

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphoneâ€™s contacts without knowing their bank account details. In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Tap Send Money followed by the MoneyBeam option,

Either select a contact from your phoneâ€™s contact list or add a recipient manually, using their phone number or email address. For this to work, the recipient has to be visible as an N26 customer,

Enter the amount and a reference text,

Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive.
N26 customers will receive the transfer instantly. You can send up to â‚¬1.000 to other N26 customers within a 24-hour period.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo revocar mi consentimiento para aparecer visible como usuario de N26?
content:
Para procesar las transferencias instantÃ¡neas a travÃ©s de MoneyBeam o utilizar los Espacios Compartidos, N26 asocia tu informaciÃ³n de contacto con otros usuarios de N26.
Ser visible para los demÃ¡s usuarios de N26 te permite utilizar todas las funciones de la cuenta, como por ejemplo MoneyBeam, con la que puedes enviar dinero a tiempo real sin necesidad de introducir un IBAN y solo seleccionando un contacto de tu lista. AdemÃ¡s, tambiÃ©n puedes solicitar a un contacto que te envÃ­e dinero y este puede aceptar o rechazar tu peticiÃ³n. Tener la visibilidad activa, tambiÃ©n te permite utilizar los Espacios Compartidos con alguien que elijas de tu lista.
En este artÃ­culo te explicamos como aparecer visible para otros usuarios de N26. 
Si aceptas aparecer visible como usuario de N26, todos los contactos guardados en tu mÃ³vil que tengan una cuenta N26, aparecerÃ¡n en la lista de contactos de la app N26. De igual modo, tÃº aparecerÃ¡s junto a tu nombre en la lista de otros usuarios de N26 que tengan tu contacto guardado. N26 no almacena tu lista de contactos permanentemente y solo accede a ella cuando utilizas la funciÃ³n MoneyBeam. 
Cuando se hace un MoneyBeam, solo el emisor y el destinatario pueden ver los detalles de la otra persona (nombre, email o telÃ©fono, concepto e importe de la transferencia). Al emisor, el nombre del destinatario le aparecerÃ¡ tal y como lo tenga guardado en su mÃ³vil. Al destinatario, el nombre del emisor le aparecerÃ¡ tal y como estÃ¡ registrado en N26. 
 
Para aparecer visible como usuario de N26 ante otros usuarios, puedes hacerlo fÃ¡cilmente yendo a ðŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta dentro de la app del mÃ³vil y luego Configuraciones > ConfiguraciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n personal. Una vez ahÃ­, marca la casilla que dice: â€œComo cliente de N26, estoy de acuerdo con ser visible ante otros clientes de N26â€. Â¡Y ya estÃ¡!

title: Do I pay fees and taxes with N26 Invest?
content:
N26 Invest doesnâ€™t charge any performance, transaction, or redemption fees. Your N26 Invest plan will incur a few other fees:
Monthly fee.Â Charged on a quarterly basis and paid directly from the balance in your investment plan. Depending on the size of your total deposits, youâ€™ll either be charged a fixed fee or a percentage fee:

Average total amount of investment / N26 Invest service feeÂ (annually as a % of the total deposits; minimum fee of â‚¬1,90)*
â‚¬0 to â‚¬29,999  /  0.99% *
â‚¬30,000 to â‚¬49,999  /  0.79% *
â‚¬50,000 and more  /  0.49% *

Operating costs.Â Paid directly out of the deposits in your investment plan. They depend on the investment strategy:
Fund strategy & their respective operating costs:
Invest 80: 0.44% p.a.
Invest 60: 0.40% p.a.
Invest 40: 0.36% p.a.
Taxes.Â Investments in the capital market may result in capital gains or income from dividends on individual funds. Income that is above the capital gains tax allowance is taxable in Germany. Investments are also subject to the solidarity surcharge and theÂ church tax.
You're taxable in Germany: Weâ€™ll automatically deduct all applicable taxes from your total deposits so your potential returns always show the net amount after tax.
You're not taxable in Germany: Youâ€™ll receive the gross amount of your income. Then itâ€™s up to you to file your capital gains tax in the country where you pay tax.
In either case, weâ€™ll automatically generate an annual tax certificate for you in February. You can find it directly in the app underÂ Savings & Investment. You can also find exemption orders and loss certificates for yourÂ tax returnÂ there.
Find out more about the method for predicting N26 Invest performance.(new tab)

title: Come posso restituire un bonifico SEPA al mandante?
content:
A partire dal 17 marzo 2020, i clienti di altre banche potrebbero richiedere il riaccredito di bonifici SEPA inviati ai conti di clienti N26.
Tramite la propria banca, il mandante di un bonifico SEPA puÃ², quindi, richiedere al beneficiario la restituzione dellâ€™importo inviato. Questa richiesta apparirÃ  sotto forma di notifica push sul dispositivo associato del cliente N26.Â 
CosÃ¬ come avviene con la conferma di un bonifico in uscita tramite lâ€™app di N26, visualizzerai lâ€™opzione di rifiutare oppure accettare di restituire lâ€™importo. La richiesta verrÃ  automaticamente rifiutata se ignorata per 15 giorni.
Se, invece, la richiesta viene accettata, lâ€™importo verrÃ  inviato al mandante. Considera, inoltre, che una volta accettata la richiesta, non sarÃ  possibile modificare la propria scelta. Se sul conto principale non Ã¨ presente un saldo sufficiente, non si potrÃ  accettare la richiesta.Â

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content:
We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: weâ€™ll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and weâ€™ll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.
There are three ways to switch your bank accounts over to N26:
Together with our partner finleap weâ€™re offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. Itâ€™s an automated process and completely free.
To begin, use ourÂ form(new tab)Â and log in with your previous bank account details. Once youâ€™ve filled in all required information, itâ€™ll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.
You could also inform your payment partners yourself. To do this, fill out the letter to notify your payment partners(new tab) and send it to them. You could also request theÂ termination of your bank account(new tab) with your previous bank by filling out the form and sending it to them.
This service is also free. If you need help with this process, contact our Customer Support via chat.
All German licensed banks are required to offer a bank account switching service as part or Â§21 ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz). To initiate this service, please download and print theÂ account switching form(new tab) and send it to: N26 Bank GmbH Kundenservice KlosterstraÃŸe 62 10179 Berlin.
Once weâ€™ve received your request, weâ€™ll process it within 7 business days. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.
We charge a fee of up to â‚¬20 for this service, depending on your individual request.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: PerchÃ© mi Ã¨ stata addebitata una commissione per lâ€™addebito diretto?
content:
Agli addebiti diretti respinti sul tuo conto a causa di fondi insufficienti viene addebitata una commissione di â‚¬ 3 in conformitÃ  ai nostriÂ Termini e condizioni(nuova tabella). 
Puoi evitare queste commissioni assicurandoti di avere fondi sufficienti sul conto per coprire gli addebiti diretti in entrata entro le ore 18.00 dello stesso giorno lavorativo.
PoichÃ© i bonificiÂ SEPAÂ possono richiedere piÃ¹ di un giorno, ti consigliamo di utilizzareÂ MoneyBeamÂ oÂ CASH26Â (se vivi in Germania, Austria o Italia) per trasferire lâ€™importo dovuto. Con entrambi i metodi, lâ€™importo sarÃ  accreditato sul conto istantaneamente.
Se non riconosci un addebito diretto, puoiÂ annullarloÂ nellâ€™app.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).Â 
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â 
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: PerchÃ© il mio bonifico non Ã¨ andato a buon fine?

AccettiamoÂ bonificiÂ in EUR fatti tramite SEPA. Non supportiamo SWIFT quindi se hai bisogno di effettuare unÂ trasferimento in valuta estera, devi utilizzare TransferWise (nell'app o dal loroÂ sito web(nuova tabella)).

Motivi comuni per cui un bonifico non va a buon fine:
Il nome del destinatario del bonifico Ã¨ diverso dal nome del conto (deve avere lo stesso nome scritto sul loro documento di identitÃ ).
Per N26 Business, il nome del destinatario Ã¨ il nome della societÃ  e non il nome del conto.
Lâ€™IBAN Ã¨ errato.
Non stai ricevendo il messaggio push per confermare il trasferimento.
Ãˆ stato riscontrato un uso improprio. N26 ha la responsabilitÃ  di eseguire controlli di routine sulle transazioni (vedere GwG Â§ 10(nuova tabella)). Di conseguenza, potremmo chiedere una documentazione per verificare l'origine o la fonte di queste transazioni. CiÃ² puÃ² comportare il ritardo o il mancato accredito dell'importo.

title: Why canâ€™t I get a loan?
content:
(Applies to Germany and France)
When applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isnâ€™t your main account, youâ€™ll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.
For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where youâ€™re applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).
Weâ€™ll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isnâ€™t the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).
Once youâ€™ve sent an application to us, youâ€™re unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). Youâ€™ll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.
The decision is then calculated through an automated process.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

content:

Andernfalls bekommst du eine E-Mail, um dich darÃ¼ber zu informieren dass das verfÃ¼gbare Limit deines Kontos Ã¼berschritten wurde. Das bedeutet, dass du nicht Ã¼ber genÃ¼gend Guthaben fÃ¼r zukÃ¼nftige Zahlungen verfÃ¼gst.
Auch wenn du dein Konto seit der ErÃ¶ffnung noch nicht verwendet hast, fallen bestimmte GebÃ¼hren an (wie z. B. deine monatlichen N26 You oder N26 Metal GebÃ¼hren oder Kosten fÃ¼r die Expresslieferung), die zu einem negativen Kontostand fÃ¼hren kÃ¶nnen.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?

You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Transfer from External Bank
content:
What is Transfer from an External Bank?
It is the ability to link your N26 account with external bank accounts and transfer money to your N26 account from within your N26 web application.
How long does it take to transfer funds?
If you are transferring money from your external account to your N26 account via the N26 application, the transfer will complete approximately 5 business days from the date you initiated the transaction.Â 


What if my bank is not shown as an option on the website, how do I link
to it?

If your bank is not shown on the list, you can do a manual search for it by simply entering your bankâ€™s name, e.g. Bank of America, in the search field.


My bank still did not show up even after a manual search.Â  What do
I do next?

If your bank still does not show up even after a manual search, then your bank may not be supported currently.
What are the fees associated with transferring money through this method?
We do not charge a fee for this service.
Do I have to transfer in whole dollars?

No.Â  You can transfer in dollars and cents.
Does the account have to be in my name?

Yes.Â  All the accounts that you link must be owned by you and under the same name as your N26 account.
What accounts can I link?
You can link US checking and savings accounts (business accounts may not be linked) to your main N26 account (you cannot link to Spaces). The accounts must be US accounts owned by you and under the same name as your N26 account. In addition, you must be registered for online banking with the external bank.
How many accounts can I link?
There is no limit to the number of accounts that you can link, as long as the accounts are US checking and savings accounts (business accounts may not be linked) owned by you and under the same name as your N26 account. In addition, you must be registered for online banking with the external bank.
Can I cancel pending transfers?
Unfortunately, you cannot cancel pending transfers.Â  You can cancel a transfer at any time before you confirm the transaction.Â  Once the transfer is confirmed (for which you should receive a confirmation email), you can no longer cancel it.
Can I use this feature to send money to my external account?

No, you may only use this feature to transfer funds into your N26 account, not to transfer funds out of your N26 account.
My external account is owned by me, but I am still unable to link it to my N26 account.
Even though you own the external account, your attempt to link may have failed because the external account needs to be a US bank account and needs to be in your name (i.e. the same name you used to open your N26 account).
Where can I see the status of pending, successful, and failed transfers?Â 
Unfortunately, you will not be able to see pending transfers. It takes approximately 5 business days for a transfer to settle and for the transferred funds to be available in your N26 account. Once the transfer is successful, you will see it in your N26 transaction feed. You will also receive push notifications for successful or unsuccessful transfers.
It appears that my transfer has failed - what does that mean?Â Â 
This means the funds did not successfully transfer.  You should check your email for the failure reason and reattempt the transfer.Â 
Do I need to link my external account every time I make a transfer?
You do not have to link to your external bank account more than once.Â  You may, however, need to re-enter your external account credentials occasionally due to either a change in those credentials or for security reasons.
How to link your external bank account to your N26 account via the N26 mobile application.
1.Â Â Â Â  Launch your N26 mobile application.
2.Â Â Â Â  Tap theÂ ActionsÂ button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
3.Â Â Â Â  Tap onÂ Add Money.
4.Â Â Â Â  TapÂ External bank transfer.
5.Â Â Â Â  TapÂ Link an account.
6.Â     A Plaid disclaimer page will be displayed. TapÂ ContinueÂ after reading.
7.Â Â Â Â  A second Plaid disclaimer screen will be displayed.Â  TapÂ ContinueÂ after reading.
8.Â Â Â Â  Tap to select your bank.
9.Â Â Â Â  Enter your Online credentials.
10.Â Â  TapÂ Continue.
11.Â Â  Tap on the account you want to link.
12.Â Â  TapÂ Select.
13.Â Â  Your account is now linked.

How do I transfer money to my N26 account using the N26 mobile application?
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer.
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm Transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transactions List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.


The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why do I pay the church tax?
content:
Weâ€™re legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.
Youâ€™re entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through anÂ ErklÃ¤rung zum Sperrvermerk(new tab)Â form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.
Further information is available on the website of theÂ German Federal Central Office for Taxation(new tab).

title: Why canâ€™t I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such asÂ MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphoneâ€™s contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someoneâ€™s contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you donâ€™t see your friendâ€™s name on MoneyBeam but you know theyâ€™re an N26 user, they most likely havenâ€™t made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored donâ€™t match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo hacer una transferencia SEPA?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Puedes enviar transferencias a cualquier paÃ­s de la zona SEPA, siempre que acepten euros.
Para hacer una transferencia, puedes hacerlo desde la app o la web app de N26.

Puedes convertirla en una transferencia programada, seleccionando la fecha y el intervalo de repeticiÃ³n, asÃ­ como el beneficiario.
Pulsa enviar y confirma la operaciÃ³n con tu PIN de confirmaciÃ³n desde el dispositivo vinculado. 
Es necesario confirmar o cancelar a travÃ©s de la notificaciÃ³n que te llagarÃ¡ al dispositivo vinculado. Una vez que la hayas confirmado no hay forma de revertirla o de cambiar los datos del destinatario. 
Si no puedes confirmar una transferencia desde la app te aconsejo que revises lo siguiente:
AsegÃºrate de que tienes buena conexiÃ³n a internet
AsegÃºrate de que tu mÃ³vil tiene las notificaciones activadas. Puedes comprobarlo desde la configuraciÃ³n de tu telÃ©fono, no de la app. 
AsegÃºrate de que estÃ¡s utilizando tu telÃ©fono vinculado. 
Cada vez que envÃ­as una transferencia, puedes descargarte el PDF de confirmaciÃ³n. Para ello:

Localiza la transferencia y pulsa sobre ella
Desliza hacia abajo la pantalla y pulsa sobre la ''ConfirmaciÃ³n de transferencia'' para que se abra el PDF.

title: How to pay taxes on N26 Savings and N26 Invest?
content:
WithÂ N26 SavingsÂ (Germany and Austria only) andÂ N26 InvestÂ (Germany only), our partner banks are legally required to pass on taxes to the relevant tax authorities.
Weâ€™ll have annual tax certificates ready for you in the app every April. You can find it in the Savings & Investment tab. If you need further documents for your tax return, we can provide you with an exemption order form for N26 Invest or a loss certificate.
You can apply for exemptions from capital gains tax and church tax. For N26 Invest, the required documents are found in the Documents section of the Savings & Investment tab of the mobile app.
For N26 Savings, you can find the exemption form (new tab)here for Grenke Bank(new tab) and here for Greensill Bank(new tab). Chat with us and we'll ask you to send the completed document. Weâ€™ll forward your request to our partner bank.
Income that is above the capital gains tax allowance is taxable in Germany. In addition to capital gains taxes, investments are subject to the solidarity surcharge and church tax.
The custodian bank automatically deducts all applicable taxes from your total deposits if you are taxable in Germany. This means that the potential returns on your investment always show the net amount after tax. If youâ€™re not taxable in Germany, youâ€™ll receive the gross amount of your income. Youâ€™re then responsible for filing your capital gains tax in the country where you pay taxes.

title: How do I close my N26 account?
content:
To close your N26 account, please contact us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or via chat in our mobile application or WebApp(new tab) and we'll help you take care of it.
A few tips to help speed up the account closure process:
In order to close your account your balance must be zero.
Accounts with a positive balance: If you have a positive balance in your main account or in Spaces, you have a few options to take your balance to zero. Please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to us if you need help with any of these options. Please note that direct transfers and/or withdrawals cannot be made directly out of Spaces. Any balance in your Spaces must first be moved into your main account for it to be accessible. 
If you have a balance in a denomination that you can withdraw from an ATM, you can easily take your balance to zero this way (please see our article â€œAll about Allpoint(new tab)â€ for more information).
You can use your N26 debit card to make a purchase that will take your balance to zero.
You can use a third-party payment processor (PayPal, for example) and transfer your remaining balance. 
You can transfer your balance to an external bank account. This can be done by initiating a withdrawal by the external bank from your N26 account. Please see our article â€œHow to add money to my N26 account(new tab)â€ to learn more about linking an external bank account to your N26 account. Please note that the transfer must be initiated at the external bank account. We do not currently offer the ability to transfer funds from your N26 account to an external bank account from within our mobile or web applications. 
Accounts with negative balance: If you have a negative balance, please add funds to bring your balance to $0. Please see our article â€œHow to add money to my N26 account?(new tab)â€ for more information. 
After your account is closed, please destroy your card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.
Please note that the process of closing your account will take a minimum of 10 business days. We will notify you via email when it is closed.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A â‚¬2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. Weâ€™ll remind you via push message when youâ€™re running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and canâ€™t reject or reverse them. Youâ€™ll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, thereâ€™s a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A â‚¬2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: How can I protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login credentials. Never create an N26 account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your Social Security Number to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
Mail is another easy target for thieves. If you are traveling out of town, it may be a good idea to have your mail held or to consider obtaining a U.S. Postal Service-approved lockable mailbox. All bank statements should be shredded, as well. 
Take care to monitor your financial statements. Make sure you recognize every transaction, no matter how small. 
If you received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us(new tab).
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

content:

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp(new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
Itâ€™s not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If youâ€™re experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:Â Â 
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.Â 

Transactions up to â‚¬50 donâ€™t require a card PIN*. For amounts over â‚¬50, youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â

Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.Â 

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).

title: Â¿CuÃ¡nto tiempo tarda una transferencia?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â VÃ¡lido en todas las regiones excepto Reino Unido
Todas las transferencias SEPA a las cuentas de N26, nacionales o internacionales, son inmediatas si proceden de un banco que emite transferencias inmediatas. Debido a regulaciÃ³n bancaria que se aplica a las transferencias SEPA esta se podrÃ­a retrasar en caso de que sea necesario monitorizarla.Â 
En caso se que el banco emisor no ofrezca transferencias inmediatas o el remitente no escoja esta opciÃ³n, la transferencia completarÃ¡ en un dÃ­a bancario. Sin embargo, debido a los horarios de apertura de los bancos involucrados, un dÃ­a bancario puede extenderse a dos dÃ­as hÃ¡biles.Â 
Las transferencias SEPA desde las cuentas de N26 tambiÃ©n se completan en un dÃ­a bancario.
Ten en cuenta que, si se hace una transferencia justo antes de un fin de semana o un dÃ­a festivo, el plazo obviamente se prolongarÃ¡. El sistema con el que enviamos todas nuestras transferencias SEPA se llama TARGET2(pestaÃ±a nueva) y procesan los pagos todos los dÃ­as laborables de 07:00 a 18:00 GMT. Cierran los siguientes dÃ­as:
1 de enero (AÃ±o Nuevo), Viernes Santo, Lunes de Pascua, Primero de Mayo, 25 de diciembre (Navidad) y 26 de diciembre.
Gracias aÂ MoneyBeamÂ puedes transferir dinero a otros clientes de N26 al instante y puedes aceptar peticiones para recibir MoneyBeam instantÃ¡neos desde otros bancos que emiten transferencias instantÃ¡neas. Los tiempos varÃ­an para lasÂ transferencias en moneda extranjeraÂ con TransferWise, pero podrÃ¡s ver el tiempo estimado de la transferencia al momento de hacerla.
Pedimos que confirmes todas las transferencias mediante unaÂ notificaciÃ³n pushÂ dentro de la aplicaciÃ³n antes de sacar el dinero de tu cuenta.
Si la transferencia estÃ¡ fuera de estos plazos estimados, el banco emisor ha de iniciar una investigaciÃ³n interna. Nosotros no podemos investigar transferencias entrantes, solo las salientes. Aun asÃ­, hemos recopilado algunas razones por las cuales tu transferenciaÂ SEPAÂ o enÂ moneda extranjeraÂ ha fallado.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content:
You receive Â£10 every time you successfully refer a friend to N26 (up to Â£1500 maximum). You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or theÂ WebApp(new tab)).
To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:
Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.
Activate their Mastercard.
Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of Â£10.
To invite friends on iOS:
Log into the mobile app and tap on the Explore tab next to the + button.
Tap on Refer friends.
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.
Select one of the options available for sharing. 
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.

To invite friends on Android:
Log into the mobile app, then go to My Account ðŸ‘¤ and select the gift icon.

Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 30 days.Â You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasnâ€™t arrived yet, weâ€™ve also collected aÂ few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend ProgramÂ T&Cs(new tab).

title: Â¿CÃ³mo iniciar sesiÃ³n en la cuenta con la autenticaciÃ³n de dos factores?Â
content:
Los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n es un proceso de autenticaciÃ³n basado en el uso de dos o mÃ¡s elementos de seguridad. AdemÃ¡s de tu contraseÃ±a personal, para iniciar sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta vas a necesitar la confirmaciÃ³n desde el dispositivo vinculado o un cÃ³digo por SMS.Â 
Lee mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre la autenticaciÃ³n de dos factores.
Cuando inicies sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibirÃ¡s un notificaciÃ³n emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un cÃ³digo SMS a tu nÃºmero registrado. Esto asegurarÃ¡ que solo tÃº puedes entrar en tu cuenta.
Cuando inicies sesiÃ³n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n ya estÃ¡n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.
Necesitas actualizar el sistema operativo de tu telÃ©fono y la app de N26 a la Ãºltima versiÃ³n.Â 
Si no puedes iniciar sesiÃ³n en la cuenta, pero aÃºn tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contraseÃ±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, contÃ¡ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.Â 
Lee en este artÃ­culo como restablecer tu contraseÃ±a.
Si has perdido el acceso a tu dispositivo vinculado pero tienes acceso a tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono registrado, inicia sesiÃ³n en tu cuenta de N26 y solicita un cÃ³digo de vinculaciÃ³n. Para ello haz lo siguiente:
Inicia sesiÃ³n en la WebApp
Cuando vayas a confirmar el acceso en tu dispositivo vinculado selecciona ''Ayuda''.
Selecciona ''Enviar SMS''.
Cuando hayas recibido el cÃ³digo por SMS, introdÃºcelo en la WebApp.
Cuando confirmes el cÃ³digo ya tendrÃ¡s los dos factores de autenticaciÃ³n automÃ¡ticamente y podrÃ¡s vincular tu nuevo dispositivo con la cuenta.Â 
Si no puedes iniciar sesiÃ³n en la cuenta, pero aÃºn tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contraseÃ±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, contÃ¡ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.Â 
Si tienes un telÃ©fono que soporta la Ãºltima versiÃ³n de la app, no podrÃ¡s acceder a tu cuenta de N26 usando ese telÃ©fono. Sin embargo, puedes utilizar la Web App para consultar tu tu cuenta. Para ello, tienes que confirmar el inicio de sesiÃ³n con un cÃ³digo que te enviamos por SMS a tu nÃºmero de telÃ©fono registrado.Â 
Puedes seguir realizando pagos con tarjeta y retiradas en cajero utilizando tu Mastercard, pero debes tener en cuenta que no podrÃ¡s enviar transferencias bancarias ni realizar pagos online hasta que no puedas confirmarlo por la app de N26.

title: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?
content:
Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login Ã¼ber mindestens zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. ZusÃ¤tzlich zur Eingabe deines persÃ¶nlichen Passworts musst du deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch dein verknÃ¼pftes GerÃ¤t oder einen SMS-Code bestÃ¤tigen.
Mehr zu diesem Thema erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Artikel: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t einloggst, musst du deinen Login-Versuch zusÃ¤tzlich bestÃ¤tigen. Das kannst du tun, indem du entweder eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t bestÃ¤tigst oder indem du einen SMS-Code anforderst, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.
Wenn du dich von deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, liegt damit schon Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung vor. Das bedeutet, der Login-Prozess Ã¤ndert sich bei deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t nicht.
Stell sicher, dass das Betriebssystem deines Handys auf dem neuesten Stand ist und die neueste Version der N26 App installiert ist. Falls du dich nicht mehr einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, versuch bitte, dein Passwort zurÃ¼ckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugang mehr zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Mehr Informationen darÃ¼ber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
Wenn du keinen Zugang mehr zu deinem verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten Handynummer hast, kannst du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen und zur Authentifizierung einen SMS-Code anfordern:
Logge dich in die WebApp oder von einem nicht verknÃ¼pften GerÃ¤t ein
Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, deinen Login-Versuch durch dein verknÃ¼pftes GerÃ¤t zu bestÃ¤tigen, wÃ¤hle Hilfe
WÃ¤hle SMS-Code schicken
Nachdem du den SMS-Code erhalten hast, gib ihn in der WebApp ein.
Dadurch ist die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und du kannst dein neues GerÃ¤t wieder mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pfen.
Falls dir deine registrierte Handynummer nicht mehr zur VerfÃ¼gung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue hast oder dein Handy verloren gegangen ist oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Wenn du ein Ã¤lteres Smartphone benutzt, das die neueste Version der App nicht mehr unterstÃ¼tzt, kannst du dich mit diesem nicht mehr in die N26 App einloggen.
Du kannst dennoch die WebApp benutzen, um Zugang zu deinem Konto zu erhalten. DafÃ¼r musst du deinen Login-Versuch mit einem SMS-Code bestÃ¤tigen, den wir dir an deine registrierte Handynummer schicken.
Mit deiner Karte kannst du nach wie vor Geld abheben und Zahlungen tÃ¤tigen. Bitte beachte aber, dass du keine Ãœberweisungen ausfÃ¼hren und kein CASH26 mehr benutzen kannst, solange du diese in der N26 App nicht bestÃ¤tigen kannst.

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change yourÂ card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad inÂ ðŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ by selectingÂ Card SettingsÂ in the mobile app orÂ WebApp(new tab).

title: When linking my accounts, I noticed that the name â€œAxos BankÂ®â€ comes up for my N26 account.
content:
To issue your account, N26 partners with Axos Bank, a federally chartered savings bank and Member of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. When the name â€œAxos Bankâ€ appears in the external account linking process, rest assured you have entered the correct information.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo cambiar mi PIN de confirmaciÃ³n?
content:

Ve a ðŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta, Configuraciones y luego Seguridad (desde la app) o haz clic en ConfiguraciÃ³n de seguridadÂ (WebApp(pestaÃ±a nueva)). 
SeleccionaÂ Cambiar PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.
Introduce el token de 10 dÃ­gitos de tu Mastercard.
Crea y confirma tu nuevo PIN de confirmaciÃ³n.
Si introduces el PIN de confirmaciÃ³n errÃ³neamente 6 veces seguidas, tendrÃ¡s que restablecerlo antes de volver a intentarlo.
Por motivos de seguridad, tu PIN no puede contener parte de tu fecha de nacimiento, tu direcciÃ³n, nÃºmeros repetidos (como por ejemplo 1111, 111 o incluso 11) o secuencias (como 1234 o 4321). Si el PIN que has elegido no es aceptado, por favor intÃ©ntelo otra vez con un nÃºmero diferente.
Â¿Prefieres verlo en vÃ­deo? Echa un vistazo al tutorial(pestaÃ±a nueva) en nuestro canal de YouTube N26 Support.(pestaÃ±a nueva)

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â 
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â 
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â 
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â 
Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo saber cuÃ¡l es mi IBAN o nÃºmero de cuenta?
content:
Puedes encontrar tu IBAN y tu nÃºmero BIC en los extractos de tu cuenta o en el apartadoÂ ðŸ‘¤ Mi cuentaÂ en la app oÂ WebApp(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â (en caso de que no hayas activado tu tarjeta y necesitesÂ ingresar dineroÂ en tu cuenta).
Puedes compartir la informaciÃ³n de forma sencilla haciendo clic en el botÃ³n de compartir que encontrarÃ¡s enÂ ðŸ‘¤ Mi cuenta. TambiÃ©n puedes descargar en formato PDF la informaciÃ³n bancaria. Todos nuestros cÃ³digos IBAN espaÃ±oles empiezan por ES seguido de un cÃ³digo de control de 2 dÃ­gitos, luego nuestro cÃ³digo de entidad financiera 1563 2626, despuÃ©s 2 dÃ­gitos de control y, por Ãºltimo, tu nÃºmero de cuenta de 10 dÃ­gitos.
Nuestro IBAN alemÃ¡n, en cambio, empieza por DE seguido de un cÃ³digo de control de 2 dÃ­gitos, luego nuestroÂ cÃ³digo de entidad financiera 10011001 y terminan con tuÂ nÃºmero de cuentaÂ de 10 dÃ­gitos (empieza por 26).

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app youâ€™ll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upperÂ right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
â„¹ï¸ Â Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Â¿QuÃ© pasa si tengo un saldo negativo?
content:
El balance de tu cuenta puede ser negativo siempre y cuando estÃ©s dentro de tu lÃ­mite de descubierto (disponible solo en Alemania y Austria).
Si no, recibirÃ¡s un email para notificarte que has sobrepasado tu lÃ­mite de descubierto autorizado, lo que significa que no tienes fondos suficientes en tu cuenta N26 para hacer frente a futuros cargos.
Incluso si no has usado tu cuenta N26 desde que la abriste, hay algunos cargos que podrÃ­an aplicar (como la cuota mensual de N26 You o N26 Metal, o los costes del envÃ­o exprÃ©s) y dejarÃ­an como resultado un saldo negativo. En el caso de quedarte con saldo negativo, se cargarÃ¡ a tu cuenta un interÃ©s del 7,5% de forma cuatrimestral.
En ese caso, tendrÃ­as queÂ ingresar dinero en tu cuenta N26Â desde otra cuenta bancaria mediante una transferencia SEPA. Para hacer una transferencia puedes encontrar tu IBAN en la app de N26. Recuerda que si la haces desde una cuenta de otro paÃ­s, tendrÃ¡s que hacerla como una transferencia internacional, ya que somos un banco alemÃ¡n.
Tu cuenta seguirÃ¡ estando activa durante los prÃ³ximos 60 dÃ­as sin pagar. A partir de ahÃ­:
RecibirÃ¡s dos recordatorios mÃ¡s, que costarÃ¡n 3â‚¬ cada uno.
Si tienes una cuenta premium, las ventajas se cancelarÃ¡n tras 60 dÃ­as y tu cuenta se convertirÃ¡ en cuenta estÃ¡ndar.
Si no haces nada al respecto, podremos cerrar tu cuenta tras 60 dÃ­as.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo funciona N26 Business?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Disponible en EspaÃ±a, Alemania, Austria, BÃ©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los PaÃ­ses Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia y El Reino Unido. 
De momento no es posible cambiar de una cuenta personal a una Business ni viceversa, por eso es importante que sepas si N26 Business es la cuenta apropiada para ti:
N26 Business estÃ¡ diseÃ±ada paraÂ autÃ³nomos y freelancersÂ que trabajan por cuenta propia y siempre bajo su nombre. Esto significa que no puedes tener el nombre de tu empresa en la cuenta ni en la tarjeta.
La Mastercard N26 Business estÃ¡ diseÃ±ada Ãºnicamente para uso comercial. RecibirÃ¡s unÂ reembolsoÂ del 0,1% del dinero gastado con la tarjeta mensualmente. De momento no es posible tener dos cuentas de N26 al mismo tiempo, de modo que si necesitas otra cuenta para tus gastos privados, te recomendamos pedir una MaestroÂ (disponible en Alemania, Austria y PaÃ­ses Bajos).
Al igual que la cuenta personal N26 estÃ¡ndar, N26 Business esÂ gratuitaÂ y ofrece varias retiradas de efectivo gratuitas de acuerdo con nuestraÂ PolÃ­tica de Uso Justo. Aun asÃ­, con esta cuenta no se pueden hacerÂ transferencias en moneda extranjeraÂ desde la app, sino que tendrÃ­as que visitar la pÃ¡gina de TransferWise(pestaÃ±a nueva) para ello.
Â¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 â‚¬ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. InfÃ³rmate mÃ¡s sobre nuestro programaÂ Invita a un amigo.

title: Cosâ€™Ã¨ CASH26?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Si applica per i conti aperti in Germania, Austria e Italia
CASH26 Ã¨ una funzionalitÃ  che ti permette di depositare o prelevare denaro contante presso i nostri negozi convenzionati. 
Attualmente CASH26 Ã¨ disponibile in:
202 punti PAM & Panorama e 386 negozi PENNY in Italia.Â 
11.918 punti REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino o Rossmann in Germania.Â 
2.019 punti dm, Billa, Merkur e PENNY Austria in AustriaÂ Â 
Troverai un elenco dettagliato dei negozi convenzionati piÃ¹ vicini a te, gli orari di apertura e le indicazioni per raggiungerli sulla mappa di CASH26 della nostra app (Schermata principale > Gestisci > CASH26).
Prelievo:
Appena crei un codice a barre per il prelievo, l'importo verrÃ  detratto dal tuo conto. Se non vuoi piÃ¹ procedere col prelievo, puoi cancellare il codice a barre e l'importo ritornerÃ  immediatamente sul tuo conto.
Se un codice a barre rimane inutilizzato, l'importo ritornerÃ  automaticamente sul tuo conto dopo 10 minuti.
Puoi prelevare fino a 900 â‚¬ (200 â‚¬ per transazione) nellâ€™arco di 24 ore.
I prelievi sono sempre gratuiti.
Depositi:
I depositi tramite CASH26 sono immediatamente disponibili sul tuo conto.
Puoi depositare fino a 999 â‚¬ (minimo 50 â‚¬ per deposito) nellâ€™arco di 24 ore.
Puoi depositare fino a 100 â‚¬Â  al mese gratuitamente. Per i depositi oltre questo importo viene applicata una commissione dell'1,5% sul totale depositato.
Non Ã¨ necessario effettuare un acquisto nel negozio convenzionato per poter depositare o prelevare il tuo denaro.
Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial(nuova tabella) sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube(nuova tabella).
Vuoi proporre N26 ai tuoi amici e guadagnare qualche soldo? Ottieni 15 â‚¬ per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.

title: Ich vertrete eine Bank oder eine BehÃ¶rde und muss N26 kontaktieren
content:
Wenn Sie eine BehÃ¶rde vertreten oder uns im Namen einer anderen Bank erreichen mÃ¶chten, kÃ¶nnen Sie uns gerne auf folgenden Wegen kontaktieren:
E-mail: officials.de@n26.com(neuen Tab)
Fax: + 49 (0) 30 2201178 40
Sie erreichen uns von Montag bis Freitag zwischen 09:00 und 18:00 (auÃŸer an Berliner Feiertagen). Sie kÃ¶nnen auch jederzeit per Fax oder E-Mail einen RÃ¼ckruf anfragen. Wir bemÃ¼hen uns, Sie noch am selben Tag zurÃ¼ckzurufen.

title: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
content:
Die OECD verlangt, dass bestimmte Steuerinformationen mittels desÂ Common Reporting Standard(neuen Tab) ausgetauscht werden. Um unseren Verpflichtungen nachzukommen, mÃ¼ssen wir feststellen, in welchem Land du steuerpflichtig bist. Wir tun dies Ã¼ber deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder National Insurance number.
Wir leiten diese Informationen Ã¼ber das Bundesamt fÃ¼r Steuern an SteuerbehÃ¶rden in anderen LÃ¤ndern weiter, wenn:
du in einem CRS-Teilnehmerland lebst.
du ein Postfach oder eine zweite Meldeadresse in einem anderen CRS-Teilnehmerland hast.
du bei der Registrierung eine Telefonnummer eines anderen CRS-Teilnehmerlandes angegeben hast.
du einen Dauerauftrag hast oder regelmÃ¤ÃŸige Zahlungen auf ein Konto in einem anderen CRS-Teilnehmerland leistest.
Wir leiten die Daten nach demÂ Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(neuen Tab)Â (FATCA) auch an den U.S.Â Internal Revenue Service(neuen Tab)Â (IRS) weiter. Wir kÃ¶nnen deine Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) anfordern, um deinen Steuerstatus in den USA zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen, wenn:
du US-BÃ¼rger bist (einschlieÃŸlich doppelte StaatsbÃ¼rgerschaft).
du bei der Registrierung eine Telefonnummer aus den USA angegeben hast.
du in den USA (oder in einer US-Botschaft im Ausland) geboren wurdest.
du mit einem US-BÃ¼rger/einer US-BÃ¼rgerin verheiratet bist.
du uns eine Adresse in den USA gegeben hast.
du regelmÃ¤ÃŸige Ãœberweisungen in die USA durchfÃ¼hrst.
So aktualisierst du deine Steuernummer oder Sozialversicherungsnummer in der App:
Gehe zu ðŸ‘¤ Mein Konto und tippe auf Einstellungen
WÃ¤hle PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen und Steuerdaten
WÃ¤hle das Land aus, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist
Gib entweder deine Steuernummer oder deine Sozialversicherungsnummer ein
Wichtige Informationen
In Deutschland benÃ¶tigen wir deine 11-stellige Steueridentifikationsnummer, nicht deine 9-stellige Steuernummer.
In jedem Fall werden deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten sicher gespeichert und nur zur ErfÃ¼llung der CRS- und FATCA-Anforderungen verwendet.
Wir kÃ¶nnen dich nicht zu deinem Steuerstatus beraten. Wenn du dir Ã¼ber deinen Status nicht sicher bist, sprich bitte mit einem Steuerberater.
Wenn du das Land eingegeben hast, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist, aber nicht deine Steueridentifikationsnummer, bitte entferne das Land noch einmal von der Liste, die dir in der App angezeigt wird, fÃ¼ge das Land erneut hinzu und gib deine Steueridentifikationsnummer ein.

title: What you need to know about the Italian IBAN
content:
IMPORTANT - Currently new customers signing up in Italy will receive an Italian IBAN. For our existing customers in Italy with a German IBAN, as soon as we have information to share on how and when you can obtain an Italian IBAN, we will get back in touch. 

Why didnâ€™t N26 offer an Italian IBAN from the beginning?
Theoretically, having a German IBAN in Italy shouldnâ€™t be an issue under EU law which states that all EU IBANs should be accepted, regardless if itâ€™s from a different country than your country of residence. However, weâ€™ve been listening to our customers and know that this isnâ€™t always the case. To make things easier, weâ€™ve now decided to offer our Italian customers their own local Italian IBAN.
Can I receive my salary/social/unemployment benefit/pension?
You can indeed receive incoming transfers in Euros to the Italian IBAN associated with your N26 account.
Can I create Direct Debits?
Yes, you can. Simply provide the relevant company with your N26 IBAN to set up Direct Debits.
Can I create Standing orders?
Yes, you can. Standing orders can be set up in the N26 app via the "Transfers" section.
When trying to send a transfer to my N26 Italian IBAN, the sending bank said the account details aren't recognised. What is the issue?
It's possible that the sending bank doesn't yet have our new Italian BIC in their system. Please contact the sending bank so they can update their database and process your transfer.
Can I deposit cash on my N26 account?
Our customers in Italy can use CASH26 to withdraw and deposit cash through our partner stores. You can see how this works by visiting our Support Center here.
Does anything change in terms of the fees or cost related to using the account (price list)?
Offering an Italian IBAN won't change the costs associated with your account. You can check the price list with all relevant information here(new tab).
Is it true that if I open an account now, I wonâ€™t have to pay the stamp duty?
A stamp duty of â‚¬34.20 is due on accounts with an annual average balance exceeding â‚¬5,000 (subject to subsequent changes to the law). It is paid by the Bank on bank statements until 30th September 2020. Unless the promotion is extended, the annual stamp duty will be paid by the customer from 30th  September 2020. It will be charged on the customer's account by direct debit. Customers will not not need to provide any kind of declaration.

title: Come proteggere il mio conto?
content:
La sicurezza del tuo conto e il tuo dati personali sono la nostra prioritÃ . 
Se ritieni che il tuo login di N26 possa essere compromesso o che qualcuno sta provando a contattarci per tuo conto, Ã¨ fondamentale cambiare immediatamente la tua password del tuo account N26.
Per fare ciÃ², effettua il log in nella tuo app e vai a Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Sicurezza. Per favore scegli una password sicura e non condividere i dettagli del tuo log con nessuno. 
In quanto titolare del conto, dovresti essere l'unico a creare e ad avere accesso ai tuoi dati. Per ulteriori consigli su come proteggere il tuo conto, ti invitiamo a leggere l'articolo come proteggere la mia identitÃ ?
Se ritieni che il tuo conto sia stato compromesso o manomesso, per favore contattaci immediatamente. 

Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you mayÂ open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in â‚¬, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or â‚¬25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in â‚¬ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to â‚¬ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-â‚¬ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

content:
Il codice di associazione Ã¨ richiesto perÂ collegare il tuo smartphone. Se per qualsiasi motivo non hai ricevuto il tuo codice di associazione tramite SMS, puoi richiederlo fino a cinque volte tramite l'app. Aspetta gentilmente 30 secondi prima di richiederne uno nuovo.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
Weâ€™ve made aÂ video(new tab)Â to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If youâ€™ve lost your iPhone and arenâ€™t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card wonâ€™t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If youâ€™re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if youâ€™re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: Â¿CÃ³mo ingresar dinero en la cuenta?
content:
Puedes ingresar dinero en tu cuenta de varias formas, en cuanto hayas verificado tu identidad:
MoneyBeam: recibe dinero instantÃ¡neo de otros usuarios de N26.
Tarjeta de dÃ©bito: Puedes ingresar dinero en tu cuenta introduciendo los detalles de tu tarjeta desde la app de N26. Puedes ingresar entre 20 y 150 â‚¬. No podemos aceptar tarjetas de crÃ©dito American Express.
Apple Pay o Google Pay(pestaÃ±a nueva):Â  Puedes ingresar dinero a tu cuenta utilizando Apple Pay (para dispositivos iOS) o Google Pay (para dispositivos Android). Puedes ingresar entre 20 y 150 â‚¬. No podemos aceptar tarjetas de crÃ©dito American Express o de prepago.
Transferencia SEPA: La transferencia tiene que ser en euros y desde uno de los paÃ­ses de la zona SEPA. Solo necesitas el IBAN de tu cuenta y tu nombre tal y como viene en el documento de identidad que utilizaste para abrir la cuenta. Ten en cuenta lo siguiente: 
A la hora de introducir los datos de destinatario, asegÃºrate de que de que tu nombre estÃ¡ escrito como en el documento que utilizaste durante de la verificaciÃ³n de identidad (especialmente si tienes una cuenta N26 Business, ya que no aceptamos nombres de empresas). 
La transferencia serÃ¡ inmediata si el banco emisor acepta transferencias inmediatas, en caso contrario, se completarÃ¡ en un dÃ­a laborable. Sin embargo, debido a los horarios de apertura de los bancos involucrados, un dÃ­a bancario puede extenderse a dos dÃ­as hÃ¡biles.
En Francia tu primera transferencia debe ser desde otra cuenta que estÃ© a tu nombre. Para el resto de regiones, puedes utilizar cualquier cuenta (sin que sea necesario que seas el titular). 
CASH26: si tienes una cuenta en Alemania, Austria o Italia, utiliza este sistema para depositar efectivo en alguno de los comercios asociados.
Terceros: N26 es Â«El Banco MÃ³vilÂ», por lo que nuestros productos estÃ¡n totalmente orientados hacia el Ã¡mbito tecnolÃ³gico de los pagos mÃ³viles y contactless. De todas formas, si necesitas ingresar dinero en efectivo y no vives en un paÃ­s donde estÃ© disponible CASH26, puedes hacerlo a travÃ©s de terceros, como por ejemplo con el servicio de giros nacionales que ofrece Correos(pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: How to export a list of my transactions?
content:
OurÂ web app(new tab)Â allows you to search within your transactions. You can also download a history of your transactions in CSV format. To export your transaction list:

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn mein Konto gehackt wurde?
content:
Wenn du verdÃ¤chtige AktivitÃ¤ten auf deinem Konto bemerkst, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.
Am schnellsten erreichst du uns im Chat Ã¼ber die App, auf der N26 Website und - wie hier - unter einigen Artikeln im Support Center. Klicke einfach auf Kundenservice-Chat.
Wenn du lieber telefonieren mÃ¶chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zurÃ¼ck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erklÃ¤re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.
Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.
Um unsere SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen auch Ã¼ber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.
Die einzelnen FÃ¤lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.
Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir auÃŸerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,
Mehr darÃ¼ber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall schÃ¼tzen, erfÃ¤hrst du in unserem Blog(neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel Ã¼ber Sicherheit bei N26(neuen Tab).

Du erreichst uns im Chat tÃ¤glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.
N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account or a N26 You membership. 
To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.
Check the conditions of theÂ delivery and accept the N26 MetalÂ T&Cs(new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering yourÂ Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days.
The membership fee of â‚¬16,90 (Â£14.90 in UK) will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 Metal membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose â€œadd a new recipientâ€ or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we donâ€™t currently offer theÂ foreign currency(new tab)Â you need, please visitÂ TransferWise(new tab)Â for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? Youâ€™ll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.
TransferWise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.
