title: Â¿CÃ³mo descargar mi informaciÃ³n personal?
content:
La RegulaciÃ³n General de ProtecciÃ³n de Datos (RGPD) es una nueva regulaciÃ³n europea sobre la protecciÃ³n de datos y la privacidad que entrÃ³ en vigor el 25 de mayo de 2018. Como respuesta a esta ley, hemos aÃ±adido la opciÃ³n de exportar tu informaciÃ³n en laÂ Web App(pestaÃ±a nueva): entra enÂ ðŸ‘¤ Mi Cuenta, despuÃ©s enÂ ConfiguraciÃ³n PersonalÂ y finalmente haz clic enÂ Tus datos personales.
Como banco mÃ³vil que somos, entendemos la importancia de la seguridad de los datos. Debes saber que almacenamos el mÃ­nimo de datos posibles, solo aquellos que estamos obligados a tener por ley. AdemÃ¡s, eliminamos los datos una vez que dejan de ser necesarios para nuestros productos o servicios.
El artÃ­culo 20 de la RGPD afirma que tienes derecho a la portabilidad de tus datos y te permite cambiar de proveedor de servicios en caso de que quieras abrir una cuenta bancaria con otro banco. Por ello y de acuerdo con este artÃ­culo tenemos que enviarte estos datos en un formato legible por mÃ¡quina. 
Ten en cuenta que este archivo estÃ¡ destinado a la portabilidad de datos y puede que tu ordenador no pueda leer archivos en formato JSON. En caso de que puedas abrir el archivo, es posible que sea difÃ­cil de entender ya que no estÃ¡ pensando para que las personas lo puedan comprender, si no una mÃ¡quina. 
Como somos un banco online, entendemos la importancia de la protecciÃ³n de datos. Por ello, tomamos medidas de seguridad extra antes de que puedas descargar tus datos. Hacemos esto para asegurarnos de que el titular de la cuenta es la persona que estÃ¡ solicitando los datos.
Puedes solicitar la descarga de datos personales tanto de tu cuenta actual como de una cuenta que hayas cerrado en los Ãºltimos 6 meses. La informaciÃ³n viene en un formato de lectura electrÃ³nica para que puedas compartirla con terceros si lo deseas.
Por favor inicie sesiÃ³n enÂ esta pÃ¡gina(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â utilizando la misma informaciÃ³n de acceso a su cuenta de N26.
TendrÃ¡s que crear una contraseÃ±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estarÃ¡ activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contraseÃ±a se introduce errÃ³neamente 5 veces, el link caducarÃ¡ y tendrÃ¡s que realizar otra solicitud.
Solo podrÃ¡s descargar tus datos si has cerrado tu cuenta en los Ãºltimos 6 meses. Para solicitar esta informaciÃ³n completa elÂ formulario(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â y asegÃºrate de que los datos coinciden con los de tu antigua cuenta. NecesitarÃ¡s:
nombre, apellido, nÃºmero de identidad y fecha de expiraciÃ³n del documento que proporcionaste al abrir la cuenta (DNI o pasaporte)
email registrado en tu cuenta
fecha (mes y aÃ±o) en la que creaste y cerraste la cuenta (revisa el email que recibiste al confirmar tu direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico en el proceso de registro)
Por motivos de seguridad, tenemos que asegurarnos de que realmente eres tÃº quien estÃ¡ descargando los datos; si algÃºn campo estÃ¡ incorrecto o incompleto, tu peticiÃ³n no serÃ¡ aceptada.
TendrÃ¡s que crear una contraseÃ±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estarÃ¡ activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contraseÃ±a se introduce errÃ³neamente 5 veces, el link caducarÃ¡ y tendrÃ¡s que realizar otra solicitud.
Si quieres mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n sobre la recopilaciÃ³n, el uso y el procesamiento de tus datos personales, visita nuestraÂ PolÃ­tica de Privacidad(pestaÃ±a nueva).

title: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas obtenir de crÃ©dit ?
content:
Lors de votre demande de crÃ©dit, nous vous posons une sÃ©rie de questions sur votre situation personnelle et financiÃ¨re. Il vous sera probablement demandÃ© de vous connecter Ã  votre autre compte bancaire directement depuis lâ€™application N26 pour continuer votre demande (obligatoire en Allemagne, si votre compte N26 n'est pas votre compte principal).
Cet autre compte doit exclusivement Ãªtre un compte que vous dÃ©tenez auprÃ¨s dâ€™une banque du pays depuis lequel vous faites votre demande de crÃ©dit. Si vous faites votre demande en France, le compte secondaire pris en compte dans lâ€™Ã©valuation de votre demande de crÃ©dit devra ainsi Ãªtre dans une banque franÃ§aise, en Allemagne le compte secondaire devra Ãªtre allemand.

Une fois la demande de crÃ©dit envoyÃ©e via lâ€™application, vous ne pourrez pas modifier votre demande pendant 90 jours, et ce, mÃªme si votre situation Ã©volue entre temps. Il vous faudra donc attendre la suppression de votre premiÃ¨re requÃªte pour faire une nouvelle demande de crÃ©dit.

title: Pourquoi ai-je Ã©tÃ© dÃ©bitÃ© dâ€™un montant qui ne correspond pas Ã  ma transaction ?
content:
N26 fonctionne en temps rÃ©el. Nous vous informons grÃ¢ce Ã  des notifications push dÃ¨s quâ€™une transaction apparaÃ®t sur votre compte.
Il arrive parfois quâ€™une transaction semble suspicieuse car le montant dÃ©bitÃ© ne correspond pas au montant de la transaction. VoilÃ  les raisons pour lesquelles cela peut arriver :
Le marchand a Ã©mis une empreinte bancaire pour une caution (dans une station essence, pour une location de voiture ou un hÃ´tel par exemple). Dans ce cas, le montant de cette caution sera recrÃ©ditÃ© sur votre compte dÃ¨s quâ€™elle ne sera plus nÃ©cessaire.
Lâ€™Ã©volution du taux de change peut influencer lÃ©gÃ¨rement le montant des transactions faites en monnaies Ã©trangÃ¨res.
Dans les deux cas, aucun frais sur la diffÃ©rence entre ces deux montants ne seront prÃ©levÃ©s.
Si vous Ãªtes certain quâ€™il sâ€™agit dâ€™uneÂ transaction frauduleuse, veuillez prendre contact avec le Service Client par Livechat pour obtenir de lâ€™aide.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp(new tab)Â to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first Mastercard transaction of Â£10. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
On November 6th, 2018, weÂ updated our Refer a Friend Program. Your pending invites and earned rewards before that date are no longer visible in the app or WebApp. However, pending rewards from before that date that become eligible will still be rewarded in the next 90 days. After that, they will become invalid.
If you want to make sure that you'll receive your reward for each of the invited friends please send them another invite using the new program. They can use your personal code or link when signing up.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 30 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions(new tab).

title: Cosa fare se il mio IBAN N26 non Ã¨ accettato?
content:
Lâ€™IBAN include il codice paese DE, due cifre di controllo, le otto cifre del codice sort della banca e le dieci cifre del tuo numero di conto. Per esempio: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
I paesi aderenti dellâ€™area SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area - Area unica dei pagamenti in euro) hanno concordato il sistema IBAN per semplificare i pagamenti nazionali e internazionali e ridurre il rischio di errore nelle comunicazione e nellâ€™elaborazione delle transazioni.
I commercianti e i datori di lavoro che non accettano i codici IBAN di altri Stati membri dellâ€™Area Economica Europea violano la legge europea del 1Â° febbraio 2016 (Articolo 9 del Regolamento UE 260/2012 (nuova tabella)).
Se hai subito discriminazioni sulla base dellâ€™IBAN, contatta direttamente l'autoritÃ  nazionale(nuova tabella) competente del tuo PaeseÂ (nuova tabella)e denuncia lâ€™episodio. Fornisci i tuoi contatti, il nome del commerciante o dell'azienda che non ha accettato lâ€™IBAN e una breve descrizione dellâ€™accaduto (incluso uno screenshot del rifiuto o altra documentazione rilevante).

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
If your card is lost, stolen, broken, or if there was a problem with theÂ deliveryÂ of your first card, you can reorder a new one.
First, check your shipping address in the app: select ðŸ‘¤ My Account then Settings and Personal Settings. By tappingÂ Shipping address, you can view and update your shipping address, then:
If you've activated a card already: Reorder a card in the app by tappingÂ My AccountÂ thenÂ Card Settings. Swipe until you see the card you want to order and tapÂ Reorder.
If you've never had an active card: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat so we can reorder a card for you.
Deliveries for N26 You or N26 Metal upgrades are free. And in case your first or upgrade card gets lost on its way to you, weâ€™ll also delivery you a new card for free.
Once your new card arrives, youâ€™ll need toÂ activate itÂ either in the N26 app or our Webapp(new tab).

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card canâ€™t be used for online purchases.

title: Come si fa un bonifico SEPA?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Puoi inviare bonifici verso tutti i paesi dell'area SEPA (se la banca ricevente accetta trasferimenti in euro).
I bonifici in uscita possono essere effettuati tramite la versione mobile e web dellâ€™app N26 in questo modo:
Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Gestisci.Â 
Seleziona Dal mio conto,  Bonifico bancario e poi Aggiungi nuovo beneficiario.Â 
Inserisci il nome e l'IBAN del beneficiario e seleziona Continua.
Inserisci l'importo e seleziona Avanti.
Aggiungi un messaggio se necessario, oppure seleziona Salta.
Controlla i dati del bonifico nellâ€™apposita schermata.
Nella stessa schermata puoi  scegliere la data in cui vuoi che il bonifico venga inviato oppure salvarlo come ordine permanente.
Seleziona Invia e conferma con il tuo PIN di Conferma.
Dovrai, infine, confermare o annullare il bonifico tramite notifica push dal tuo dispositivo associato.
Una volta che il bonifico viene confermato nella app, non possiamo piÃ¹ annullarlo o cambiare i dettagli del beneficiario.
Se non riesci a confermare lâ€™invio del bonifico tramite app, dovresti accertarti di quanto segue:
hai una connessione internet stabile
hai abilitato le notifiche push sul tuo dispositivo (le notifiche si abilitano dalle impostazioni del dispositivo e non dallâ€™app N26)Â 
stai usando il dispositivo associato 
Dopo aver inviato il bonifico, potrai scaricare il PDF relativo alla transazione in questo modo:Â 
Vai alla tua lista di transazioni.
Individua e seleziona il bonifico.Â 
Scorri verso il basso, fino a Informazioni sul bonifico e seleziona Conferma di trasferimento

title: Come funziona 3D Secure?
content:
3D Secure ti protegge dalle frodi online con carta. Si attiva automaticamente quando attivi la tua carta nellâ€™app. Non servono password aggiuntive.
Ogni volta che effettui unÂ pagamento onlineÂ con la tua Mastercard, 3D Secure ti conferma la transazione entro 5 minuti tramite unÂ messaggio push. Se non vedi la transazione, prova alcuniÂ suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemiÂ che abbiamo raccolto.
Se effettui un acquisto utilizzando lo smartphone, nellâ€™app verrÃ  visualizzata una transazione in sospeso. Tocca lâ€™icona della campana per visualizzare il messaggio push per confermare e finalizzare lâ€™acquisto. Poi torna al sito web dellâ€™esercente. Dovresti vedere una conferma dellâ€™avvenuto acquisto entro pochi secondi.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.

title: CRS - PerchÃ© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
content:
Secondo il Common Reporting Standard (CRS),Â  N26, in quanto istituto finanziario, Ã¨ obbligato a fornire informazioni alle autoritÃ  fiscali dellâ€™Unione Europea sui conti di utenti che hanno la residenza fiscale in altro paese.
Il CRS Ã¨ stato implementato dallâ€™OCSE e disciplina le modalitÃ  attraverso le quali deve avvenire la scambio automatico delle informazioni fiscali (AEOI). Lo scopo del CRS Ã¨ quello di permettere alle autoritÃ  fiscali di avere una chiara comprensione delle risorse finanziarie dei residenti depositate allâ€™estero in modo da poter combattere lâ€™evasione fiscale. Oltre 90 paesi hanno aderito allâ€™iniziativa di condividere informazioni sulle risorse finanziarie e sulle entrate dei residenti in conformitÃ  con il CRS.
Â Per determinare se un conto debba essere riportato alle autoritÃ  fiscali per adempiere alle finalitÃ  del CRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:Â Â 
Residenza fiscale:
Di norma, si Ã¨ soggetti a tasse nel paese in cui si ha la residenza e le tasse vengono calcolate su tutte le entrate percepite. Se hai la residenza in piÃ¹ di un paese, normalmente esistono degli accordi bilaterali tra i paesi che aiutano a determinare in quale paese Ã¨ necessario pagare le tasse. PuÃ² succedere di essere soggetti a tasse in piÃ¹ di un paese nellâ€™arco dellâ€™anno. In tal caso, Ã¨ necessario fornire tutte le informazioni rilevanti (residenze fiscali e relativo numero di identificazione fiscale) alle autoritÃ  fiscali.Â Â 
Numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN)Â 
Lâ€™emissione e il formato del numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN) differisce a seconda del paese. La Commissione Europea offre indicazioni chiare sul TIN da riportare.Â 
Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. BasterÃ  eseguire lâ€™accesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.Â

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
We are partnering with Token.io(new tab) to provide and support a dedicated interface for third-party payment service providers (''TPPs''). The complete documentation and the on-boarding instructions can be found in the Token.io developer portal(new tab). 
As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following: 
Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);

Secure and authorised access to an account
TPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Access to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.
Please find the detailed technical documentation for the fallback interface below:
AISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
PISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
TPPs may contact N26 via open.banking@n26.com to provide their QWAC certificates and get technical support.
The reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the N26 user interface:
3rd quarter of 2019(new tab)
4th quarter of 2019(new tab)

title: How to revoke my loan application?
content:

content:

Vous avez la possibilitÃ© de choisir une Mastercard parmi les 5 nouvelles couleurs disponibles. Pour cela, depuis la rubrique â€œParamÃ¨tres de votre carteâ€, choisissez Renvoyer puis sÃ©lectionnez la couleur de votre choix parmi celles-ci:Â Rhubarbe, OcÃ©an, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.

title: Update on N26 Invest (General information)
content:
*Update effective 17.07.19
Weâ€™ve decided to end our partnership with Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo), the company that provides our N26 Invest product. From 17.09.2019, N26 Invest will no longer be available in the N26 app. We made this decision as we feel the product no longer serves the needs of the majority of our current customers.

Weâ€™ve sent you â€“ N26 Invest customers â€“ an email update. This article contains detailed information on the three different options available to you:

Until 16.09.2019 you can liquidate and cash out your N26 Invest portfolio via the N26 app. Full instructions on this option can be found by clicking this link.

You can sign-up with Moneyfarm and reinvest your N26 Invest portfolio with Moneyfarm.
Note: In May April 2019 European digital wealth manager Moneyfarm (an online investment company) acquired Vaamo. Further information on Moneyfarm can be found here(new tab).
If you choose this option youâ€™ll have your N26 Invest plan closed, and the portfolio capital reinvested into a new Moneyfarm investment plan.
Step by step instructions can be found by clicking this link. 

FFB is the bank that holds your Invest depot. If by 17.09.19 youâ€™ve not chosen option 1 or 2 as described above, FFB will contact you by post providing you with a letter that will contain your login data that can be used to access your existing investment portfolio via the FFB website.
Note: If you have changed your address since youâ€™ve opened your invest account, please inform FFB so that they send the documents to the correct address.

Accessing your investment portfolio through FFB's website will be possible as soon as you receive your login data from FFB. Full information about this option can be found by clicking this link.
Whilst weâ€™re ending our Partnership with Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo) and ending our business relationship with you in regards to the N26 Invest product, this will have no bearing on any other aspect of your N26 account or any premium membership plans that you may have with us. 

Since launching N26 Invest in 2016, weâ€™ve gone on to develop more products & services that reflect our growing customer base and the increasingly global nature of our bank. We are committed to bringing you new products that will make your financial lives easier and tailored for your needs in the future.

The good news is you can continue your investment portfolio with FIL Fondsbank. The email you received from us summarises the information, and you can see further details in our Support Center. Alternatively if you take no action, FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) will contact you by letter before 17.09.2019 providing you with login data to use so you can access your existing portfolio via the FFB website as soon as you receive your login data to the FFB website from FFB.

In April this year, European digital wealth manager Moneyfarm acquired Vaamo. Further information about Moneyfarm can be found on their website(new tab).

Section 11.3. of our Terms and Conditions for N26 Invest details the right of termination from our side. Sorry if this has come as disappointing news to you. Donâ€™t forget you still have the option to reinvest your N26 Invest portfolio with Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo) as explained in our email and dedicated article on the subject. You also have the option to continue your current N26 Invest plan via FIL Fondsbank GmbH.

Not at all. Closure of your N26 Invest portfolio will not affect your N26 account, premium membership or other products you may hold with us.

Any capital gains tax you would be required to pay will be withheld automatically by FFBÂ  unless you have provided an exemption order for capital gains (Freistellungsauftrag). Any remaining cash would then be transferred to the reference account (your N26 bank account).Â Â Â 
In order to settle tax debts you must explicitly instruct FFB to sell units within the investment funds. If you close N26 Invest via the N26 app all investment funds will be sold automatically and any capital gains tax withheld by FFB.

After closing an N26 Invest portfolio, FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) will send you tax reports by post if there was a tax exemption in place. In the event that you move after closure of your N26 Invest portfolio, please contact FFB to inform them of your new address.Â 

Contact details for FFB:

Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm
Telephone: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200
Fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555

title: Come scaricare i miei dati personali?
content:
Il General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Ã¨ un regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy entrato in vigore il 25 maggio 2018. In seguito all'introduzione di questo regolamento, abbiamo aggiunto unâ€™opzione nella nostraÂ webapp (nuova tabella)che ti permette di scaricare i tuoi dati con una procedura molto semplice: 
 Il mio conto > Impostazioni personali > Dati personali
Il diritto alla portabilitÃ  dei dati secondo l'articolo 20 GDPR fa riferimento a dati precedentemente forniti e permette agli utenti di trasferire i propri dati ad un altro fornitore di servizi. Il GDPR richiede che i dati trasmessi con questa finalitÃ  siano in un formato leggibile elettronicamente (JSON file). 
Il tuo dispositivo potrebbe non supportare tale formato e, nel caso lo supportasse, ti preghiamo di notare che i dati sono salvati in modo da essere leggibili solo elettronicamente. 
In qualitÃ  di banca mobile, la sicurezza dei dati Ã¨ una nostra prioritÃ . Prima di permettere ai nostri clienti di scaricare i propri dati, verifichiamo l'autenticitÃ  dell'identitÃ  di chi effettua la richiesta di scaricare tali dati. 
Puoi richiedere di scaricare i dati personali che hai fornito per un conto N26 attualmente aperto oppure per un conto N26 chiuso negli ultimi 6 mesi. I dati saranno forniti in un formato leggibile elettronicamente in modo da poterli trasferire a terze parti di tua scelta.
Accedi alÂ modulo(nuova tabella)Â con i dati del tuo conto attuale.
Da qui, Ã¨ necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo allâ€™indirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sarÃ  valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui riceverai l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sarÃ  piÃ¹ valido e sarÃ  necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.
Puoi scaricare i tuoi dati fino a 6 mesi dopo la data di chiusura del conto. Per richiedere tali informazioni, completa ilÂ modulo(nuova tabella)Â di richiesta dati assicurandoti che le informazioni fornite corrispondano esattamente a quelle di accesso al tuo conto N26. Ti verranno richieste le seguenti informazioni:
nome e cognome, numero e data di scadenza del documento dâ€™identitÃ  (documento identificativo nazionale o passaporto) utilizzato per la verifica il conto
indirizzo e-mail del conto registrato
data (mese e anno) di apertura e di chiusura del conto (controlla la tua posta elettronica)
Ti preghiamo di notare che se un campo Ã¨ errato o incompleto, la richiesta non andrÃ  a buon fine.
Da qui, sarÃ  necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo allâ€™indirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sarÃ  valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui hai ricevuto l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sarÃ  piÃ¹ valido e sarÃ  necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.
Per ulteriori informazioni riguardanti la raccolta, lâ€™utilizzo e il trattamento dei dati personali leggi la nostraÂ Informativa sulla privacy(nuova tabella)Â aggiornata (DEU(nuova tabella)) (EU(nuova tabella)).

title: Â¿CÃ³mo aÃ±adir y eliminar participantes en un espacio compartido?
content:
CÃ³mo eliminar a un participante de un espacio compartido:
En la secciÃ³n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el menÃº en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha.

Confirma la notificaciÃ³n ''Aceptar poder notarial'' que te llegarÃ¡ a tu dispositivo vinculado.
Necesitas tener algÃºn espacio sin utilizar para aceptar la invitaciÃ³n a un espacio compartido. En caso contrario, tendrÃ¡s que eliminar alguno para liberar espacio.

Confirma la notificaciÃ³n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''

PourÂ avoir accÃ¨sÂ auxÂ services bancaires de base, vous ne devez Ãªtre en possession dâ€™aucun autre compte bancaire, ni chez N26, ni auprÃ¨s dâ€™une autre institution financiÃ¨re en Allemagne. N26 est en mesure deÂ refuser votre demandeÂ sous certaines conditions.

title: Warum wurde mir eine LastschriftgebÃ¼hr berechnet?

Da SEPA-Ãœberweisungen mehr als einen Tag dauern kÃ¶nnen, empfehlen wir dir, den fÃ¤lligen Betrag mit MoneyBeam (zwischen N26 Konten) oder CASH26 (wenn du in Deutschland oder Ã–sterreich wohnst) zu Ã¼berweisen. Bei beiden Methoden wird der Betrag sofort deinem Konto gutgeschrieben.

title: How to repay my loan early?
content:
You can always repay yourÂ N26 CreditÂ loan early. Keep in mind that a 1% early repayment fee applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.
Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and weâ€™ll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.
*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: How much does an N26 account cost?
content:
Your N26 account comes with no minimum balance fees and no account maintenance fees.
For further details, please check our fee schedule below:
All fee amounts will be automatically withdrawn from your Account, except where prohibited by law. Any time your remaining balance is less than the fee amount being assessed, the balance of your Account will be applied to the fee amount resulting in a negative balance on your Account.



The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to get a loan?
content:
(Applies to Germany and France)
With N26 Credit, weâ€™ve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between â‚¬1.000 to â‚¬50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.
Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products: Weâ€™ll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (youâ€™ll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if youâ€™ve used N26 for less than 6 months).
Prove your identity: Weâ€™ll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if youâ€™re a non-EU citizen, youâ€™ll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.
Edit your answers during the application process: Once youâ€™re happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and weâ€™ll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you wonâ€™t be able to request another loan during that time.
Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, youâ€™ll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.
Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.
We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if youÂ change your planÂ or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.
For more information, see the N26 CreditÂ T&Cs(new tab).

title: Wie kann ich meine IdentitÃ¤t schÃ¼tzen?
content:
Um deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu schÃ¼tzen und deren Missbrauch zu vermeiden, beachte bitte Folgendes:
Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine IdentitÃ¤t im Namen anderer Personen oder Unternehmen zu Ã¼berprÃ¼fen. Dazu gehÃ¶ren ÃœberprÃ¼fungen fÃ¼r WohnungsmietvertrÃ¤ge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschlieÃŸlich Stellen bei N26). Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen kÃ¶nnen.Â Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, kÃ¶nnen diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine persÃ¶nlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.
Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht Ã¼berprÃ¼fte EmpfÃ¤nger.
Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer RoutineprÃ¼fungÂ unterzogen wird.Â Sende nur gÃ¼ltige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.
Wir werden dich auÃŸerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen.Â Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur VerfÃ¼gung, auch wenn sie N26 Ã¤hnelt.
Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verdÃ¤chtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein kÃ¶nnte, zÃ¶gere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

title: Comment ajouter un nouveau bÃ©nÃ©ficiaire de virement ?
content:

title: Â¿Por quÃ© me han cobrado mÃ¡s de lo esperado?
content:
Todas las transacciones se hacen en tiempo real. Te avisaremos cada vez que haya una transacciÃ³n entrante o saliente mediante una notificaciÃ³n push.
En ocasiones, una transacciÃ³n puede resultar sospechosa debido a que la cantidad final es diferente a la cantidad original. Esto puede deberse a varias razones:
Un comerciante puede bloquear una cantidad superior a la del precio del servicio a modo de depÃ³sito (ocurre a menudo en las estaciones de servicio, con el alquiler de vehÃ­culos o con reservas de hotel). La diferencia entre el depÃ³sito y el precio del servicio se ingresarÃ¡ en tu cuenta cuando pase la fecha de vencimiento.
Los tipos de cambio pueden dar lugar a ligeras variaciones en las transacciones en moneda extranjera.
En ambos casos, no cobramos ningÃºn interÃ©s por la diferencia de las cuantÃ­as. 
Pero da por sentado que si una transacciÃ³n no se ha autorizado por ti, el propietario de la cuenta, te ayudaremos aÂ recuperar tu dinero.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.
Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:
The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.
Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â 
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â 
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â 
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â 
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â 

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.

How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How can I keep track of my daily spending?
content:
To make it easier for you to stay on top of your daily spending, we automatically sort your transactions and display our findings in Statistics (the bullet point icon in the top-right corner of the mobile app). We do this by sorting your:
Categories:
We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve the way we sort transactions into categories such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping. For example, if you send a transfer with the reference text Lunch, weâ€™ll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category.
If you feel like a category doesnâ€™t fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags(#):
Weâ€™ve also added default hashtags for:
Transaction times (#weekend)
Types of transactions (#books)
Locations of purchases (#newyork).
You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags:
Tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags, such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth or to remove unwanted tags.
Please note that we are constantly adding new features to our mobile application. If you do not see a feature that we describe here, please make sure you are using the latest version of our app by visiting the App Store or Google Play. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie lade ich meine persÃ¶nlichen Daten herunter?
content:
Die Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine europÃ¤ische Verordnung zum Schutz personenbezogener Daten, die am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft getreten ist. Wir haben daraufhin eine Funktion zum Datenexport in der WebApp(neuen Tab) hinzugefÃ¼gt, um dein Recht auf DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 20 DSGVO zu gewÃ¤hrleisten. Die Beschaffung der von dir bereitgestellten persÃ¶nlichen Daten ist transparent und einfach und somit besitzt du die vollstÃ¤ndige Kontrolle: Gehe zu ðŸ‘¤ Mein Konto und PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen und klicke auf Deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten.
Das Recht auf DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit gemÃ¤ÃŸ Art. 20 DSGVO umfasst personenbezogene Daten, die du uns bereitgestellt hast. Art. 20 DSGVO soll dir ermÃ¶glichen, ohne groÃŸen Aufwand den Dienstleister zu wechseln fÃ¼r den Fall, dass du die von dir bereitgestellten Daten nutzen mÃ¶chtest, um ein Konto bei einer anderen Bank zu erÃ¶ffnen. Aus diesem Grund verpflichtet uns Art. 20 DSGVO dazu, dir diese Daten in einem maschinenlesbaren Format bereitzustellen. Dabei ist zu beachten, dass die Datei lediglich fÃ¼r Zwecke der DatenÃ¼bertragbarkeit zu nutzen ist und dein Computer die JSON Datei mÃ¶glicherweise nicht lesen kann. Falls du die JSON Datei Ã¶ffnen kannst, kÃ¶nnen ihre Inhalte dennoch schwierig zu verstehen sein, da die Datei fÃ¼r Maschinenlesbarkeit konzipiert ist und nicht fÃ¼r die unmittelbare Verarbeitung durch Menschen. Die Datei, die wir ausstellen, ist lediglich zur Ãœbertragung an andere Banken bestimmt.
Als mobile Bank sind wir uns der Wichtigkeit der Sicherheit deiner Daten bewusst. Daher haben wir zusÃ¤tzliche SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen installiert bevor du deine Daten herunterladen kannst. Diese MaÃŸnahmen sind im folgenden Absatz beschrieben. Wir tun dies, um sicherzustellen, dass du, der Kontoinhaber, auch derjenige bist, der die Daten herunterlÃ¤dt.Â 
Du kannst die von dir bereitgestellten personenbezogenen Daten, die du fÃ¼r ein laufendes oder vorheriges Konto angegeben hast, bis zu 6 Monate nach KontoschlieÃŸung beantragen herunterzuladen. Du erhÃ¤ltst das Dokument in einem maschinenlesbaren Format, sodass du es mit einem Dritten teilen kannst.
Bitte frage deine Daten Ã¼ber unser Webformular(neuen Tab) an.
Du wirst aufgefordert, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort fÃ¼r den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden gÃ¼ltig, ab dem Zeitpunkt, an dem du die E-Mail erhalten hast. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ungÃ¼ltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.
Du kannst von dir bereitgestellte personenbezogene Daten bis zu 6 Monate nach KontoschlieÃŸung herunterladen. FÃ¼lle einfach das Datenanforderungsformular(neuen Tab) aus und vergewissere dich, dass deine angegebenen Informationen mit deinen vorherigen Kontoinformationen exakt Ã¼bereinstimmen. Welche persÃ¶nlichen Informationen du benÃ¶tigst:
Vor- und Nachname, Lichtbildausweis (Identifikationsnummer und Ablaufdatum des Dokuments mit dem du dein Konto bestÃ¤tigt hast (Personalausweis oder Reisepass)
Die registrierte E-Mail-Adresse des Kontos
Datum (Monat und Jahr) an dem du dein Konto erstellt und abgeschlossen hast (sieh in deiner BestÃ¤tigungsemail nach).
Aus SicherheitsgrÃ¼nden sind wir verpflichtet sicherzustellen, dass die Daten heruntergeladen wurden: Wenn du ein Feld leer lÃ¤sst oder falsch ausgefÃ¼llt hast, kann deine Anfrage nicht abgeschlossen werden.
Du wirst aufgefordert, ein temporÃ¤res Passwort fÃ¼r den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist aber nur fÃ¼r 24 Stunden gÃ¼ltig. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ungÃ¼ltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.
FÃ¼r weitere Informationen Ã¼ber die Erfassung, Verwendung oder Verarbeitung deiner persÃ¶nlichen Daten, schau dir bitte unsere DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung (neuen Tab)an.

title: Da sapere sullâ€™IBAN italiano
content:
IMPORTANTE - Tutti coloro che aprono un conto a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 riceveranno automaticamente un IBAN italiano.Â I clienti che hanno aperto il conto prima di questa data e sono in possesso di un IBAN tedesco verranno contattati una volta che il servizio sarÃ  disponibile.Â 

PerchÃ© non Ã¨ stato offerto un IBAN italiano fin dallâ€™inizio?
Secondo la normativa UE, tutti gli Stati membri devono garantire che i titolari di conti bancari non subiscano discriminazioni per ragioni di natura geografica. Questo significa che i gestori delle utenze, ad esempio, oppure i datori di lavoro sono tenuti ad accettare codici IBAN di conti aperti presso banche con sede in qualunque Paese membro dellâ€™UE.Â Tuttavia, abbiamo ascoltato i nostri clienti e sappiamo che questo non sempre accade: le normative vengono spesso ignorate.Â Per questo motivo abbiamo deciso di offrire ai nostri clienti italiani un IBAN locale.
Posso ricevere l'accredito del mio stipendio, della mia pensione o del mio sussidio?
Certo! Puoi far ricevere accrediti in Euro fornendo l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al mandante.
Posso ricevere addebiti diretti?
Certo! BasterÃ  fornire l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al beneficiario.

Posso impostare ordini permanenti?
Certo! Puoi creare ordini permanenti tramite l'app di N26, nella sezione Bonifico bancario.

Nellâ€™effettuare un bonifico verso il mio conto N26, la banca ricevente non riconosce i dettagli bancari. PerchÃ© succede questo?
Molto probabilmente la banca emittente non ha ancora integrato il nostro BIC italiano nel loro sistema. Contatta la banca in questione in modo che possano aggiornare i dati in loro possesso ed elaborare il tuo bonifico.
Posso depositare contanti sul mio conto N26 con IBAN italiano?
I nostri clienti residenti in Italia possono usare CASH26 per prelevare e depositare contanti tramite i negozi convenzionati. 
Ci saranno variazioni relativi ai costi del conto?
Avere un IBAN italiano non comporterÃ  particolari variazioni dei costi associati al conto. Puoi controllare i nostri fogli informativi qui.(nuova tabella) 
Ã‰  vero che se apro un conto adesso, non pago il bollo?
L' imposta di bollo sullâ€™estratto conto Ã¨ dovuta in caso di giacenza media superiore a 5.000â‚¬ (su base annua e salvo successive modifiche di legge) in misura pari a 34,20â‚¬.
Lâ€™ imposta Ã© a carico della Banca sugli estratti conto fino al 30/09/2020. Salvo estensione della promozione, sarÃ  a carico del cliente dopo il 30/09/2020. In tal caso l'imposta verrÃ  addebitata sul conto del cliente tramite addebito diretto (il cliente non dovrÃ  fornire dichiarazioni specifiche).

title: How can I credit my salary on my N26 account?
content:
Having your salary credited to your N26 account is easy, simply provide your N26 IBAN to your employer, whoâ€™ll transfer the amount to your account via SEPA transfer.
SEPA transfers are the official payment method of the SEPA area, which includes most of the European countries. In case your employer refuses to credit your salary through SEPA transfer because you have a German IBAN and not an Italian one, please check the "What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted" article on our Support Center.

content: German deposit protection(new tab)Â insures all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. title: Wie zahle ich Steuern auf N26 Savings und N26 Invest?
content:
MitÂ N26 SavingsÂ (nur Deutschland und Ã–sterreich) undÂ N26 InvestÂ (nur Deutschland) sind unsere Partnerbanken gesetzlich verpflichtet, Steuern an die zustÃ¤ndigen SteuerbehÃ¶rden weiterzugeben.
JÃ¤hrliche Steuerbescheinigungen halten wir jedes Jahr im April in der App fÃ¼r dich bereit.Â Du findest diese auf der RegisterkarteÂ Sparen und Anlegen. Wenn du weitere Unterlagen fÃ¼r deine SteuererklÃ¤rung benÃ¶tigst, kÃ¶nnen wir dir einen Freistellungsauftrag fÃ¼rÂ N26 InvestÂ oder einen Verlustschein ausstellen.
Du kannst Befreiungen von der Kapitalertragsteuer und der Kirchensteuer beantragen.Â 
FÃ¼r N26 Invest findest du die erforderlichen Formulare im AbschnittÂ DokumenteÂ imÂ Sparen und Anlegen Tab in der App.

EinkÃ¼nfte, die Ã¼ber dem Kapitalertragsteuer-Freibetrag liegen, sind in Deutschland steuerpflichtig.Â Neben der Kapitalertragsteuer unterliegen Anlagen dem SolidaritÃ¤tszuschlag und derÂ Kirchensteuer.
Die Depotbank zieht automatisch alle anfallenden Steuern von deinen gesamten Einlagen ab, wenn du in Deutschland steuerpflichtig bist.Â Das bedeutet, dass die potenziellen Renditen deiner Anlagen immer den Nettobetrag nach Steuern darstellen. Wenn du in Deutschland nicht steuerpflichtig bist, erhÃ¤ltst du den Bruttobetrag deiner ErtrÃ¤ge. Du bist dann fÃ¼r die Einreichung deiner Kapitalertragsteuer in dem Land, in dem du Steuern zahlst, selbst verantwortlich.

title: Wann kommt meine Karte?
content:
Je nach Bestimmungsort betrÃ¤gt dieÂ Lieferdauer bis zu 10 Werktage. In bestimmten Gebieten einiger LÃ¤nder (Estland, Griechenland, Italien, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei und Spanien) kann die Lieferung etwas lÃ¤nger dauern. Bevor du erwÃ¤gst, eine neue Karte zu bestellen, denke daran:  
Falls die Karte nicht zugestellt werden kann und an uns zurÃ¼ckgeschickt wird, informieren wir dich per E-Mail.

Wenn du vor weniger als 10 Tagen deine Karte bestellt hast, bitten wir dich, noch etwas abzuwarten, bevor du dich bei uns meldest.

Wenn du deine Karte nicht innerhalb des Ã¼blichen Lieferzeitraums ankommt, Ã¼berprÃ¼fe bitte deine Lieferanschrift und korrigiere sie, wenn nÃ¶tig. Das kannst du in der N26 App tun, unter ðŸ‘¤Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Lieferanschrift.
Wenn deine Lieferanschrift nicht richtig war und es deine erste N26 Karte ist, kontaktiere uns bitte im Live Chat. Wir helfen dir gerne bei der Kartenbestellung.

Wenn deine Lieferanschrift nicht richtig war und du bereits eine aktive Karte hattest, bestelle dir bitte eine neue Karte in der App.

Wenn deine Lieferanschrift richtig war, aber du die Karte dennoch nicht erhalten hast, liegt das daran, dass es beim Versand zu Schwierigkeiten gekommen ist.  Bitte kontaktiere uns dann im Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne, eine neue Karte zu bestellen. 

Falls du deine Karte schnell brauchst, kannst du sie gegen eine GebÃ¼hr per Express-Lieferung bestellen, wodurch die Karte binnen 3 Tagen bei dir ankommt. Bitte beachte, dass die Express-Lieferung fÃ¼r Metal-Karten nicht zur VerfÃ¼gung steht.

Deine erste Karte wird umgehend produziert und versendet, sobald du deine Verifizierung abgeschlossen hast. Wenn du ein N26 Metal Konto erÃ¶ffnet hast, zahle bitte genug Guthaben auf dein Konto ein, damit die erste monatliche GebÃ¼hr abgedeckt ist, um deine Karte zu erhalten.

Falls deine Adresse Sonderzeichen enthÃ¤lt, kontaktiere uns bitte Ã¼ber den Live Chat.
Wir verschicken unsere Karten nur an private Anschriften (geschÃ¤ftliche Adressen werden nicht akzeptiert).
Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.
Stelle sicher, dass keine wichtigen Informationen fehlen (wie z.B. der Name auf deinem Briefkasten, eine Wohnungs- oder Treppenhausnummer). Wenn du nur vorÃ¼bergehend dort bist (z.B. bei einem Freund oder einem Airbnb), gib den Namen des Hauptmieters an, der auf dem Briefkasten steht.
Wenn du bald umziehst und es deine erste Karte ist, stelle sicher, dass du die Adresse und das Land angibst, wohin du deine erste N26 Karte erhalten mÃ¶chtest.

title: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
content:
Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine fÃ¤llige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zurÃ¼ckgegeben und dir wird eineÂ GebÃ¼hr von 3 â‚¬Â berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus gerÃ¤t, werden Ãœberziehungszinsen in der HÃ¶he von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verzÃ¶gert werden.
Um diese GebÃ¼hr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App prÃ¼fen, ob dir einÂ DispokreditÂ zur VerfÃ¼gung steht.
*In Polen, Schweden, DÃ¤nemark und Norwegen: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner LandeswÃ¤hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des ZahlungsempfÃ¤ngers die GebÃ¼hren fÃ¼r den WÃ¤hrungsumtausch sowie den endgÃ¼ltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15â‚¬ fÃ¼r jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Warum sind einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen fÃ¼r mich nicht verfÃ¼gbar?
content:
Wir arbeiten mit vielen Partnern zusammen. Bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen setzen voraus, dass du auch deren Anforderungen erfÃ¼llst. Die hÃ¤ufigsten GrÃ¼nde, warum du fÃ¼r bestimmte Produkte nicht in Frage kommst:
Abgelaufene oder nicht unterstÃ¼tzte Ausweispapiere (z. B. bestimmte PÃ¤sse, denen Sicherheitsmerkmale fehlen).
Du bist in den Vereinigten StaatenÂ steuerpflichtig. In diesem Fall kannst du bestimmte Anlage- oder Sparprodukte nicht nutzen. Wenn dies nicht der Fall ist, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat, damit wir deine Kontodaten einsehen kÃ¶nnen. MÃ¶glicherweise musst du deine Telefonnummer wechseln, wenn sie mit einer nordamerikanischen Vorwahl beginnt (+1).
Du hast deineÂ IdentitÃ¤tÂ (in Deutschland) mit PostIdent nachgewiesen. Wir mÃ¼ssen dein Konto zurÃ¼cksetzen und du musst deine Verifizierung wiederholen, um bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen nutzen zu kÃ¶nnen. Ist das der Fall, senden wir dir eine E-Mail um einen passenden Zeitpunkt zu vereinbaren.

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (â€œPSD2â€) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, youâ€™ll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.Â 
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Can I have my pension credited to my N26 account?
content:
Having your pension credited to your N26 account is very simple.
This is what you need to do:
Contact and inform INPS about your decision;
Fill out and sign the form INPS will provide you with;
After filling out and signing the form, please send it to support@n26.com via email (please remember to use your registered email account to send the form).Â 
We will fill out the rest of the form and send it back to you in a few days.
Please note that you might find references to Citibank N.A in the form. Citibank N.A is anÂ  intermediary bank that credits INPS pensions to bank accounts located abroad. While filling out the form, please replace references to Citibank N.A with your N26 bank account details.Â

title: Wie Ã¼berweise ich in FremdwÃ¤hrungen?
content:
Wir arbeiten mit TransferWise zusammen, um einfache Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen(neuen Tab) zu ermÃ¶glichen. TransferWise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte GebÃ¼hren.
Um eine Ãœberweisung mit Transferwise durchzufÃ¼hren, logge dich zunÃ¤chst in deiner mobilen App ein:
1. Klicke auf â€œAktionenâ€ auf deinem Hauptbildschirm
2. WÃ¤hle dann â€œBankÃ¼berweisungâ€ fÃ¼ge einen Kontoakt hinzu
3. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzufÃ¼gst, kannst du die gewÃ¼nschte WÃ¤hrung auswÃ¤hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. 
4. Gib dann den Betrag sowie die Bankverbindung des EmpfÃ¤ngers an 
5. SchlieÃŸe die Ãœberweisung mit deiner BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN ab.
Wenn wir deine gewÃ¼nschte WÃ¤hrung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die TransferWise Website(neuen Tab) fÃ¼r eine noch grÃ¶ÃŸere Auswahl. Du kannst dich mit deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse einloggen, indem du auf Forgot password? klickst. Du wirst eine E-Mail von TransferWise erhalten, mit der du dein Passwort erstellen kannst. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die Ãœberweisung abschlieÃŸen.
Bitte beachte, dass mit dem N26 Business oder Business You Konto in der App weder Ãœberweisungen in FremdwÃ¤hrungen, noch Ãœberweisungen an Unternehmen mÃ¶glich sind.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15â‚¬ fÃ¼r jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except the UK
We acceptÂ transfersÂ in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make aÂ foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from theirÂ website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You canÂ find your IBANÂ on your balance statements and inÂ ðŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ (in the mobile app orÂ WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (seeÂ GwG Â§ 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir benÃ¶tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gemÃ¤ÃŸ des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden in der EuropÃ¤ischen Union Informationen Ã¼ber Kundenkonten zur VerfÃ¼gung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen LÃ¤ndern steuerpflichtig sind.
Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard fÃ¼r den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur BekÃ¤mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher VermÃ¶genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 LÃ¤nder haben sich erklÃ¤rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner Ã¼ber ihre VermÃ¶genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.
Damit wir feststellen kÃ¶nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, mÃ¼ssen wir dich fragen:
In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern hast, greifen fÃ¼r gewÃ¶hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden LÃ¤nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren LÃ¤ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, mÃ¼ssen wir wissen, um welche LÃ¤nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen BehÃ¶rden zuverlÃ¤ssige Informationen zur VerfÃ¼gung stellen kÃ¶nnen.

Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (â€œTINâ€) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den LÃ¤ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung(neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten verÃ¶ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen LÃ¤ndern identifizieren kannst.
Falls sich deine Lebenslage verÃ¤ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich dafÃ¼r einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: How do contactless payments work?
content:
Itâ€™s not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If youâ€™re experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:Â Â 
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.Â 

Transactions up to Â£40 donâ€™t require a card PIN. For amounts over Â£40, youâ€™ll need to enter your card PIN.Â 
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough, just try again.Â 

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front wonâ€™t work).

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as youâ€™re within yourÂ OverdraftÂ limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, youâ€™ll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you donâ€™t have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you havenâ€™t used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So youâ€™ll need toÂ top up your accountÂ via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if youâ€™re making the transfer outside of Germany) orÂ CASH26Â (if youâ€™re in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
Youâ€™ll receive two additional reminders (each cost â‚¬3).
If you have an Overdraft: itâ€™ll be cancelled after the second reminder and youâ€™ll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you donâ€™t respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

content:

Nachdem du deine bevorzugteÂ VersandmethodeÂ und die Farbe (Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz) ausgewÃ¤hlt hast, musst du nur noch die N26 MetalÂ AGB(neuen Tab)Â akzeptieren und den Auftrag mit deinerÂ BestÃ¤tigungs-PINÂ abschlieÃŸen. Schon ist deine Karte auf dem Weg!

title: How can I invite friends to join N26?
content:
You can start inviting friends from the N26 mobile application and web application as soon as you have access to your account. Once your friend successfully opens their N26 account and spends $10, you will get $10 from us and your friend will get $5!
To invite friends:
On iOS and Android
Log into your account and tap on the â€œExploreâ€ button.
Tap on â€œRefer friendsâ€.
Tap on â€œTell a friendâ€. 
Select one of the options available for sharing.
Write a message to your friend or use the default message then tap â€œSendâ€.
On the web application
Log into your account, then go to â€œMy Accountâ€ in the top right-hand corner of the screen. 
Click on the â€œInvite your friendsâ€ option (next to the gift box icon).
After reading the instructions and viewing the terms and conditions, click on â€œStart invitingâ€.
You can copy your unique referral code by clicking on it or you can send the referral directly via your preferred sharing method.
Related Topics:
â€œDoes the link that I sent my friend expire?â€
The link does not expire and can be used at any time, unless your friend has already started the sign-up process. Please note that we reserve the right to cancel this promotion at any time.
â€œCan I invite more than one person?â€
You can share your unique and personal referral code with more than one friend. You can even post it on social media!
â€œHow can I check the status of a referral?â€
You can check on the status of a referral directly through the N26 mobile or web application. To check on the status of a referral:
In the mobile application:
Log into your account.
Tap on â€œExploreâ€. 
Tap on â€œRefer friendsâ€.
Tap on â€œSee your Invitesâ€.
Any friends who have used your referral code will be displayed. 
In the web application:
Log into your account.
Click on â€œMy Accountâ€ in the upper right-hand corner.
Click on â€œInvite your friendsâ€.
Any friends who have used your referral code will be displayed. 
â€œCan I invite someone outside of the US?â€
No - N26 accounts are available only to US residents.
â€œHow does the referral bonus work?â€
When your friend has completed the sign-up process and made a purchase that is equal to or more than $10 with their N26 Visa debit card, both parties will receive the bonus ($10 for the person who made the referral and $5 for their friend). In order to qualify for a bonus, the purchase must be a single transaction that is at least $10, not aÂ series of transactions that add up to $10
â€œHow long does it take for my friend and I to receive the referral bonus?â€
The referral credit should be added to your accounts immediately once the conditions mentioned above are met. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

content:

content:
Si has olvidado tu contraseÃ±a o simplemente quieres cambiarla, pulsaÂ Â¿La has olvidado?Â en la app oÂ Â¿Has olvidado tu contraseÃ±a?(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â en laÂ Web App(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â al iniciar sesiÃ³n. Te enviaremos un link al email que has registrado para que puedas crear una nueva contraseÃ±a. 
No tenemos un conjunto especÃ­fico de requisitos para la contraseÃ±a, sino que medimos su fortaleza sobre la marcha a travÃ©s de un algoritmo que determina si la contraseÃ±a es lo bastante segura como para aceptarla.
Recomendamos tirar mÃ¡s hacia lo que serÃ­a una "frase clave" en vez de una "palabra clave", con lo que nos regirÃ­amos por el dicho Â«difÃ­cil de adivinar pero fÃ¡cil de recordarÂ».
Si nuestro sistema no admite tu contraseÃ±a, aÃ±Ã¡dele algunos caracteres mÃ¡s y combÃ­nala con nÃºmeros, caracteres especiales, mayÃºsculas y minÃºsculas.

title: Come bloccare la mia carta N26?
content:
Puoi bloccare e sbloccare le tue carte in qualsiasi momento nellâ€™app. Accedi a GestisciÂ e selezionaÂ Impostazioni Carta. Li puoi decidere se vuoi limitare temporaneamente o disattivare i prelievi bancomat, i pagamenti online o allâ€™estero, o bloccare del tutto la carta di debito.
In questo modo hai il pieno controllo della tua carta e puoi proteggerti daÂ transazioni non autorizzate. In caso di sospetto, blocca immediatamente la carta. Puoi sempre sbloccarla successivamente.

Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: Â¿QuÃ© son los Espacios Compartidos?
content:
Con los Espacios Compartidos ahora puedes compartir dinero de forma rÃ¡pida y fÃ¡cil. Estos espacios se pueden usar para lo que sea, tanto para compartir facturas como para planear vacaciones u organizar el cumpleaÃ±os de un amigo o familiar.
Los Espacios Compartidos estÃ¡n disponibles para los usuarios con plan premium (N26 You, N26 Metal y N26 Business You), los cuales pueden crear e invitar a otros a su Espacio.
Puede participar en un espacio cualquier usuario de N26, tenga la cuenta que tenga. 
El administrador del espacio es el dueÃ±o legal del dinero de ese espacio. 
El administrador puede invitar hasta 10 participantes y puede eliminarlos siempre que quiera. 
Como todos los Espacios, los Espacios Compartidos no tienen un IBAN o tarjeta asociada a ellos.

title: How can I lock and unlock my N26 card?
content:
You can lock and unlock your debit card at any time in our mobile application. 
Log into the application.
Tap on "Actions".
Select â€œCard settingsâ€. 
Decide if you want to temporarily:
Limit or disable your ATM withdrawals.
Disable your online payments.
Disable your payments abroad.
Lock your debit card.
With N26, you have full control of your debit card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. You should immediately lock your card if anything looks suspicious, you can always unlock it later by enabling the settings mentioned above.

title: Why can't I get an overdraft?
content:
Many factors are considered toward yourÂ creditworthinessÂ including your SCHUFA or CRIF score (we let both know about any overdraft requests). Being a long-time customer or making your N26 account yourÂ main accountÂ will have a positive impact on your overdraft application.
This decision is an automated process. If you donâ€™t qualify right now, you can apply again another time when your financial circumstances have changed. 
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: Espacios Compartidos - Beneficiarios de confianza
content:
El beneficiario de un espacio compartido puede:Â 
Transferir dinero desde sus propios espacios al espacio compartido (esto incluye tambiÃ©n otros espacios en los que el usuario participa.)
Acceder libremente a los fondos y transferirlos tanto dentro como fuera del espacio compartido.

Uno de los requisito de la ley strong customer authentication (SCA) es hacer mÃ¡s seguros los pagos online.Â 
Una excepciÃ³n es la clasificaciÃ³n de beneficiario de confianza sobre las personas en los espacios compartidos, de esta forma no requieren SCA.

title: Â¿DÃ³nde invierte N26 mi dinero?

Como regla general, nos esforzamos para que los depÃ³sitos de nuestros clientes sean otorgados en forma de prÃ©stamo a nuestros propios clientes (siempre y cuando dispongan de una solvencia apropiada). En cuanto a la liquidez que no se utiliza para los clientes, nuestra estrategia de inversiÃ³n es de bajo riesgo.
Invertimos el dinero de nuestros clientes con el Deutsche Bundesbank (Banco Federal AlemÃ¡n) y otros bancos europeos dentro de la eurozona, Ãºnicamente con un buen tipo de riesgo y a corto plazo. AdemÃ¡s, refinanciamos colectivos de derecho pÃºblico principalmente en Alemania (ciudades y municipios) e invertimos en bonos de estado en euros.
No somos una instituciÃ³n de trading y por lo tanto no comerciamos para obtener beneficios a corto plazo.
No nos involucramos en la especulaciÃ³n; ni con comida, divisas extranjeras, bitcoins u otras clases de activos.

title: How does N26 Business You work?

Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business You is right for you:
The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card. 
The account is â‚¬9,90 per month. The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership(new tab) at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.  
The premium account includes: Allianz Insurance Package including coverage for business purposes and fee-free foreign currency ATM withdrawals, 
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).
Transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business You.
You can sign-up during registration or if youâ€™re already an N26 Business user.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14â‚¬ through your N26 app.

content:

To create a barcode forÂ CASH26:
From the Home screen, select the Actions tab,

content:

To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:

From the Home screen, go to the Explore tab,

Tap Send!
Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.Â You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasnâ€™t arrived yet, weâ€™ve also collected aÂ few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,Â Friend referralÂ rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend ProgramÂ T&Cs(new tab).

title: Come posso proteggere la mia identitÃ ?
content:
Per proteggere ed evitare l'uso improprio dei tuoi dati personali, tieni presente che:
Non ti chiederemo mai di verificare la tua identitÃ  per conto di altre persone o societÃ . CiÃ² include verifiche per contratti di affitto di appartamenti, linee di credito o offerte di lavoro (compresi i lavori con N26). Completa il processo di verifica solo se desideri aprire un conto bancario N26.
Come proprietario dell'account, solo tu dovresti creare e avere accesso ai tuoi dati di accesso.
Non creare mai un conto bancario N26 con un indirizzo e-mail e una password predefiniti. Se usi le credenziali di accesso che ti sono state fornite, queste credenziali possono essere utilizzate per raggiungere le tue informazioni personali e legali. Inoltre, non accedere mai ad un account N26 che non Ã¨ il tuo.
Non inviare ID o passaporto a destinatari sconosciuti o non verificati.
N26 puÃ² richiedere determinati documenti quando una transazione soggetta a un controllo di routine. Invia una documentazione valida solo agli account di posta elettronica N26 verificati.
N26 non chiederÃ  mai il nome utente, la password o i codici PIN al di fuori dell'app N26.
Â 
Non fornire mai queste informazioni in un sito Web o un'app esterna, anche se sembra correlata a N26.
Se dovessi avere dubbi, hai ricevuto una richiesta sospetta da una terza parte o pensi che il tuo login N26 possa essere compromesso, non esitare a contattarci.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (â€œIRSâ€).
FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website(new tab).
The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, weâ€™ll need to ask you:
Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?Â 

Are you subject to tax in the U.S?

Being â€œsubject to taxâ€ in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that youâ€™re also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you donâ€™t end up paying any U.S. tax.

If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?

As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (â€œSSNâ€) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website(new tab).
Additionally, if your account shows:
A U.S. place of birth, 
A U.S. telephone number,
A standing order to the U.S.
then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: Come creare una password?
content:
Se hai dimenticato la password oppure vuoi cambiarla, seleziona Dimenticata? nella versione mobile dell'app o Password dimenticata? nellaÂ WebApp(nuova tabella)Â nella fase di accesso. Ti invieremo un link allâ€™indirizzo e-mail registrato per creare una nuova password. 
La password non deve rispondere a requisiti specifici ma ne verrÃ  valutata la sicurezza nel momento in cui viene creata: verranno accettate le password considerate sicure dal nostro algoritmo.
Raccomandiamo l'utilizzo di una combinazione di parole piuttosto che l'uso di un'unica parola: segui la logica del "difficile da indovinare ma facile da ricordare".
Se la tua password non viene accettata dal nostro sistema, puoi inserire caratteri speciali, numeri oppure una combinazione di lettere maiuscole e minuscole.
Se inserisci una password errata per sei volte consecutive, l'accesso al conto verrÃ  temporaneamente bloccato. In tal caso, prova a collegarti nuovamente dopo 30 minuti.
La chat Ã¨ disponibile da lunedÃ¬ a domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: Come chiudere il conto?
content:
Per cancellare il tuo account N26, ti preghiamo di inviarci la tua richiesta tramite Livechat oppure via e-mail all'indirizzo support@n26.com dal tuo indirizzo email registrato. La tua email dovrÃ  contenere le seguenti informazioni:
una dichiarazione con la richiesta di chiusura del conto in una data specifica oppure la dicitura "al piÃ¹ presto".
il tuo nome.
il tuo IBAN N26 (o account number/sort code in UK).
un IBAN all'interno dell'area SEPA (o account number/sort code in UK) per trasferire il saldo residuo  o se hai degli Spaces aperti.
il tuo consenso esplicito a ricevere la conferma di chiusura conto all'indirizzo email registrato con N26, ad esempio "Acconsento che N26 invii informazioni sui miei dati personali via email". In alternativa, la conferma di chiusura conto potrÃ  essere inviata via posta cartacea. in questo caso, le tempistiche per la ricezione della conferma saranno piÃ¹ lunghe. 
Oppure puoi usare il nostro modulo di cancellazione(nuova tabella) e allegarlo alla mail che ti invieremo.
Alcune cose da tenere presenti quando chiudi il conto:
Per una chiusura rapida dell'account: se disponi di un saldo positivo, ti preghiamo di trasferire il saldo residuo autonomamente. Se hai un saldo negativo, ricarica il tuo conto.
Tutti gli oneri dovuti sono immediatamente esigibili. Questo include le spese relative allaÂ consegna express, eÂ N26 You o N26 Metal. 
Distruggi le tue carte tagliandole con le forbici o una macchina tritadocumenti. Il chip, l'antenna NFC e la banda magnetica devono essere tagliati in pezzi e smaltiti separatamente.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by usingÂ CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (includingÂ CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
Thereâ€™s always a â‚¬2 fee if you use yourÂ MaestroÂ card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check ourÂ pricing listsÂ if youâ€™ve beenÂ charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least â‚¬1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

title: Come effettuare bonifici in valute estere?
content:
Collaboriamo con TransferWise per rendere piÃ¹ facili i trasferimenti in valuta estera. TransferWise offre tassi di cambio in tempo reale e nessuna commissione nascosta.
Per effettuare un trasferimento in valuta estera:
Effettua il login nella versione mobile dell'app N26.
Dalla schermata principale seleziona Gestisci, Dal mio conto e poi Bonifico bancario. 
Aggiungi il destinatario e scegli la valuta tramite la bandiera con il simbolo dell'Euro, nell'angolo in alto a destra dello schermo. 
Inserisci l'importo che desideri inviare e i dettagli bancari del beneficiario.
Completa il trasferimento con il tuo PIN di conferma.
Se al momento non offriamo laÂ valuta estera(nuova tabella)Â di cui hai bisogno, visitaÂ TransferWise(nuova tabella)Â per ulteriori opzioni di valuta. Puoi effettuare il login utilizzando i dati di accesso del tuo conto N26 e selezionando 'Hai dimenticato la password?'. Riceverai una email da TransferWise per reimpostare la tua password. Una volta completato questo passaggio, potrai utilizzare questo account per effettuare il trasferimento.
Ti preghiamo di notare che i trasferimenti in valuta estera non sono possibili con il conto N26 Business o N26 Business You, nÃ© lo sono i trasferimenti verso conti aziendali.
TransferWise applica commissioni che verranno indicate prima di confermare il bonifico. 
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.
