title: PSD2 - un Open Banking seguro
content:
La Segunda Directiva de Servicios de Pago (PSD2, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) es una directiva europea actualizada que te permite acceder a la informaciÃ³n de tu cuenta e iniciar pagos de forma segura a travÃ©s de terceros proveedores regulados.Â 
Esto significa que puedes permitir que terceros proveedores accedan a la informaciÃ³n de tu cuenta a travÃ©s de una interfaz creada para conseguir lo siguiente:
Habilitar un servicio de informaciÃ³n sobre cuentas (AIS, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s) para extraer los datos de tus cuentas bancarias y luego agruparlos y gestionarlos desde un mismo sitio a travÃ©s de terceros proveedores;Â 
Pagar de forma segura en cualquier caja o pÃ¡gina web que tenga Servicio de IniciaciÃ³n de Pagos (SIP).
Del intercambio de datos se encarga nuestro socio Token.io.
Al utilizar un servicio de pago provisto por terceros como un servicio de informaciÃ³n de cuentas o un servicio de iniciaciÃ³n de pagos, Token.io te redirigirÃ¡ a la app de N26 para que confirmes la solicitud de acceso.
En nuestra PolÃ­tica de Privacidad(pestaÃ±a nueva) te informamos sobre la finalidad, las partes involucradas y las bases legales del procesamiento de datos necesario para cumplir con nuestras obligaciones de acuerdo con los nuevos cambios de la directiva europea de servicios de pago.
Â¿Por quÃ© no puedo asociar mi cuenta con cualquier tercero proveedor?
Â Si un tercero proveedor no ha adoptado nuestra interfaz dedicada, este tendrÃ¡ que hacerlo directamente con nuestro socio Token.io.
Â Â¿CÃ³mo puedo revocar una autorizaciÃ³n de acceso que concedÃ­ a un tercero proveedor con anterioridad?
Â En este caso, tienes que contactar directamente con el proveedor correspondiente y solicitar la revocaciÃ³n del permiso que le habÃ­as concedido.Â 
* Esta informaciÃ³n aplica a todos los paÃ­ses del Espacio EconÃ³mico Europeo.

title: Do I need to declare my N26 account?
content:
N26 is a German bank operating in Italy through an Italian branch since 26th March 2020 in order to offer its customers an account with an Italian IBAN.
Therefore, if you opened an N26 account after 26th March 2020 and reside in Italy, youâ€™re the holder of an Italian N26 account and wonâ€™t need to submit any particular tax declaration.Â 
Please note that:
If youâ€™ve an annual average account balance of â‚¬5,000 or above, and are subject to the ordinary stamp duty on your statements, weâ€™ll automatically debit your account to the extent required by law. Alternatively, it will be at our expense according to any existing promotions.Â 
In addition to this, your account remains protected by the German Deposit Protection Fund up to â‚¬100,000.Â 
If you opened an N26 account before 26th March 2020 with an Italian address, your account is considered a foreign account. Opening an account abroad is entirely legalâ€”you  simply need to comply with the regulations of your country of residence and the country where the account is held.
For individuals residing in Italy, foreign accounts with an average annual balance of â‚¬5,000 or above must be declared to the Italian tax authorities. Itâ€™ll be necessary to fill out the dedicated Rw section of the tax return form and pay VAT, a fixed amount of â‚¬34.20.Â 
If your balance exceeds â‚¬15,000 even for just one day during the year, in addition to paying VAT, youâ€™ll need to fill out the Rw section of the tax return form for the purposes of tax monitoring as required by law no.186/2014.Â 
For more detailed and personalized information, please refer to a tax expert.
Please note that the Italian tax authorities have the possibility to identify undeclared foreign current accounts and to trace the relevant transactions back to the holder (Directive 2011/16/EU).

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to connect your smartphone(new tab) to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one.
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat - and we would be happy to help you.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Come ricevere i messaggi push?
content:
Ti inviamo messaggi push per finalizzare i trasferimenti (comeÂ MoneyBeam) o per confermare un servizio (come nel caso diÂ CASH26). Se non ricevi questi messaggi, verifica innanzitutto che le notifiche siano abilitate sia per il telefono che per l'app. Quindi prova alcuni dei nostri suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi, a seconda dello smartphone:
Elimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dall'App Store Apple e riassocia lo smartphone.
Controlla di aver effettuato lâ€™accesso allâ€™app N26.
Assicurati che la messaggistica per l'app sia stata attivata nelle impostazioni generali dello smartphone.
Elimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dal Google Play Store Google e riassocia lo smartphone.
Vai nelle Impostazioni conto e attiva le notifiche cliccando su Impostazioni App e poi Notifiche.
Huawei e Xiaomi: vai in Impostazioni, Impostazioni avanzate e Impostazioni batteria. Imposta N26 come app protetta.
OnePlus: seleziona lâ€™ottimizzazione della batteria, poi l'app N26 e Non ottimizzare.
Oppo: disattiva l'ottimizzazione della batteria per l'app e bloccala in Panoramica app recenti.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, weâ€™ll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesnâ€™t charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under theirÂ Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipientâ€™s name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipientâ€™s name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments arenâ€™t active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: CRS - La razÃ³n por la que pedimos cierta informaciÃ³n a nuestros clientes
content:
N26, al igual que toda instituciÃ³n financiera, estÃ¡ obligado a remitir informaciÃ³n a las Administraciones Tributarias sobre cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de los residentes fiscales en otro paÃ­s.
LaÂ Normativa CRSÂ (Common Reporting Standard o EstÃ¡ndar ComÃºn de Reporte) es un sistema de intercambio automÃ¡tico de informaciÃ³n tributaria entre los paÃ­ses adheridos, elaborado por la OCDE (OrganizaciÃ³n para la CooperaciÃ³n y el Desarrollo EconÃ³micos).
Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:
Â¿En quÃ© paÃ­s o paÃ­ses declaras impuestos?Â Â 
Tienes tu residencia fiscal en un paÃ­s extranjero y por lo tanto declaras impuestos en este paÃ­s, donde tienes tu residencia personal. Si vives en mÃ¡s de un paÃ­s, hay reglas para la determinaciÃ³n de la residencia incluidas en los convenios fiscales y las leyes tributarias del paÃ­s relevante, que nos ayudarÃ¡n a determinar tu residencia fiscal. Puede que hayas tenido tu residencia fiscal en mÃ¡s de un paÃ­s a lo largo de un aÃ±o, en ese caso, vamos a necesitar conocer tu nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal de cada uno de estos paÃ­ses para poder enviar tu informaciÃ³n a las autoridades correspondientes.Â 
2. Â¿CuÃ¡l es tu nÃºmero de identificaciÃ³n fiscal (TIN) de cada paÃ­s?
La emisiÃ³n y el formato del NÃºmero de IdentificaciÃ³n Fiscal (TIN) depende cada paÃ­s. En los paÃ­ses de la UniÃ³n Europea, la ComisiÃ³n Europea ha publicado una guÃ­a con los documentos de cada paÃ­s(pestaÃ±a nueva), lo que puede ayudarte a identificar cuÃ¡l es el tuyo.Â 
En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaciÃ³n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesiÃ³n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > ConfiguraciÃ³n personal > InformaciÃ³n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaciÃ³n.Â Â

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a two-layer security architecture:
Secure login. Your login, on both the mobile app and web app(new tab), consists of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a secure password and do not reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN. This 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. It is first set up when you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account, and can then be changed in the application after that. (Note: a Confirmation PIN is not the same as a Card PIN, which is the code you use when you withdraw cash from an ATM with your N26 card.)
Every time you contact us, weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PIN(s).
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

Le carte sostitutive N26 Metal prevedono un costo di â‚¬45 per spedizione standard. Non Ã¨ prevista la spedizione express per le carte N26 Metal.

Se desideri usufruire di questa possibilitÃ , aggiungi la versione digitale della tua carta al tuo portafoglio digitale (Apple /Google Wallet). Questa funzione sarÃ  disponibile solo per 30 giorni a partire dal momento in cui la carta Ã¨ stata ordinata. In questo lasso di tempo riceverai la carta fisica e dovrai attivarla tramite lâ€™app di N26 per poter continuare ad usarla nel tuo portafoglio digitale ed usufruire di tutte le altre funzionalitÃ  della carta.
Questa funzione non Ã¨ disponibile per clienti che ordinano una nuova carta oppure passano ad unâ€™altra tipologia di conto senza bloccare la carta giÃ  in loro possesso. In questi casi la loro carta continuerÃ  a funzionare con Apple Pay/Google Pay finchÃ© non verrÃ  attivata quella nuova.

title: Pour quelles raisons nâ€™ai-je pas encore reÃ§u ma prime de parrainage?
content:
Une fois que votre ami aura bien rempli toutes lesÂ conditions nÃ©cessaires Ã  l'attribution de la prime de parrainage, nous vÃ©rifierons la validitÃ© de votre invitation. Vous pouvez suivre le statut de vos invitations depuis votre application N26 mobile ou sur sa version web.

N26 se rÃ©serve le droit de ne pas attribuer de prime de parrainage en cas de suspicion dâ€™activitÃ©s qui violeraient lesÂ Conditions dâ€™utilisation du programme de parrainage(nouvel onglet).

title: Was ist N26 Savings?
content:
Mit N26 Savings kannst du kostenlos ein Festgeldkonto mit einer Einlage zwischen 2.000 â‚¬ und 100.000 â‚¬ erÃ¶ffnen. Diese Option findest du in der App im Bereich Entdecken und dann unter N26 Finanzprodukte. Du kannst nicht auf den eingezahlten Betrag zugreifen, bis der Sparplan fÃ¤llig wird (6 bis 60 Monate), aber du erhÃ¤ltst wÃ¤hrend dieser Zeit bis zu 1,48 % Zinsen. Danach erhÃ¤ltst du die Auszahlung direkt auf dein N26 Konto.
N26 Savings wird durch die enge Zusammenarbeit vonÂ drei Unternehmen(neuen Tab)Â mit verschiedenen Partnerbanken mÃ¶glich gemacht. Du musst die AGB aller vier Teilnehmer akzeptieren, um ein Konto zu erÃ¶ffnen.
Aus regulatorischen GrÃ¼nden benÃ¶tigen wir Informationen Ã¼ber deinen Steuerstatus. Wenn du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig sind, kÃ¶nnen wir dir unser Sparprodukt derzeitÂ nicht anbieten.
Du bist mÃ¶glicherweise zu einer Steuerbefreiung qualifiziert. Ist das der Fall, fÃ¼lleÂ unser Formular(neuen Tab) aus und chatte mit uns. Wir leiten deine Anfrage an unsere Partnerbank weiter.
Sobald du dein Sparkonto erÃ¶ffnest, wird der einmalige Betrag von deinem Girokonto abgebucht. Bitte beachte, dass es bis zu sieben Werktage dauern kann, bis dein Konto erÃ¶ffnet wird.
Wenn der Sparplan auslÃ¤uft, erhÃ¤ltst du den eingezahlten Betrag und die Zinsen (abzÃ¼glich eventueller Kapitalertragsteuer) innerhalb von zwei Tagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben.
Nach europÃ¤ischem Recht sind alle Mitgliedstaaten verpflichtet, eineÂ EinlagensicherungÂ von bis zu 100.000 â‚¬ pro Person und Bank zu gewÃ¤hren. Damit dieser Schutz bei Wechselkursschwankungen nicht unterschritten wird, haben wir ein zusÃ¤tzliches Limit fÃ¼r Sparkonten in LÃ¤ndern auÃŸerhalb der Eurozone festgelegt.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erzÃ¤hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15â‚¬ fÃ¼r jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr Ã¼ber unserÂ Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.
Â Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Â 

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with â€˜Pendingâ€™ and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once youâ€™ve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the â€˜Accept Power of Attorneyâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device
Youâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on â€˜Exit Shared Spaceâ€™.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜Leave the Spaceâ€™.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: Pourquoi le distributeur automatique a enregistrÃ© mon retrait sans dÃ©livrer mon argent ?
content:
Lorsque vous effectuer un retrait en distributeur automatique, il arrive parfois quâ€™il ne vous dÃ©livre pas votre argent mais que le montant du retrait soit dÃ©duit du solde de votre compte.
Dans un premier temps, vÃ©rifiez lesÂ plafonds de votre carteÂ en allant dans la rubrique ðŸ‘¤Â Mon compteÂ puis dans la sectionÂ ParamÃ¨tres de votre carteÂ de votre application mobile. VÃ©rifiez que les retraits en distributeurs automatiques soient activÃ©s.
Si nous ne pouvons pas toujours connaÃ®tre la raison de lâ€™Ã©chec, nous pouvons vous aider Ã  rÃ©cupÃ©rer le montant de votre retrait. Ce dernier a Ã©tÃ© dÃ©duit du solde de votre compte car le distributeur automatique a Ã©mis une empreinte de paiement (le montant du retrait est temporairement bloquÃ©). Comme lâ€™opÃ©ration nâ€™a pas fonctionnÃ©, cette empreinte de paiement expirera en quelques heures ou dans un dÃ©lai maximal de 12 jours ouvrÃ©s. Le montant sera alors Ã  nouveau disponible sur votre compte.
Si le montant correspondant Ã  votre retrait nâ€™apparaÃ®t pas sur votre compte au bout de 12 jours ouvrÃ©s, nous vous invitons Ã  remplir unÂ formulaire de contestation. Nous ferons alors les dÃ©marches nÃ©cessaires pour rÃ©gler ce litige.
En attendant, nous vous invitons Ã  effectuer un retrait dâ€™espÃ¨ces dans un autre distributeur automatique.

title: Come gestire la mia visibilitÃ  come utente N26?
content:
Per poterti offrire l'accesso a tutte le opzioni presenti nell'app, N26 associa i tuoi dati con altri utenti N26.
Per gestire il tuo consenso ad essere visibile come utente N26, puoi andare nellâ€™app su ðŸ‘¤ Il mio conto, selezionare Impostazioni e poi Impostazioni Personali e Informazioni Personali. Successivamente dovrai solo spuntare o rimuovere la spunta dalla casella â€œAccetto di poter essere visualizzato da altri utenti N26â€.
Gli utenti N26 che hanno deciso di rendersi visibili appariranno nella tua lista contatti. Allo stesso tempo, se ti sei reso visibile, anche tu apparirai nella lista contatti di altri utenti N26.Â La lista contatti non viene memorizzata in modo permanente da N26 e viene utilizzato solo quando si accede ad opzioni specifiche.
Puoi avere accesso a tutte i nostri prodotti presenti nell'app, come ad esempio Moneybeam, che ti permette di trasferire denaro in maniera instantanea senza utilizzare un IBAN, ma solo selezionando un nome dalla tua lista dei contatti. Viceversa, puoi anche richiedere un trasferimento da uno dei tuoi contatti, il quale dovrÃ  solo accettare (o declinare) la richiesta. Renderti visibile ti permetterÃ , inoltre, di usare Spazi Condivisi, sottoconti tramite i quali potrai condividere denaro con altri utenti N26.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,Â password, orÂ tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ðŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.
NameÂ andÂ sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number orÂ email address: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify itâ€™s really you changing your information so we canâ€™t change any personal data over email.

title: Comment commander ma carte en livraison express ?
content:
DisponibilitÃ© limitÃ©e.
La livraison express est disponible pour les cartes N26 Standard, N26 You, N26 Business et N26 Business You et est facturÃ©e 25 â‚¬ (6 â‚¬ de frais de remplacement de la carte inclus). Cette option est disponible pour vous permettre de recevoir votre carte dans de brefs dÃ©lais si vous en avez besoin rapidement. Â La livraison express est Ã©galement conseillÃ©e si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  eu des difficultÃ©s avec la livraison de votre courrier.
Vous pourrez sÃ©lectionner la livraison Express lorsque vous choisirez la mÃ©thode de livraison lors de la commande de votre premiÃ¨re carte ou lorsque vous commandez une nouvelle carte.
Vous recevrez ensuite un lien de suivi par email. Si vous nâ€™Ãªtes pas Ã  votre domicile lors de la livraison et si votre boÃ®te aux lettres est hors dâ€™accÃ¨s, la carte sera dÃ©posÃ©e dans un point relais Ã  proximitÃ© de chez vous (vous pourrez consulter son adresse depuis le lien de suivi).
La carte sera conservÃ©e en point relais pour une durÃ©e limitÃ©e. PassÃ© un certain dÃ©lai, elle nous sera retournÃ©e. Dans ce cas, nous vous tiendrons informÃ© par email.
Â Veuillez Ã©galement noter que :
Votre Mastercard N26 sera livrÃ©e dans un dÃ©lai de 3 jours ouvrÃ©s (ce dÃ©lai dÃ©pend de lâ€™heure Ã  laquelle vous commandez votre carte et du temps de fabrication de celle-ci).
Les livraisons DHL Express interviennent entre 8:00 et 12:00, du lundi au vendredi. Une signature sera nÃ©cessaire lors de la rÃ©ception du colis Ã  domicile.
L'expÃ©dition via DHL Express est possible dans tous les pays europÃ©ens oÃ¹ N26 est prÃ©sent. En dehors de ces pays, l'expÃ©dition n'est pas encore possible.
Il n'est pas possible d'annuler ou modifier la mÃ©thode de livraison express une fois celle-ci validÃ©e.
Pour clÃ´turer un compte si vous avez dÃ©jÃ  commandÃ© votre carte, vous devrez payer les frais de livraison express de cette derniÃ¨re.
Dans le cas oÃ¹ votre carte ne vous serait pas parvenue 3 jours ouvrÃ©s aprÃ¨s votre commande, veuillez cliquer sur le lien de suivi pour surveiller l'expÃ©dition. Ce lien de suivi vous permet aussi de fournir des informations supplÃ©mentaires Ã  DHL concernant votre adresse de livraison ou de modifier cette adresse dans le cas oÃ¹ vous ne pourriez pas Ãªtre Ã  votre domicile Ã  l'heure prÃ©vue.

title: Come passare a Metal?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Disponibile in Germania, Austria, Francia, Spagna, Italia, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Islanda, Liechtenstein.
Puoi scegliere il conto N26 Metal durante la registrazione del tuo conto oppure effettuando l'upgrade tramite app se hai un conto N26 standard o  un contoÂ N26 You. 
Per effettuare l'upgrade a N26 Metal tramite app:

scegli uno dei nostri tre nuovi colori di carta: nero carbone, rosa quarzo o grigio ardesia.
seleziona ilÂ metodo di consegnaÂ che preferisci e accetta iÂ Termini e Condizioni(nuova tabella)Â di N26 Metal. 
A questo punto, la tua nuova carta arriverÃ  a breve.
Le consegne standard richiedono fino a dieci giorni lavorativi.
Il costo mensile di 16,90 â‚¬ (Â£14.90 in UK) sarÃ  addebitato direttamente sul tuo conto ogni mese con riferimento alla data dellâ€™upgrade.
La durata minima del contratto dâ€™iscrizione a N26 Metal Ã¨ di un anno. Il contratto sarÃ  rinnovato automaticamente, salvo annullamento da effettuarsi fino a quattro settimane prima della scadenza del contratto.
Se effettui l'upgrade dal conto N26 You, tutti gli acquisti e i viaggi precedentemente prenotati con la Mastercard N26 You rimarranno assicurati.
Puoi acquistare una seconda Mastercard N26 You direttamente tramite la app N26 per un costo di â‚¬14, una tantum.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.

Dort kannst du entscheiden, ob du deine Abhebungen am Geldautomaten, Online- und Auslandszahlungen vorÃ¼bergehend einschrÃ¤nken, deaktivieren oder deine Karte komplett sperren mÃ¶chtest. 
So hast du die volle Kontrolle Ã¼ber deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen schÃ¼tzen. Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verdÃ¤chtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie spÃ¤ter jederzeit wieder entsperren.

title: Get in touch with N26 customer support.
content:
Need some help? We're here for you. 
You can find answers to our most commonly asked questions by searching our Support Center.
The N26 customer support team is  available between 9:00am EST and 12:00am EST from Monday through Friday and from 9:00am EST till 9:00pm EST on Saturday and Sunday. In order to directly contact customer support, you may: 
Call us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) *
Chat directly from the N26 mobile app, web app(new tab) or from certain Support Center articles, such as this one. 
Email us at support-us@n26.com
During customer supportâ€™s off-hours, please email support-us@n26.com and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
* for US customers only.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Come funziona Spaces?
content:
Spaces ti permette di creare diversi spazi nel tuo conto principale, per mettere da parte del denaro. Puoi personalizzare ogni spazio a tuo piacimento e trasferire denaro dal tuo conto principale allo spazio, in tempo reale. Spaces Ã¨ disponibile via app eÂ webapp(nuova tabella)Â in tutti i paesi.
Oltre al tuo conto corrente principale (o space principale), che possiamo anche definire spazio principale, puoi creare degli spazi aggiuntivi tutte le volte che vuoi, ma ricorda che il numero di spazi attivi che puoi avere, dipende dalla tipologia di conto che possiedi: 2 spazi oltre per il conto N26 standard e il conto N26 Business o 10 spazi oltre per dei conti Premium, N26 You, N26 Business You e N26 Metal.
Inoltre, lâ€™estratto conto del tuo conto principale, includerÃ  anche le transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.
Solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) puÃ² avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia disponibile per te. Tutti gli altri spazi non possono avere un saldo negativo, puoi trasferire negli spazi soltanto un ammontare di denaro effettivamente disponibile.
Per effettuare una qualsiasi transazione con la tua Mastercard, potrai usare soltanto il saldo disponibile nel tuo conto principale. Ti suggeriamo quindi di trasferire nel tuo conto principale denaro sufficiente per effettuare la transazione, prima che questa avvenga.
Sposta denaro da uno space all'altro tenendo premuto sul tuo account principale e trascinandolo nel tuo space. Una volta confermato lâ€™ammontare, il tuo saldo attuale verrÃ  aggiornato subito dopo.
Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. Dovrai solo confermare l'operazione con il tuo PIN di conferma. Se uno space Ã¨ bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. Se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.
Puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti Spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.
Puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno Space al saldo totale sul conto. Per fare questo, entra nello Space, seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra e poi "nascondi il saldo dello spazio".
Spaces include una opzione chiamata Regole, con le quali potrai gestire il tuo tempo e il tuo denaro in maniera molto semplice.

Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni â‚¬15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di piÃ¹ sul nostroÂ programma Invita un amico.

title: COVID-19: Latest updates on our customer service availability
content:
In light of recent global developments due to COVID-19, we are constantly taking measures to ensure the safety of our staff, while continuing to deliver the best possible customer service experience for you.
Our mission to support you and deliver our banking and customer services as per usual remain unchanged. That said, we want to be able to update you should the situation evolve.

title: Que faire si je ne peux pas rembourser mon crÃ©dit ou mon dÃ©couvert ?
content:
Si vous ne pouvez pas payer votreÂ crÃ©dit N26Â ou votreÂ dÃ©couvertÂ (uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche), nous pouvons vous proposer diffÃ©rents plans de remboursement. Cela peut arriver si votre autorisation de dÃ©couvert autorisÃ© a Ã©tÃ© annulÃ©e ou si vous avez besoin de plus de deux mois pour rembourser la somme que vous nous devez.
Voici la marche Ã  suivre : contactez-nous par Livechat avec une proposition prÃ©cise de votre plan de remboursement. Cette proposition doit expliquer, clairement comment et en combien de temps vous pouvez rembourser votre crÃ©dit ou votre dÃ©couvert en totalitÃ©. Sachez que nous refuserons toute proposition de payer la somme due â€œultÃ©rieurementâ€ sans autre dÃ©tail.
Ensuite, nous pourrons accepter, refuser ou vous proposer une solution alternative. Vous pourrez alors accepter ce plan de remboursement..
Ã€ noter : Votre compte N26 sera fermÃ© si votre solde reste nÃ©gatif pendant une longue pÃ©riode. Toute dÃ©cision de clÃ´ture de compte est dÃ©finitive, sauf si vous remboursez la somme due avant la date de fermeture annoncÃ©e. Si vous ne le faites pas, votre dette sera directement prise en charge par une agence de recouvrement.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 YouÂ orÂ (new tab)N26 Metal(new tab) contracts have a minimum term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 30-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membershipâ€™s renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership for free within the 30-day revocation period (or 30 days for UK customers). Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you wonâ€™t be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 30-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Cancel Membership (on Android) or N26 You/Metal ID (iOS) > Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. Weâ€™ll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
Weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: PSD2 - un Open Banking sicuro
content:
La Direttiva sui Servizi di Pagamento 2 (Â«PSD2Â») Ã¨ la nuova direttiva europeaÂ  che ti consente di accedere alle informazioni sul tuo conto e di effettuare la disposizione di ordini di pagamento tramiteÂ  terze parti autorizzate in modo sicuro e protetto.
QuestoÂ  significa che puoi autorizzareÂ  terze parti ad  accedere alle informazioni del tuo conto tramite unâ€™interfaccia dedicata.
Puoi abilitare un servizio dâ€™informazioni sui conti t (AIS) per riunire i dati relativi aiÂ  tuoi conti bancari che possiedi e gestirli  attraverso fornitori terzi certificati;
Puoi pagare in modo sicuro suÂ  qualsiasi sito che offre servizi di pagamento (PIS).
Lo scambio di dati avviene tramite ilÂ  nostro partner - Token.io.
Se decidi di utilizzareÂ  un servizio di pagamento come il servizio di informazione sui conti oppure il servizio di disposizione di ordini di pagamento, verrai reindirizzato all'app di N26 tramite Token.io per confermare la richiesta di accesso.
Nella nostra Informativa sulla privacy(nuova tabella) ti informiamo sulle finalitÃ , le parti coinvolte e le basi giuridiche del trattamento dei dati necessari per adempiere ai nostri obblighi(nuova tabella) nel quadro della nuova direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento.
PerchÃ© non riesco a collegare terze parti al mio conto?
Se una terza parte non ha effettuato l'integrazione con la nostra interfaccia dedicata, dovrÃ  farloÂ  attraverso il nostro partner Token.io.Â 
Come posso revocare il consenso conferito ad una singola terza parte?
Dovrai contattare la terza parte in questione direttamente e richiedere la revoca del consenso.
*si applica a tutti i paesi EEA.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
content:
Deine IBAN enthÃ¤lt die DE-LÃ¤nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige PrÃ¼fnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer.  Zum Beispiel:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
Die teilnehmenden LÃ¤nder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.
HÃ¤ndler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des EuropÃ¤ischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, verstoÃŸen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europÃ¤isches Recht (Artikel 9 derÂ Verordnung Nr. 260/2012(neuen Tab)).
Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deineÂ zustÃ¤ndige nationale BehÃ¶rde(neuen Tab)Â und informiere diese Ã¼ber den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des HÃ¤ndlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschlieÃŸlich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).

title: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
content:
â„¹ï¸Die Lieferung der Karte dauert normalerweise bis zu 10 Werktage. Bei einigen Regionen in bestimmten LÃ¤ndern (Estland, Griechenland, Italien, Niederlande, Portugal, Slovenien, Spanien) kann die Lieferung etwas lÃ¤nger dauern.
Wenn es sich um deine erste Karte handelt und es lÃ¤nger als 10 Tage her ist, dass du deine Verifizierung abgeschlossen hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat.
Wenn du andere GrÃ¼nde fÃ¼r eine neue Karte hast, bestelle sie bitte in der N26 App.
ÃœberprÃ¼fe zunÃ¤chst deine Lieferanschrift und aktualisiere diese wenn nÃ¶tig. Das kannst du in der App tun, unter: ðŸ‘¤Mein Konto > Einstellungen > PersÃ¶nliche Einstellungen > Lieferanschrift.
Um anschlieÃŸend deine neue Karte zu bestellen, gehe zu: ðŸ‘¤Mein Konto > Karteneinstellungen.
Streiche in der Ãœbersicht zu derjenigen Karte, die du neu bestellen willst, und wÃ¤hle Neu aus.
Bitte beachte: Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 6 â‚¬ inklusive Standardversand oder 25 â‚¬, wenn du dich fÃ¼r die Expresslieferung entscheidest. Eine neue N26 Metal Karte betrÃ¤gt 45 â‚¬ inklusive Standardversand, die Expresslieferung steht fÃ¼r Metal Karten nicht zur VerfÃ¼gung.
Sobald du eine neue Karte bestellt hast, kannst du eine digitale Version der Karte aktivieren, wÃ¤hrend die physische Version der Karte noch zu dir unterwegs ist. Wenn du diese Funktion nutzen mÃ¶chtest, fÃ¼ge die digitale Version deiner Karte dem digitalen Wallet deiner Wahl hinzu. Die Funktion ist nur fÃ¼r 14 Tage nach Bestellung der Karte verfÃ¼gbar. Innerhalb dieses Zeitraums kannst du die physische Version deiner Karte in deiner N26 App aktivieren. Sobald die physische Karte aktiviert ist, funktioniert dein digitales Wallet wieder wie gewohnt.
Bitte beachte, dass diese Funktion nicht fÃ¼r Nutzer zur VerfÃ¼gung steht, die sich fÃ¼r ein anderes Konto entscheiden oder eine neue Karte bestellen, ohne ihr bisherige Karte gesperrt zu haben. In diesen FÃ¤llen kannst du deine bisherige Karte weiterhin mit Apple/ Google Pay nutzen, bis du die neue Karte aktiviert hast.

title: COVID-19: aggiornamenti relativi alla nostra assistenza clienti
content:
Alla luce degli sviluppi relativi alla diffusione del COVID-19, stiamo costantemente adottando misure idonee per garantire la sicurezza del nostro personale e per offrire un'eccellente esperienza di assistenza ai nostri clienti.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the â€˜Learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜Invite new memberâ€™ button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once youâ€™ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the â€˜Send Inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.

How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:Â DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 ofÂ Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, pleaseÂ contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didnâ€™t accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Cashback Perks
content:
Partners this applies to: TIDAL, Luminary, Aaptiv, Blinkist, Babbel, Headspace, and Curology

"How do I sign up for Cashback on Subscriptions?"
Signing up for Cashback Perks is simple and is accomplished via the mobile app.
On launching the app, tap on the "Explore" tab.
Once in the Explore page, tap on the "Manage" button, this will take you to the Cashback on subscriptions page.
Once in the Cashback Subscriptions page you can select your Cashback Perk by tapping on the appropriate partner.Â 

"The Cashback Perk that I previously subscribed to is no longer applicable to me, how do I unsubscribe from that Perk?"
When a Cashback Perk is no longer applicable to your lifestyle, you can easily unsubscribe from it via the mobile or web app.
On launching the app, tap on the "Explore" tab.
Once in the Explore page, tap on the "Manage" button, this will take you to the Cashback on subscriptions page
Once in the Cashback Subscriptions page you can select your Cashback Perk to unsubscribe from by tapping on the appropriate partner.Â 

"How many Cashback Perks can I subscribe to?"
You can only subscribe to one Cashback Perk at a time. Your lifestyle and situation will be your guide as to which one to subscribe to.

"Is there a cost to subscribing?"
No, there is no cost to subscribing to a Perk. In fact, these Perks are here to save you money.Â 

"Does this work for any subscription, i.e. family plans?"
No, only monthly plans for one user are eligible for Monthly Cashback Perks.

"What payment method do I have to use in order to get a Cashback or a Discount Perk?"
You must pay for your purchase directly with your N26 Visa debit card, if another form of payment is used, the Cashback or Discount will not be applied.Â  To ensure that you get the benefit you deserve, you may have to go into your account and verify that the card on file, and being charged, is your N26 Visa debit card. Transactions made through third parties or with electronic wallets such as Apple Pay and Google Pay are not eligible for discounts or cashback under our Perks program.Â 

"How many days after making a qualifying payment would I receive Cashback for a Monthly Cashback Perk?"
Approximately two business days. 

"Will the Cashback appear as a statement credit?Â  If so, when?"
Yes, if applicable, the Cashback will appear on your transaction list as â€˜Monthly Perk'.Â  The Cashback benefit is applied as soon as your payment for the monthly subscription comes through, which is typically the billing date of the subscription.

"Who are your current Perks partners?"
To further enhance your N26 experience, we are constantly adding new partners, To see the current list of Perks partners, please go to your N26 app.

"How much cash back does the customer receive on a subscription per month for Cashback on Subscriptions Perks?Â  Is it a specific dollar amount, or a percentage of the subscription charge?  Please list subscriptions and specific percentages of Cashback."
In order to see exactly how much Cashback you can get on your subscription, please go to your N26 app. The percentage of cash back varies depending on the partner.

"Is there a date by which I must enroll in Perks in order to receive cash back?"
No. you can enroll in Perks whenever you want.

"Does the Cashback offer have a termination period?"
Cashback Perk offers do not have a termination period.Â  Unless there is a specific â€œvalid untilâ€ date is shown, N26 can terminate the offer at any time.
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Warum ist N26 sicher?
content:
Zum Schutz deines Kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige Sicherheitsarchitektur:
Sichere Anmeldung:Â Die Zugangsdaten der mobilen App und derÂ WebApp(neuen Tab)Â bestehen aus einem Benutzernamen und einem Passwort oder einer Fingerabdruck-/Gesichtserkennung (abhÃ¤ngig von deinem Smartphone). Bitte wÃ¤hle einÂ sicheres PasswortÂ und gib deine Zugangsdaten nicht an Dritte weiter.
BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN:Â Dies ist einÂ 4-stelliger Code, den du jedes Mal benÃ¶tigst, wenn du eine Ãœberweisung durchfÃ¼hrst oder dein Smartphone verknÃ¼pfst/trennst. Du richtest diese PIN erstmalig ein, wenn du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verknÃ¼pft hast. Danach kannst du sie in der App selbst Ã¤ndern.
Push-Nachrichten:Â FÃ¼r jede eingehende und ausgehende Zahlung wird eine Push-Nachricht an dein verknÃ¼pftes Smartphone gesendet. Sie dient auch zur BestÃ¤tigung und zum Abschluss deiner Transaktionen. AuÃŸerdem haben wirÂ 3D SecureÂ eingerichtet, um dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug zu schÃ¼tzen.
Jedes Mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige Sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. Aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner Kartennummer, deinem Card Verification Code (CVV), Passwort und deiner Karten- oder BestÃ¤tigungs-PIN fragen.
Wir haben weitere Schritte eingefÃ¼hrt, um deine persÃ¶nlichen Daten zu schÃ¼tzen: Wir speichern so wenige Informationen Ã¼ber dich wie mÃ¶glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und lÃ¶schen diese Daten, sobald sie fÃ¼r das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung nicht mehr benÃ¶tigt werden. Du kannst deineÂ persÃ¶nlichen DatenÂ bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner KontoschlieÃŸung herunterladen. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du in unsererÂ DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung(neuen Tab).

title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â 
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â 
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: PerchÃ© N26 Ã¨ sicuro?
content:
Per proteggere il tuo conto, utilizziamo unâ€™architettura di sicurezza a 3 livelli:
Accesso sicuro.Â I dati di accesso dellâ€™app mobile e dellaÂ WebApp(nuova tabella)Â sono costituiti da un nome utente e una password o dal riconoscimento delle impronte digitali/del volto (a seconda dello smartphone). Scegli unaÂ password sicuraÂ e non rivelare i tuoi dati di accesso a nessuno.
PIN di conferma.Â Questo [codice a 4 cifre] Ã¨ necessario ogni volta che fai un trasferimento o colleghi/scolleghi il telefono. Lo imposti la prima volta dopo aver collegato lo smartphone al conto. DopodichÃ© puoiÂ modificarloÂ da solo nellâ€™app.
Messaggi push.Â Per ogni pagamento in entrata e in uscita, verrÃ  inviato un messaggio push allo smartphone collegato. Viene utilizzato anche per confermare e finalizzare le tue transazioni. Abbiamo anche implementato 3D Secure per proteggerti dalle frodi online con carta.
Ogni volta ci contatti ti chiederemo alcune domande di sicurezza per assicurarci che sei realmente tu. Non ti chiederemo mai il numero della tua carta di debito, il codice di sicurezza della carta (CVV), password, o il tuo PIN della carta o di conferma.
Abbiamo anche fatto progressi per proteggere i tuoi dati:Â custodiamoÂ meno informazioni possibili su di te, solo finchÃ¨ siamo legalmente obbligati, e cancelliamo i dati quando non sono piÃ¹ richiesti per un prodotto o un servizio. PuoiÂ scaricare i tuoi dati personaliÂ fino a 6 mesi dopo aver chiuso il tuo account. Puoi trovare piÃ¹ informazioni sulla nostraÂ politica di privacy(nuova tabella).

content:

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are. Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All debit card transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you via push notification when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens .
Sometimes a transaction can look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount. This can be because:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
If the transaction was not authorized by you, we're happy to help.  Either call us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us and weâ€™ll be happy to help you.

The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How do I open an N26 account?
content:
Opening an N26 account is easy and can be done in 5 minutes. Think banking canâ€™t be fast, flexible, and transparent? Think again.
You can open an account using your compatible phone or from the N26 website.Â  In order to open an account, you must:
Be at least 18 years old
Be a US Citizen or a US permanent resident with a valid social security number
Own a compatible phone
Here is how the account sign-up process works:
1. We will first ask you to provide us with the following personal information:
First & Last Name
Date of Birth
Social Security Number
Physical Home Address
Mobile Phone Number
Email Address
2. We will then verify your information and eligibility to sign up for the account. This process only takes a few minutes.
3. Once your information has been verified, the next step for you is to add money to your account.
You can initiate an ACH payment transfer from another bank using your N26 account number and routing number.Â 
4. Next, we will ship out your N26 VisaÂ® debit card by USPS.
Look out for delivery within 5-7 business days.
Thatâ€™s all there is to it. If you would like more information, just reach out to our fantastic customer support team via phone, chat, or email. 
Have questions about opening an N26 account in another country? Click here(new tab) to be taken to our EU Support Center to learn more. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: PerchÃ© non posso ottenere un Conto base?
content:
In alcune circostanze, N26 puÃ² rifiutare la tua richiesta diÂ Conto base. Questo puÃ² accadere nei seguenti casi:
Non vivi in uno dei nostri paesi supportati.
Hai giÃ  un conto N26 o un altro conto corrente in Germania e puoi utilizzarlo pienamente.
Sei stato condannato per reati contro la banca, i suoi dipendenti o clienti negli ultimi 3 anni.
Hai giÃ  avuto in passato un Conto base presso N26 che Ã¨ stato chiuso per saldo negativo o uso vietato.
Non hai soddisfatto i requisiti minimi delle due diligenze generali ai sensi di Money Laundering Act (la legge antiriciclaggio) e del Credit Services Act (la legge sui servizi di credito).

content:

Los envÃ­os de las tarjetasÂ N26 YouÂ oÂ N26 MetalÂ (al pasarte a una de estas dos cuentas) serÃ¡n gratuitos. En caso de que una tarjeta se pierda de camino a tu direcciÃ³n, tambiÃ©n te la repondremos de forma gratuita.
Si eres cliente de N26 You o estÃ¡s pensando en pasarte a N26 You, tienes la posibilidad de elegir tu tarjeta en uno de los 5 nuevos colores. Desde la app, en ConfiguraciÃ³n de tarjetas secciona Volver a pedir y podrÃ¡s elegir entre: aguamarina, pomelo, arena, grafito y ocÃ©ano.

title: Wie viel kostet ein N26 Konto?
content:

title: CRS - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin dâ€™informations de votre part ?
content:
N26 en tant qu'Ã©tablissement de crÃ©dit est, selon la norme dâ€™Ã©change automatique de renseignements (CRS en anglais), tenue de communiquer directement aux autoritÃ©s fiscales de l'Union EuropÃ©enne des informations sur les comptes financiers dÃ©tenus par des clients rÃ©sidents fiscaux dans un autre pays.
CRS signifie Common Reporting Standard ou Echange Automatique de Renseignements. Le CRS a Ã©tÃ© Ã©laborÃ© par l'Organisation de coopÃ©ration et de dÃ©veloppement Ã©conomiques (OCDE) et est une norme mondiale de dÃ©claration pour l'Ã©change automatique . d'informations (AEOI). L'objectif de CRS est de permettre aux autoritÃ©s fiscales d'avoir une meilleure comprÃ©hension des actifs financiers dÃ©tenus Ã  l'Ã©tranger par leurs rÃ©sidents Ã  des fins fiscales pour lutter contre la fraude fiscale. Plus de 90 pays ont acceptÃ© de partager des informations sur les actifs et les revenus des rÃ©sidents en conformitÃ© avec CRS.
Afin que nous puissions dÃ©terminer avec prÃ©cision si un compte doit Ãªtre dÃ©clarÃ© aux autoritÃ©s fiscales aux fins de CRS, nous devons vous demander :
Â Le(s) pays dans le(s)quel(s) vous Ãªtes imposable
Vous Ãªtes normalement Â«rÃ©sident fiscalÂ» et donc soumis Ã  l'impÃ´t sur vos revenus dans le pays oÃ¹ vous avez un logement. Si vous avez un endroit oÃ¹ vivre dans plus d'un pays, il existe normalement des Â«rÃ¨gles de dÃ©partageÂ» incluses dans les conventions de double imposition et les lois fiscales des pays concernÃ©s qui vous aident Ã  dÃ©terminer oÃ¹ vous Ãªtes un rÃ©sident fiscal. Il se peut que vous soyez rÃ©sident fiscal dans plus d'un pays au cours d'une annÃ©e et, dans l'affirmative, nous aurions besoin de connaÃ®tre le pays et votre numÃ©ro d'identification fiscale pour chacun d'eux afin de communiquer des informations exactes aux autoritÃ©s fiscales compÃ©tentes.

Votre numÃ©ro dâ€™identification fiscale (NIF) pour chaque pays dans lequel vous Ãªtes fiscalement rattachÃ©
Lâ€™attribution et le format dâ€™un NIF diffÃ¨rent dâ€™un pays Ã  lâ€™autre. Si vous rÃ©sidez au sein de lâ€™Union EuropÃ©enne, vous pourrez trouver le votre en consultant ce guide(nouvel onglet) mis Ã  disposition par la Commission EuropÃ©enne.
Si votre situation fiscale vient Ã  changer, vous pourrez Ã  tout moment modifier les informations concernÃ©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > ParamÃ¨tres > ParamÃ¨tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.
CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.
In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:
In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?Â 

You are normally a â€œtax residentâ€ and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally â€œtie-breaker rulesâ€ included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.Â 

What is your taxpayer identification number (â€œTINâ€) for each country?

The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.Â 
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax InformationÂ

title: Â¿Por quÃ© no me ha dado dinero el cajero automÃ¡tico?
content:
A veces pasa. Vas al cajero automÃ¡tico, la cantidad solicitada se descuenta de tu saldo, pero el cajero no te da el efectivo.
Lo primero que debes hacer es comprobar los lÃ­mites de tu tarjeta entrando en ðŸ‘¤Mi cuenta y seleccionando ConfiguraciÃ³n de Tarjeta. AsegÃºrate de que las retiradas de efectivo en cajeros estÃ¡n activadas.
Aunque no podamos decir con certeza de quÃ© se trata, sÃ­ que podemos ayudarte a recuperar tu dinero. La cantidad que se ha restado de tu saldo disponible no es mÃ¡s que una autorizaciÃ³n (una reserva o cantidad bloqueada). Como la transacciÃ³n no finalizÃ³ con Ã©xito, la autorizaciÃ³n caducarÃ¡ en unas horas o en un mÃ¡ximo de 12 dÃ­as hÃ¡biles y el dinero volverÃ¡ a tu cuenta.
Si en 12 dÃ­as el dinero no ha sido desbloqueado, por favor rellena elÂ formulario de disputaÂ y nosotros haremos todo lo que estÃ© en nuestras manos para recuperar tu dinero.
Mientras tanto, te sugerimos que pruebes con otro cajero automÃ¡tico de un operador diferente. Rara vez se da esta situaciÃ³n dos veces seguidas.

content:

Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).

If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). Weâ€™ll have to reset your account and youâ€™ll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, weâ€™ll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: FATCA - PerchÃ© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
content:
Come previsto dalla normativa FATCA, N26 ha lâ€™obbligo di fornire informazioni finanziarie al Dipartimento del Tesoro e allâ€™Internal Revenue Service (IRS) degli Stati Uniti sui conti di contribuenti statunitensi e di societÃ  estere in cui contribuenti statunitensi detengono interessi considerevoli.
La normativa FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) Ã¨ stata introdotta dallâ€™IRS con lo scopo di prevenire lâ€™evasione fiscale di contribuenti statunitensi mediante lâ€™apertura di conti presso istituti finanziari esteri.Â Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA sul sito www.irs.gov(nuova tabella)
Â A differenza della maggior parte dei paesi del mondo, il sistema fiscale statunitense prevede la tassazione dei propri cittadini anche nei casi in cui abbiano la residenza fiscale allâ€™estero.Â 
Â Per stabilire se il tuo conto deve essere riportato allâ€™IRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:
1. Sei (anche) un cittadino statunitense o titolare di una Green Card (permesso di soggiorno permanente) per gli Stati Uniti?
2. Sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti? 
Essere â€œsoggetto a tasseâ€ negli Stati Uniti non significa necessariamente pagare imposte sul reddito negli Stati Uniti. Implica, piuttosto, che le normative fiscali richiedono la compilazione della dichiarazione dei redditi (inerente tutti i redditi percepiti al di fuori degli Stati Uniti) da presentare allâ€™IRS.Â 
 3. Se sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti, qual Ã¨ il tuo Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)?
Puoi fornire il tuo Social Security Number (SSN) statunitense oppure il tuo Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN).Â 
Ti informiamo, inoltre, che se il tuo conto presenta un luogo di nascita statunitense, un numero di telefono statunitense oppure se hai impostato un ordine permanente verso gli Stati Uniti, secondo la normativa FATCA, verrai considerato un soggetto ai sensi del FATCA fino a quando non verrÃ  dimostrato il contrario.Â 
Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. BasterÃ  eseguire lâ€™accesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.

title: Â¿Puede N26 cerrar mi cuenta?
content:
En resumidas cuentas: sÃ­.
Podemos cerrar tu cuenta de 3 maneras: con notificaciÃ³n previa de 2 meses, de 14 dÃ­as, o de forma inmediata. Estas cancelaciones son definitivas: AtenciÃ³n al cliente no puede proporcionarte informaciÃ³n sobre el trasfondo de casos individuales ni tampoco puede cambiar la decisiÃ³n. Antes de la rescisiÃ³n se deberÃ¡ pagar, eso sÃ­, cualquier comisiÃ³n del contrato que quede pendiente.
2 meses de preaviso
Tenemos derecho a rescindir cualquier relaciÃ³n comercial con 2 meses de preaviso sin ninguna justificaciÃ³n (consulta la secciÃ³n 13 (1) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,Â consulta la secciÃ³n 19 (1) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva)Â o Â§ 675h del CÃ³digo Civil AlemÃ¡n).
14 dÃ­as de preaviso
TambiÃ©n podemos rescindir nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial con una notificaciÃ³n previa de 14 dÃ­as si hay una causa razonable debida al incumplimiento de las obligaciones contractuales (consulta la secciÃ³n 13 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,Â consulta la secciÃ³n 19 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva)). Dichas causas incluyen:
Utilizar una cuenta personal para fines comerciales.Â SegÃºn nuestros TÃ©rminos y Condiciones de uso, una cuenta privada solo puede utilizarse para fines personales. Cualquier transferencia que estÃ© relacionada con honorarios profesionales por la prestaciÃ³n de servicios y/o la venta de productos, estÃ¡ considerada como una transacciÃ³n comercial. Si quieres utilizar tu cuenta con este propÃ³sito, por favor regÃ­strate para una cuentaÂ N26 BusinessÂ oÂ N26 Business You.
Proporcionar informaciÃ³n incorrecta o insuficiente para los controles rutinarios.Â Somos un banco, por eso hacemosÂ controles rutinariosÂ de vez en cuando. Si no proporcionas la informaciÃ³n correcta o suficiente sobre la transacciÃ³n en cuestiÃ³n, tenemos derecho a cesar nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial para asÃ­ cumplir con las regulaciones financieras Alemanas.
Tener un comportamiento abusivo con algÃºn miembro de N26.Â No toleramos los comportamientos abusivos contra nuestros empleados. Tanto una amenaza de daÃ±o fÃ­sico como cualquier otro tipo de abuso en general, puede considerarse un delito de acuerdo con la legislaciÃ³n alemana y se denunciarÃ¡ a las autoridades competentes sin excepciÃ³n.
CancelaciÃ³n inmediata
PodrÃ­amos incluso rescindir nuestra relaciÃ³n comercial inmediatamente de forma extraordinaria (consulta la secciÃ³n 13 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,Â consulta la secciÃ³n 19 (3) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva)). Esto quiere decir en cualquier momento, sin notificaciÃ³n previa y sin un periodo de cancelaciÃ³n, en caso de que haya una causa razonable de rescisiÃ³n. Esto incluye:
Proporcionar extractos incorrectos a N26 sobre tu situaciÃ³n econÃ³mica, especialmente cuando solicitas un crÃ©dito.
No puedes pagar tu prÃ©stamo o cualquier otra deuda que tengas con N26.
No cumples las condiciones de N26 en lo referido a los prÃ©stamos (consulta la provisiÃ³n o aumento de fianzas, secciÃ³n 13 (2) de nuestrosÂ T&C(pestaÃ±a nueva)).

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. Youâ€™re probably familiar with using onlyÂ  your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication youâ€™ll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, youâ€™ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, youâ€™ll need to update your phoneâ€™s operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If youâ€™re unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you donâ€™t have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If youâ€™ve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, youâ€™ll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code youâ€™ve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you donâ€™t have access to your registered phone number â€“ either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen â€“ please contact our customer service via live chat and weâ€™ll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesnâ€™t support the latest app version, you wonâ€™t be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which weâ€™ll send to your account's registered phone number.
Youâ€™ll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

TambiÃ©n puedes usar el enlace de seguimiento para informar a DHL directamente sobre los detalles de la direcciÃ³n de entrega, o para cambiar la direcciÃ³n si sabes que no vas a poder estar ahÃ­ en el momento de la entrega.
El envÃ­o de las tarjetas estÃ¡ndar y N26 You tienen un precio de 6â‚¬ y 25â‚¬ el envÃ­o exprÃ©s (que incluye los 6â‚¬ de la sustituciÃ³n de la tarjeta.) Para N26 Metal, el precio es de 45â‚¬ (solo envÃ­o estÃ¡ndar).

Para vincular tu smartphone con tu cuenta se requiere un cÃ³digo de sincronizaciÃ³n. Si no has recibido el SMS con el cÃ³digo de sincronizaciÃ³n por alguna razÃ³n, puedes volver a solicitarlo desde la app hasta 5 veces (espera al menos 30 segundos entre una y otra).

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 2 ways (with 2 months notice or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section A14.1 of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)).
Immediate cancellation:
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section A14.2Â T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan.

title: What is CASH26?
content:
â„¹ï¸ Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
CASH26 allows you to withdraw or deposit cash by creating and showing a barcode at our participating stores. 
CASH26 is available in:
11.918 REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adamâ€™s, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann locations in Germany,Â 
2.019 participating dm, Billa, Merkur, and PENNY Austria locations in AustriaÂ 
202 PAM & Panorama and 386 PENNY stores in Italy.
You can find your nearest location, including opening times and directions, on the CASH26 map in the appâ€”tap on the Actions tab in the bottom right hand corner of your mobile app and select CASH26.
Withdrawals:
As soon as you create a withdrawal barcode, the amount will be deducted from your balance. If you change your mind, you can delete the code and the amount will instantly return to your account.
If a barcode remains unused, the amount will be returned to your account after 10 minutes.
You can withdraw up to â‚¬900 (â‚¬200 per transaction) within 24 hours.
Withdrawals are always free.
Deposits:
Deposits made with CASH26 are available on your account right away.
You can deposit up to â‚¬999 (minimum â‚¬50 per deposit) within 24 hours.
You can deposit up to â‚¬100 a month for free. Extra deposits are charged a fee of 1,5% of the deposit amount.
You don't need to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash.

Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get â‚¬15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

title: Lege den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest Portfolios mit Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) neu an
content:
Du kannst den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios reinvestieren in einen neuen Investment-Plan bei Moneyfarm.
Wichtiger Risiko-Hinweis: Bei dieser Option wird dein bestehendes Invest-Portfolio geschlossen. Das bedeutet: AbhÃ¤ngig vom aktuellen Marktwert des Invest-Portfolios zum Zeitpunkt der SchlieÃŸung, kÃ¶nnen finanzielle Verluste entstehen im Vergleich zum ursprÃ¼nglich investierten Betrag.

FÃ¼lle Moneyfarms Fragebogen zur Ermittlung deiner RisikoprÃ¤ferenzen aus. Auf dieser Grundlage erhÃ¤ltst du von Moneyfarm eine Empfehlung fÃ¼r ein/e Portfolio/Anlagestrategie, die zu dir passt.
Plane deine Investition, indem du ein/e Portfolio/Anlagestrategie wÃ¤hlst und den anfÃ¤nglichen Investitionsbetrag sowie deine monatlichen Einzahlungen festlegst. FÃ¼r N26 Invest-Kunden gibt es dabei keinen Mindestbetrag.
Ã–ffne dein Konto mithilfe deiner persÃ¶nlichen Angaben (Name, Adresse, Geburtsort etc.).
BestÃ¤tige als nÃ¤chstes die AGB sowohl von Moneyfarm als auch von FIL Fondsbank GmbH.

Sobald deine Registrierung abgeschlossen ist, kannst du den Kundenservice(neuen Tab) von Moneyfarm kontaktieren. Moneyfarm leitet dann die SchlieÃŸung deines N26 Invest-Portfolios ein und die Reinvestition des Gegenwertes in deinen neuen Investment-Plan bei Moneyfarm.
Dann schickt Moneyfarms Kundenservice dir ein bereits ausgefÃ¼lltes Formular fÃ¼r das Portfolio zu. Dieses schickst du ihnen unterschrieben zurÃ¼ck. (Elektronische Unterschriften werden akzeptiert.)
Moneyfarm erreichst du hier:
Tel: +49 (0) 69 3807 6632

title: Was sind Shared Spaces?
content:
Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk fÃ¼r eure Liebsten organisieren mÃ¶chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es mÃ¶glich.
Premium-Kunden (N26 You, Business You oder Metal) kÃ¶nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.
Alle N26 Nutzer kÃ¶nnen teilnehmen, unabhÃ¤ngig von ihren Kontotypen.
Dem Besitzer gehÃ¶ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.
Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.
Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

title: Â¿CÃ³mo funciona MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam te permite enviar dinero a tus contactos a travÃ©s de tu smartphone sin necesidad de usar sus datos bancarios. Para ello, inicia sesiÃ³n en la app:
Desde la pantalla principal pulsa sobre la pestaÃ±a de ''Gestionar''.
Seleciona ''Hacer un MoneyBeam''.
Selecciona un contacto de tu lista o introduce el destinatario de forma manual utilizando su nÃºmero de telÃ©fono o direcciÃ³n de correo. Para que funcione, tu contacto tiene que tener cuenta de N26 y estar visible.Â 
Selecciona una cantidad y mensaje de referencia.
Confirma con tuÂ PIN de confirmaciÃ³nÂ y elÂ mensaje pushÂ que recibirÃ¡s.
Los clientes de N26 recibirÃ¡n la transferencia de forma instantÃ¡nea. Puedes enviar hasta 1000â‚¬ cada 24 horas. 
Â¿Quieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 â‚¬ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. InfÃ³rmate mÃ¡s sobre nuestro programaÂ Invita a un amigo.

title: Come riavere i miei soldi in caso di frode?
content:
Se non riconosci una transazione e sei sicuro di non averla autorizzata,Â bloccare la tua cartaÂ non sarÃ  sufficiente. In questi casi Ã¨ necessario immediatamente:
Contestare la transazione tramite l'app N26, mobile o web: clicca sulla transazione e seleziona "Chiedi aiuto per questa transazione". Prenderemo in carico la tua richiesta e faremo del nostro meglio per recuperare i tuoi soldi.
Puoi continuare a utilizzare tutte le altre funzionalitÃ  del tuo conto fino allâ€™arrivo della tua nuova carta. Se sei in Italia, Germania o Austria, puoi usareÂ CASH26Â per i prelievi e il deposito di contante.
Considera che eventuali variazioni nellâ€™importo finale addebitatoÂ sul conto non indicano necessariamente una frode.

title: Come posso far accreditare lo stipendio sul mio conto N26?
content:
Far accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 Ã¨ molto semplice: basterÃ  fornire lâ€™IBAN al tuo datore di lavoro, il quale provvederÃ  a trasferire lâ€™importo sul tuo conto tramite bonifico SEPA.
Nel caso in cui il tuo datore si rifiutasse di accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA perchÃ© lâ€™IBAN non ha caratteristiche italiane ma tedesche, sta violando una leggi l'articolo "cosa fare se il mio IBAN non viene accettato" del nostro Support Center per sapere cosa fare.
