title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content:
You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. 
The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.
The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6â‚¬ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. 
If you donâ€™t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. Â 
Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

title: Wie kÃ¼ndige ich meine N26 You oder N26 Metal Mitgliedschaft?
content:
N26 You(neuen Tab) oderÂ N26 Metal(neuen Tab)Â Mitgliedschaften haben eine Laufzeit von einem Jahr. Die Mitgliedschaft verlÃ¤ngert sich automatisch um ein weiteres Jahr, wenn du sie nicht kÃ¼ndigst.

So funktioniertâ€™s im Detail:

title: Come annullare lâ€™iscrizione a N26 You o N26 Metal?
content:
I contrattiÂ N26 YouÂ (nuova tabella)oÂ N26 Metal(nuova tabella)Â hanno una durata di un anno. Il contratto si rinnova in maniera automatica per un ulteriore anno, salvo disdetta. 
In questo articolo troverai informazioni su come:
revocare la tua iscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni. 
cancellare la tua iscrizione in qualsiasi momento entro 1 mese dal rinnovo del tuo contratto. 
annullare il rinnovo della tua iscrizione entro 1 mese dalla data di rinnovo.

Puoi revocare la tua iscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni dall'apertura del conto. Apri semplicemente una chat con noi e ti assisteremo con la procedura. 
Richiedendo la revoca, non sarÃ  possibile aprire un conto premium in futuro.
Se desideri cancellare la tua iscrizione dopo il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni ed entro 1 mese dalla scadenza del tuo contratto, puoi farlo mettendoti in contatto con noi. Scegliendo questa opzione non si avrÃ  piÃ¹ accesso ai vantaggi N26 You o N26 Metal, come la copertura assicurativa.
Fino a 4 settimane prima della data di rinnovo, puoi richiedere l'annullamento del tuo contratto N26 You o N26 Metal. Per fare questo:
Effettua l'accesso alla app e vai a ðŸ‘¤ Il mio conto
Seleziona N26 You o N26 Metal
Seleziona Dettagli iscrizione (qui puoi anche vedere la data di scadenza della tua iscrizione)
Annulla l'iscrizione
Conferma l'annullamento tramite il messaggio push che ti invieremo
Con l'annullamento, potrai continuare ad utilizzare pienamente la tua Mastercard N26 You o N26 Metal fino alla scadenza della sottoscrizione, mantenendo la copertura assicurativa fino a quella data. Successivamente, passerai ad un conto standard gratuito che non prevede i benefici dei conti premium. Ti invieremo una carta standard prima della scadenza del contratto. Non Ã¨ necessario richiederla.
Ti avviseremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima della data del rinnovo.

Se vuoi chiudere il tuo conto definitivamente, visita il nostro articolo su Come chiudere il conto?

title: How can I protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password. You can do so via both our mobile and web applications. 
On the web:
Log in and click on â€œMy Accountâ€.
Click on â€œSecurity Settingsâ€. 
Enter your current password and enter a new (new tab)secure password(new tab). Please donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone. 
Click on â€œSet new passwordâ€.
In the mobile application:
Log in and go to â€œMy Account" > "Settings" > "Securityâ€. 
Tap on â€œChange login Passwordâ€. Please choose a secure password(new tab). Please donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.
It is important to remember that, as the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details.  
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered with in any way, you can get in touch with us immediately by phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us directly from the N26 mobile application or WebApp(new tab). 
The N26 account is offered by Axos BankÂ®, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Comment fonctionne Google Pay ?

Cette fonctionnalitÃ© est disponible si vous venez dâ€™ouvrir un compte N26 ou si vous commandez une nouvelle carte suite au vol ou Ã  la perte de lâ€™ancienne.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change yourÂ Confirmation PINÂ at any time in the app:
Go to ðŸ‘¤ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN canâ€™t contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN youâ€™ve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: How to use MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphoneâ€™s contacts without knowing their bank account details. For this to work, both users must have signed up to N26 in the UK and made themselves (new tab)visible in the app. 
In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab.
Tap the MoneyBeam option,
Choose a contact from your list or manually enter a contactâ€™s details
Your recent contacts will be shown first, to find other contacts click on All Contacts in the top right corner
Enter the amount and a reference text
Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive
The recipients will receive the transfer instantly. If the recipient doesnâ€™t collect the MoneyBeam within 7 days, itâ€™ll return to the senderâ€™s account. You can send up to Â£100 to other N26 customers per transaction and up to Â£500 within a 24-hour period.       
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get Â£10 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about ourÂ Refer a Friend Program.

All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 VisaÂ® Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.
